1.verse: Nnianim - Adamfo pa Tiofilo, nnipa pii abɔ mmɔden akyerɛw Yesu ho nsɛm a akɔ so wɔ yɛn mu no.

2.verse: Wɔkyerɛw faa nsɛm a wɔaka akyerɛ yɛn a nnipa a wohuu saa nneɛma yi fi mfiase nam so daa no adi no ho.

3.verse: Nanso minyaa adwene bi sɛ, sɛ mehwehwɛ nea wɔakyerɛw no nyinaa mu yiye na mekyerɛw brɛ wo a, eye.

4.verse: Eyi bɛboa wo ma woahu nokware a ɛwɔ nea woasua no nyinaa mu.

5.verse: Yohane awo ho nkɔmhyɛ - Mede m’asɛm no befi Yudafo sɔfo Sakaria a ɔtenaa ase Yudea hene Herode bere so a na ofi Abia asɔfokuw mu no so. Sakaria yere Elisabet nso, na ɔyɛ Aaron aseni.

6.verse: Na Sakaria ne ne yere Elisabet som Onyankopɔn nokwarem a wɔn ho nni asɛm wɔ Onyankopɔn anim.

7.verse: Na wonni ba, efisɛ, na Elisabet yɛ obonini. Na wɔn baanu nyinaa nso anyinyin.

8.verse: Da bi a eduu Sakaria asɔfokuw so sɛ wɔyɛ asɔredan mu adwuma no,

9.verse: wɔtow aba yii no sɛ, ɔnkɔhyew aduhuam wɔ ɔhyew afɔremuka no so.

10.verse: Saa bere yi ara nso na asafo no rebɔ mpae wɔ adiwo hɔ sɛnea wɔtaa yɛ no.

11.verse: Sakaria gu so rehyew aduhuam no, Awurade bɔfo begyinaa afɔremuka no nkyɛn mu wɔ nifa so.

12.verse: Sakaria huu no no ɔbɔɔ piriw na ne ho popoe.

13.verse: Nanso ɔsoro bɔfo no ka kyerɛɛ no se, “Sakaria, nsuro, Awurade Nyankopɔn ate wo mpaebɔ. Wo yere Elisabet bɛwo babarima na ɛsɛ sɛ woto ne din Yohane.

14.verse: N’awo bɛma w’ani agye na wo ho asɛpɛw wo. Saa ara na ɛbɛma nnipa bebree nso ani agye.

15.verse: Ɔbɛyɛ kɛse Awurade anim. Ɔrennom nsa biara da, na Honhom Kronkron bɛyɛ no ma afi ne na yam.

16.verse: Israelfo pii nam n’asɛnka so benya adwensakra asan aba Awurade, wɔn Nyankopɔn nkyɛn.

17.verse: Obenya Odiyifo Elia Honhom ahoɔden no bi, na obedi Agyenkwa no ba no anim abesiesie nnipa ama ne ba a ɔbɛba no. N’asɛnka bɛma ntease aba agyanom ne wɔn mma ntam. Na ɔbɛdan Awurade asɛm no ho asoɔdenfo adwene akɔ Awurade pɛ ho.”

18.verse: Sakaria buaa ɔbɔfo no se, “Ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na eyi aba mu? Mabɔ akora na me yere nso abɔ aberewa.”

19.verse: Ɔbɔfo no kae se, “Mene Gabriel a migyina Onyankopɔn anim daa no. Ɔno na ɔsomaa me sɛ memmɛka asɛmpa yi nkyerɛ wo.

20.verse: Esiane sɛ woagye akyinnye nti, wobɛtɔ mumu kosi sɛ wɔbɛwo abofra no. Na nea maka akyerɛ wo yi nyinaa bɛba mu pɛpɛɛpɛ wɔ ne bere a ɛsɛ mu.”

21.verse: Saa bere yi nyinaa na asafo mma no retwɛn Sakaria sɛ ɔbɛba. Na ɛyɛ wɔn nwonwa sɛ wakyɛ saa.

22.verse: Bere a ɔbae no, wantumi ankasa ankyerɛ asafo mma no. Wohu fii ne nneyɛe mu sɛ wahu n’ani so ade wɔ asɔredan mu hɔ. Ɔde ne nsa nyamaa wɔn se wɔnkɔ.

23.verse: Owiee n’asɔfodwuma wɔ asɔredan mu hɔ no, ɔkɔɔ fie.

24.verse: Nna bi akyi no, ne yere Elisabet nyinsɛnee na ɔde ne ho siei asram anum.

25.verse: Ɔde anigye kae se, “Awurade ayɛ me adɔe. Wayi animguase a ɛkaa me wɔ nnipa anim no afi me so.”

26.verse: Yesu awo ho nkɔmhyɛ - Elisabet nyinsɛnee asram asia no, Onyankopɔn somaa ɔbɔfo Gabriel kɔɔ Galilea akuraa bi a wɔfrɛ no Nasaret no ase

27.verse: sɛ, ɔnkɔ ɔbaabun bi a wɔfrɛ no Maria a na wɔde no ama Yosef a ofi ɔhene Dawid abusua mu no aware no nkyɛn.

28.verse: Gabriel huu no ara pɛ, ɔka kyerɛɛ no se, “Asomdwoe nka wo! Awurade ka wo ho, wo a Awurade adom wo.”

29.verse: Ɔbɔfo no asɛm no maa Maria adwenem yɛɛ no nnaa ma obisaa ne ho se, “Na saa nkyia yi, ase ne dɛn?”

30.verse: Ɔbɔfo no san ka kyerɛɛ Maria bio se, “Maria, nsuro, efisɛ, Awurade adom wo.

31.verse: Tie! Ɛrenkyɛ biara wubenyinsɛn na woawo ɔbabarima na woato ne din Yesu.

32.verse: Ɔbɛyɛ ɔkɛse, na wɔbɛfrɛ no Ɔsorosoro Nyankopɔn ba. Na Awurade de ne nena Dawid ahengua no bɛma no.

33.verse: Na obedi Yakob fi so hene daa; na n’ahenni to rentwa da.”

34.verse: Maria bisaa ɔbɔfo no se, “Na ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na mawo bere a ɔbarima nhuu me da?”

35.verse: Ɔbɔfo no buae se, “Honhom Kronkron bɛba wo so na Ɔsorosoro Nyankopɔn tumi abɛkata wo so, eyi nti abofra a wobɛwo no no bɛyɛ kronkron na wɔbɛfrɛ no Onyankopɔn Ba.

36.verse: Ɛbɛyɛ asram asia ni a wo busuani Elisabet mpo a ɔyɛ obonini anyinsɛn ɔbabarima wɔ ne mmerewabere mu.

37.verse: Efisɛ, Onyankopɔn de, biribiara nso no yɛ.”

38.verse: Maria kae se, “Me de, meyɛ Awurade afenaa. Nea Awurade pɛ na ɛnyɛ.” Ɛno akyi, ɔbɔfo no gyaw no hɔ kɔe.

39.verse: Maria kɔsra Elisabet - Nna kakra bi akyi no, Maria kɔɔ Yudea mmepɔw so kurow bi mu.

40.verse: Saa kurow no mu na Sakaria te. Oduu kurow no mu hɔ no, ɔkɔɔ Sakaria fi kɔsraa Elisabet. Okyiaa no.

41.verse: Elisabet tee Maria nkyia no, ɔba a ɔda ne yam no kekaa ne ho; amonom hɔ ara, Honhom Kronkron hyɛɛ Elisabet ma.

42.verse: Elisabet de ahosɛpw teɛɛm se, “Maria, wɔahyira wo sen mmea nyinaa, na wo ba a wobɛwo no no bɛyɛ onipa kɛse.

43.verse: Anuonyam bɛn na ɛsen eyi. Me sɛɛ ne hena a anka m’awurade ne na bɛba abɛsra me?

44.verse: Wukyiaa me pɛ, na abofra no de anigye kekaa ne ho.

45.verse: Nhyira nka wo sɛ wugye dii sɛ, nea Onyankopɔn aka no, ɔbɛyɛ; ɛno nti na wɔadom wo yi.”

46.verse: Maria Ayeyi dwom - Maria kae se, “Me kra kamfo Awurade.

47.verse: Na me honhom ani gye m’agyenkwa Nyankopɔn mu,

48.verse: efisɛ, wahu n’afenaa mmɔbrɔni mmɔbɔ, na efi nnɛ, awo ntoatoaso nyinaa bɛfrɛ me nea Onyankopɔn ahyira no.

49.verse: Efisɛ, ɔkronkronni Tumfo no ayɛ ade kɛse ama me;

50.verse: n’ahummɔbɔ fi awo ntoatoaso kosi awo ntoatoaso ma wɔn a wosuro no na wodi no ni no nyinaa.

51.verse: “Ɔde ne nsa a tumi wɔ mu no abɔ ahomasofo ne ahantanfo ne wɔn nsusuwii apete.

52.verse: Watu aberɛmpɔn ade so ama ahobrɛasefo so.

53.verse: Wama wɔn a ahia wɔn no nnepa na wagya ahonyafo kwan nsapan.

54.verse: Waboa n’akoa Israel na ne werɛ amfi ne mmɔborɔhunu ne ne bɔ

55.verse: a ɔhyɛɛ yɛn agya Abraham ne n’asefo no da!”

56.verse: Maria tenaa Elisabet nkyɛn bɛyɛ asram abiɛsa ansa na ɔresan akɔ ne kurom.

57.verse: Yohane Osuboni awo - Elisabet awo duu so no, ɔwoo ɔbabarima.

58.verse: N’afipamfo ne n’abusuafo tee adɔe a Awurade ayɛ no no, wɔne no nyinaa de anigye dii ahurusi.

59.verse: Eduu nnawɔtwe no, abusuafo ne adɔfo behyiae sɛ wɔrebetwa abofra no twetia na wɔato no din. Wɔpɛe sɛ wɔde abofra no to n’agya Sakaria.

60.verse: Nanso ne na kae se, “Dabi! Ɛsɛ sɛ wɔfrɛ no Yohane.”

61.verse: Wɔka kyerɛɛ no se, “Obiara nni abusua yi mu a wɔfrɛ no saa.”

62.verse: Eyi ma wɔde wɔn nsa yɛɛ nsɛnkyerɛnne bisaa n’agya din a wɔmfa nto abofra no.

63.verse: Sakaria ma wɔde krataa brɛɛ no na ɔkyerɛw so se, “Ne din de Yohane.” Eyi yɛɛ wɔn nyinaa nwonwa.

64.verse: Amonom hɔ ara, Sakaria tumi kasae bio, na ofii ase yii Onyankopɔn ayɛ.

65.verse: Wɔn a wɔtee nyinaa ho dwiriw wɔn, na saa asɛm yi trɛw faa Yudea mmepɔw so hɔ nyinaa.

66.verse: Obiara a ɔtee saa nsɛm yi bisaa ne ho se, “Ɛdɛn na abofra yi benyin ayɛ daakye? Ɛda adi pefee sɛ Awurade nsa wɔ ne so.”

67.verse: Sakaria nkɔmhyɛ - Honhom hyɛɛ n’agya Sakaria ma ma ɔhyɛɛ nkɔm se,

68.verse: “Nhyira nka Awurade Israel Nyankopɔn sɛ waba abegye ne manfo.

69.verse: Ɔde Agyenkwa Tumfo a ɔyɛ ne somfo Dawid aseni rebrɛ yɛn,

70.verse: sɛnea ɔnam n’adiyifo kronkron so fi teteete hyɛɛ bɔ

71.verse: sɛ, ɔbɛma yɛn Agyenkwa a obegye yɛn afi yɛn atamfo ne wɔn a wokyi yɛn no nsam no.

72.verse: “Na wama bɔ a ɔhyɛɛ yɛn agyanom wɔ n’ahummɔbɔ ho no aba mu na wakae n’apam kronkron no,

73.verse: na wakae n’apam kronkron a ɔne Abraham pamee no,

74.verse: sɛ obegye yɛn afi yɛn atamfo nsam no, na yɛasom no a osuro biara nni mu,

75.verse: na yɛn nkwanna nyinaa mu, yɛayɛ kronkron ne atreneefo wɔ n’anim.

76.verse: “Na wo, akokoaa yi, wɔbɛfrɛ wo ɔsorosoroni no odiyifo efisɛ, wo na wubesiesie ɔkwan ama Agyenkwa no,

77.verse: na wobɛkyerɛ ne manfo ɔkwan a wɔnam bɔnefafiri so nya daa nkwa;

78.verse: na eyinom nyinaa bɛba mu efisɛ, Onyankopɔn mmɔborɔhunu a ɛdɔɔso no,

79.verse: na ɛbɛma hann a efi soro abepue yɛn so ahyerɛn wɔn a wɔte sum ne owu sum mu no so na akyerɛ yɛn kwan akɔ asomdwoe mu.”

80.verse: Abofra no nyinii na honhom hyɛɛ no ma; ɔtenaa sare so kosii bere a ofitii n’asɛnka adwuma ase.

1.verse: Yesu awo - Saa bere no mu no, Kaesare Augusto a na ɔyɛ Roma hempɔn hyɛɛ mmara bi sɛ wɔnkan ne man no mu nnipa nyinaa.

2.verse: Saa nnipakan yi ne nea edi kan a wɔkanee wɔ Kireneo a ɔyɛ Amrado wɔ Siria no bere no.

3.verse: Obiara kɔɔ ne kurom ma wɔkyerɛw ne din.

4.verse: Esiane sɛ na Yosef yɛ Ɔhene Dawid busuani no nti, na ɛsɛ sɛ ofi Galilea kurow a wɔfrɛ no Nasaret kɔ Betlehem a ɛwɔ Yudea.

5.verse: Ɔne ne yere Maria a saa bere no na wafa afuru no na wɔkɔe.

6.verse: Wɔwɔ Betlehem no, awo kaa Maria,

7.verse: na ɔwoo ɔbarima. Wɔde kuntu kyekyeree abofra no ho de no too mmoa adididaka mu, efisɛ, wɔannya baabi ansoɛ wɔ ahɔhobea hɔ.

8.verse: Anadwo no ara, na nguanhwɛfo bi nso wɔ sare so baabi rewɛn wɔn nguan.

9.verse: Mpofirim, ɔsoro bɔfo baa wɔn nkyɛn, na Onyankopɔn anuonyam hyerɛn twaa wɔn ho hyiae maa wɔn ho dwiriw wɔn.

10.verse: Ɔsoro bɔfo no ka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Munnsuro, mede anigyesɛm rebrɛ mo ne amansan nyinaa.

11.verse: Ɛnnɛ wɔawo Agyenkwa a ɔne Kristo Awurade no ama mo wɔ Dawid kurom.

12.verse: Eyi ne nsɛnkyerɛnne a mubehu. Mubehu akokoaa a wɔde kuntu akyekyere ne ho a ɔda mmoa adididaka mu.”

13.verse: Amonom hɔ ara, abɔfokuw bɛkaa ɔbɔfo a ɔwɔ hɔ no ho ma wɔtoo ayeyi dwom se,

14.verse: “Anuonyam nka ɔsorosoro Nyankopɔn, na asomdwoe mmra wɔn a wɔsɔ n’ani wɔ asase so no so.”

15.verse: Bere a abɔfokuw yi san kɔɔ soro no, nguanhwɛfo no keka kyerɛkyerɛɛ wɔn ho wɔn ho se, “Momma yɛnkɔ Betlehem hɔ na yɛnkɔhwɛ saa anwonwasɛm a asi wɔ hɔ a Awurade ada no adi akyerɛ yɛn yi.”

16.verse: Wɔde ahoɔhare kɔɔ Betlehem kohuu Maria ne Yosef. Na wohuu abofra no nso sɛ ɔda mmoa adididaka mu.

17.verse: Nguanhwɛfo no huu abofra no no, wɔkaa ne ho asɛm a ɔsoro abɔfo no bɛka kyerɛɛ wɔn no nyinaa kyerɛɛ nnipa a wɔahyia hɔ no.

18.verse: Wɔn a wɔtee nguanhwɛfo yi asɛm no nyinaa ho dwiriw wɔn.

19.verse: Nanso Maria de, ɔde saa nsɛm a ɔtee no nyinaa siee ne tirim dwinnwen ho.

20.verse: Nguanhwɛfo no kohuu nea abɔfo no ka kyerɛɛ wɔn no, wɔde anigye san wɔn akyi kɔɔ nea wɔn nguan no wɔ hɔ. Wɔrekɔ no nyinaa, na wɔreyi Onyankopɔn ayɛ.

21.verse: Yesu dinto - Abofra no dii nnawɔtwe no, wɔtoo ne din Yesu sɛnea ɔsoro bɔfo no kyerɛe ansa na wɔrenyinsɛn no no. Da no ara na wotwaa no twetia.

22.verse: Wɔde Yesu kɔ asɔrefi - Bere dui sɛ Yosef ne Maria kodwira wɔn ho sɛnea Mose mmara kyerɛ no, wɔde abofra no kɔɔ Yerusalem sɛ wɔde no rekɔhyɛ Onyankopɔn nsa.

23.verse: Sɛnea Mose mmara no kyerɛ no, “Sɛ ɔbea wo n’bakan na ɔyɛ ɔbarima a, wɔde no ma Awurade.”

24.verse: Wɔkɔɔ asɔredan no mu hɔ no nso, wɔde mmorɔnoma mma abien bɔɔ afɔre sɛnea mmara no kyerɛ no.

25.verse: Da no na ɔbarima bi a wɔfrɛ no Simeon a ɔte Yerusalem no nso wɔ asɔredan mu hɔ bi. Na Simeon yɛ onipa trenee, ɔhotefo a Honhom Kronkron ahyɛ no ma a na daa na ɔhwɛ Agyenkwa no kwan.

26.verse: Ɔno na na Honhom Kronkron ayi akyerɛ no sɛ ɔrenwu kosi sɛ obehu Agyenkwa a Awurade asra no no.

27.verse: Enti bere a Maria ne Yosef duu asɔredan no mu sɛ wɔde abofra no rekɔma Awurade sɛnea mmara no te no,

28.verse: wɔkɔtoo Simeon nso wɔ hɔ, na Simeon gyee abofra no hyɛɛ Awurade anuonyam se,

29.verse: “Awurade, afei ma w’akoa nwu asomdwoe mu

30.verse: efisɛ, m’ani ahu Agyenkwa,

31.verse: a wohyɛɛ me ne ho bɔ no.

32.verse: Ɔno ne hann a ɛbɛhyerɛn wiase nyinaa na wahyɛ wo man Israel anuonyam!”

33.verse: Nsɛm a wɔka faa Yesu ho no yɛɛ n’agya Yosef ne ne na Maria nwonwa.

34.verse: Afei Simeon hyiraa wɔn na ɔka kyerɛɛ ne na Maria se, “Saa abofra yi so na Israelfo mu dodow no ara nkwagye ne wɔn asehwe begyina.

35.verse: Na ɔbɛma dodow no ara tirim ahintasɛm ada adi; na wo Maria de, wubesi apini wɔ wo mu.”

36.verse: Ana nkɔmhyɛ - Saa bere no, na Fanuel babea odiyifo Ana a ofi Aser abusua mu no nso wɔ hɔ bi. Na Ana yɛ obi a wanyin. Ɔwaree ne mmabaabere mu ne ne kunu tenae mfe ason pɛ na ne kunu no wui.

37.verse: Ne kunu no wu akyi no, odii kuna kosii sɛ odii mfe aduɔwɔtwe anan, na bere biara nso na ɔwɔ asɔredan mu de mmuadadi ne mpaebɔ som Onyankopɔn.

38.verse: Saa bere no ara mu, ɔno nso begyinaa hɔ bi yii Onyankopɔn ayɛ saa ara. Ɔkaa abofra no ho asɛm kyerɛɛ wɔn a wɔretwɛn ogye a obegye Yerusalem no nyinaa.

39.verse: Wowiee amanne sɛnea Awurade mmara kyerɛ no, wɔsan kɔɔ wɔn kurom Nasaret a ɛwɔ Galilea.

40.verse: Onyankopɔn hyiraa abofra no ma onyinii honhom ne nimdeɛ mu.

41.verse: Yesu wɔ asɔrefi - Afe biara na Yesu awofo kɔ Yerusalem kodi Twam Afahyɛ no.

42.verse: Sɛnea na wɔn amanne te no, Yesu dii mfe dumien no, n’awofo de no kɔɔ Yerusalem kodii Twam Afahyɛ no.

43.verse: Wowiee afahyɛ no di a wɔresan akɔ wɔn kurom no, Yesu kaa Yerusalem a n’awofo no nnim.

44.verse: Wotwaa da koro kwan a wɔn ani baa wɔn ho so sɛ Yesu nka wɔn ho no, wofitii ase bisabisaa n’ase fii wɔn abusuafo ne amannifo nkyɛn.

45.verse: Na wɔanhu no no, wɔsan baa Yerusalem bɛhwehwɛɛ no.

46.verse: Ne nnansa akyi no, wokohuu no Yerusalem asɔredan mu sɛ ɔte akyerɛkyerɛfo bi a wɔahyia mu ntam na ɔretie wɔn na ɔrebisabisa wɔn nsɛm.

47.verse: Yesu nyansa ne ne nimdeɛ a ɛdaa adi wɔ ne mmuae nyinaa mu no, yɛɛ nnipa a na wɔretie no no nyinaa nwonwa.

48.verse: Wɔkɔtoo no sɛ ɔte akyerɛkyerɛfo no mfinimfini retie wɔn no, ɛyɛɛ wɔn nwonwa. Ne na frɛɛ no bisaa no se, “Me ba, adɛn na woyɛ yɛn saa? Woama me ne w’agya ahwehwɛ wo abrɛ.”

49.verse: Yesu buaa wɔn se, “Adɛn nti na mohwehwɛ me? Munnim sɛ ɛyɛ m’asɛde sɛ metena m’agya fi som no anaa?”

50.verse: Nanso n’awofo no ante nea ɔkae no ase.

51.verse: Yesu ne n’awofo kɔɔ Nasaret no, ɔyɛɛ osetie maa wɔn. Ne na de nsɛm a esisii no nyinaa siee ne tirim.

52.verse: Yesu nyinii nyansa mu ne honam fam na onyaa Onyankopɔn ne nnipa anim adom.

1.verse: Yesu fiti ne nnwuma ase - Kaesare Tiberio dii ade ne mfe dunum so na Onyankopɔn asɛm baa Sakaria ba Yohane so wɔ sare so.

2.verse: Saa bere no na Pilato yɛ amrado wɔ Yudea, na Herode di Galilea mansinhene; ne nua Filipo di Iturea ne Trakoniti mansin so; na Lisania di Abilene mansinhene, ɛnna Hana ne Kaifa nso yɛ Yudafo asɔfo mpanyin.

3.verse: Yohane kyinkyinii asubɔnten Yordan ho nyinaa kyerɛɛ nnipa sɛ wɔmma wɔmmɔ wɔn asu mfa nkyerɛ sɛ wɔasakra afi wɔn bɔne ho na wɔde wɔn bɔne akyɛ wɔn.

4.verse: Sɛnea odiyifo Yesaia kae se, “Ɛnne bi teɛm sare so se, ‘Munsiesie kwan mma Awurade; momma n’atempɔn nteɛ.

5.verse: Mmepɔw bedwiriw, abon nyinaa bɛyɛ ma. Nea akyea bɛteɛ; akwammɔne bɛyɛ akwan pa.

6.verse: Na nnipa nyinaa behu Onyankopɔn nkwagye.’ “

7.verse: Yohane ka kyerɛɛ nkurɔfo a wɔbaa hɔ sɛ ɔmmɔ wɔn asu no se, “Awɔ mma! Hena na ɔbɔɔ mo kɔkɔ sɛ munguan mfi abufuwhyew a ɛreba no ho?

8.verse: Monkɔbɔ ɔbra pa mfa nkyerɛ sɛ moasakra ampa. Na monnhoahoa mo ho sɛ moyɛ Abraham asefo, efisɛ, Onyankopɔn betumi ama saa abo yi adan nnipa ma wɔabɛyɛ Abraham asefo.

9.verse: Sɛ moammu ɔbra pa a, ɛnne na mote sɛ dua a ɛnsow aba a wɔde abonnua ato ase rebetwa akyene, ahyew no no.”

10.verse: Nnipakuw no bisaa no se, “Na ɛnne na dɛn na yɛnyɛ?”

11.verse: Yohane buaa wɔn se, “Sɛ wowɔ ntama abien a, ma nea onni bi no baako. Saa ara nso na sɛ wowɔ aduan a, ma nea onni bi no bi.”

12.verse: Towgyefo a wɔbaa hɔ sɛ wɔmmɔ wɔn asu no nso bisae se, “Kyerɛkyerɛfo, yɛnyɛ dɛn?”

13.verse: Obuaa wɔn se, “Munnnye mmmoro nea wɔatwa ato hɔ sɛ munnye no.”

14.verse: Asraafo bi nso bisae se, “Yɛn nso yɛnyɛ dɛn?” Yohane buaa wɔn se, “Mommmɔ apoo, monntoto obiara ano, momma mo akatua nsɔ mo ani!”

15.verse: Esiane sɛ saa bere no na nnipa no nyinaa rehwɛ Agyenkwa no kwan nti, na wosusuw sɛ Yohane ne Agyenkwa no.

16.verse: Eyi maa Yohane ka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Me de mede nsu na ɛrebɔ mo asu. Nanso obi di m’akyi a ɔreba a, ɔwɔ tumi sen me na ne mpaboa mpo, mensɛ sɛ mikata. Ɔno de, sɛ ɔba a, ɔde Honhom Kronkron ne ogya na ɛbɛbɔ mo asu.

17.verse: Ɔno na sɛ ɔba a, obehuw mo so sɛ ɛmo, ayiyi mu aba pa no afi ntɛtɛ no mu na ɔde aba pa no akosie na ɔde ogya a ennum da ahyew ntɛtɛ no.”

18.verse: Ɔnam afotu horow so kaa asɛmpa no kyerɛɛ wɔn.

19.verse: Yohane afiaseda - Yohane kaa Herode anim wɔ ne nua yere Herodia a ɔwaree no ne bɔne ahorow a na ɔyɛ no ho.

20.verse: Eyi maa Herode de Yohane too afiase.

21.verse: Yesu asubɔ - Bere a Yohane bɔɔ nkurɔfo pii asu wiei no, ɔbɔɔ Yesu nso asu. Ɔbɔɔ no asu wiei a ɔrebɔ mpae no, ɔsoro buei.

22.verse: Honhom Kronkron sianee te sɛ aborɔnoma baa Yesu so na nne bi fi soro kae se, “Wone me dɔ Ba a wosɔ m’ani.”

23.verse: Awo ntoatoaso a efi Yesu so kosi Adam so - Yesu fitii n’adwuma ase no, na wadi bɛyɛ mfe aduasa. Nkurɔfo susuwii sɛ, Yesu yɛ Yosef ba. Yosef n’agya ne Eli.

24.verse: Eli n’agya ne Mattat; Mattat n’agya ne Lewi; Lewi n’agya ne Melki; Melki n’agya ne Yanai; Yanai n’agya ne Yosef;

25.verse: Yosef n’agya ne Matatia; Matatia n’agya ne Amos; Amos n’agya ne Nahum; Nahum n’agya ne Hesli; Hesli n’agya ne Nagai;

26.verse: Nagai n’agya ne Mahat; Mahat n’agya ne Matatia; Matatia n’agya ne Semein; Semein n’agya ne Yosek; Yosek n’agya ne Yoda;

27.verse: Yoda n’agya ne Yohanan; Yohanan n’agya ne Resa; Resa n’agya ne Sorobabel; Sorobabel n’agya ne Sealtiel; Sealtiel n’agya ne Neri;

28.verse: Neri n’agya ne Melki; Melki n’agya ne Adi; Adi n’agya ne Kosam; Kosam n’agya ne Elmadam; Elmadam n’agya ne Er;

29.verse: Er n’agya ne Yosua; Yosua n’agya ne Elieser; Elieser n’agya ne Yorim; Yorim n’agya ne Matat; Matat n’agya ne Lewi;

30.verse: Lewi n’agya ne Simeon; Simeon n’agya ne Yuda; Yuda n’agya ne Yosef; Yosef n’agya ne Yonam; Yonam n’agya ne Eliakim;

31.verse: Eliakim n’agya ne Melea; Melea n’agya ne Mena; Mena n’agya ne Matata; Matata n’agya ne Natan; Natan n’agya ne Dawid;

32.verse: Dawid n’agya ne Yisai; Yisai n’agya ne Obed; Obed n’agya ne Boas; Boas n’agya ne Sala; Sala n’agya ne Nahson;

33.verse: Nahson n’agya ne Aminadab; Aminadab n’agya ne Admin; Admin n’agya ne Arni; Arni n’agya ne Herson; Herson n’agya ne Peres; Peres n’agya ne Yuda;

34.verse: Yuda n’agya ne Yakob; Yakob n’agya ne Isak; Isak n’agya ne Abraham; Abraham n’agya ne Tera; Tera n’agya ne Nahor;

35.verse: Nahor n’ agya ne Serug; Serug n’agya ne Reu; Reu n’agya ne Peleg; Peleg n’agya ne Eber; Eber n’agya ne Sala;

36.verse: Sala n’agya ne Kainan; Kainan n’agya ne Arfaksad; Arfaksad n’agya ne Sem; Sem n’agya ne Noa; Noa n’agya ne Lamek;

37.verse: Lamek n’agya ne Metusala; Metusala n’agya ne Henok; Henok n’agya ne Yared; Yared n’agya ne Mahaleleel; Mahaleleel n’agya ne Kainan;

38.verse: Kainan n’agya ne Enos; Enos n’agya ne Set; Set n’agya ne Adam; Adam n’agya ne Onyankopɔn.

1.verse: Ɔbonsam sɔ Yesu hwɛ - Afei Yesu a Honhom Kronkron ahyɛ no ma no fii Asubɔnten Yordan ho maa Honhom no de no kɔɔ Yudea sare so.

2.verse: Ɛhɔ na ɔbonsam kɔsɔɔ no hwɛe adaduanan. Saa nna no mu no, wanni hwee. Na ɔkɔm dee no.

3.verse: Ɔbonsam ka kyerɛɛ Yesu se, “Sɛ wone Onyankopɔn Ba no a, ka na saa abo yi nnan aduan.”

4.verse: Yesu buaa no se, wɔakyerɛw se, “Ɛnyɛ aduan nko ara na ɛho hia onipa wɔ n’asetena mu.”

5.verse: Ɔbonsam de Yesu kɔɔ bepɔw bi so kyerɛɛ no wiase ahenni nyinaa bere tiaa bi mu.

6.verse: Na ɔka kyerɛɛ Yesu se,

7.verse: “Sɛ wobɛkotow, asom me a, mede ahenni ahorow yi ne mu tumi ne anuonyam nyinaa a wɔde ahyɛ me nsa yi bɛma wo.”

8.verse: Yesu buaa no se, “Wɔakyerɛw se, som Awurade wo Nyankopɔn na ɔno nko ara na som no.”

9.verse: Afei ɔbonsam de Yesu kɔɔ Yerusalem de no kogyinaa asɔredan a ɛwɔ hɔ no atifi pɛɛ na ɔka kyerɛɛ no se, “Sɛ wone Onyankopɔn Ba no ampa ara a, gyaa wo ho fi nea wugyina hɔ to fam!

10.verse: Efisɛ wɔakyerɛw se, Onyankopɔn bɛsoma n’abɔfo abɛbɔ wo ho ban

11.verse: na wɔabɛsɔw wo na woammɛhwe abotan no so.”

12.verse: Yesu buaa no se, wɔakyerɛw se, “Nsɔ Awurade wo Nyankopɔn nhwɛ.”

13.verse: Ɔbonsam wiee sɔhwɛ no nyinaa no, ogyaw no hɔ kɔe ansa.

14.verse: Yesu asɛnka mfitiase - Yesu san baa Galilea a na Honhom Kronkron ahyɛ no ma. Ankyɛ koraa ne din trɛwee ɔman no mu nyinaa.

15.verse: Ɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ wɔ wɔn hyiadan mu maa obiara kamfoo no.

16.verse: Wɔpo Yesu wɔ Nasaret - Yesu baa Nasaret, kurow a ne mmofraase wɔtetew no wɔ mu no mu. Na sɛnea ɔtaa yɛ no, ɔkɔɔ hyiadan mu homeda. Ɔsɔre kɔɔ anim sɛ ɔrekɔkenkan kyerɛwsɛm.

17.verse: Wɔde odiyifo Yesaia nhoma hyɛɛ ne nsa na obuee baabi a wɔakyerɛw se:

18.verse: “Awurade Honhom wɔ me so, na wɔayi me sɛ memmɛka asɛmpa nkyerɛ ahiafo. Na menka nkyerɛ wɔn a wɔwɔ nnomum mu se, wobenya ahofadi, anifuraefo behu ade; wɔn a wobu wɔn animtiaa benya anuonyam,

19.verse: na Onyankopɔn asiesie ne ho sɛ obehyira wɔn a wɔba ne nkyɛn nyinaa.”

20.verse: Ɔtoo nhoma no mu de maa ɔhwɛfo no na ɔtenaa ase; na obiara a ɔwɔ hyiadan no mu hɔ no hwɛɛ no dinn.

21.verse: Afei ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn se; “Ɛnnɛ na kyerɛwsɛm no aba mu.”

22.verse: Na kasa pa ne nsɛm ahorow a ɔkae no, yɛɛ wɔn a wɔtee nyinaa nwonwa ma wobisae se, “Ɛnyɛ Yosef ba no ni?”

23.verse: Yesu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Akyinnye biara nni ho sɛ mode bɛ yi bebu me se, ‘Ɔyaresafo, sa wo ho yare. Nea yɛate afa wo ho sɛ woyɛe wɔ Kapernaum no, yɛ bi wɔ wo kurom ha.”

24.verse: Nanso mereka ama moate ase sɛ, Odiyifo biara nni anuonyam wɔ ne kurom.

25.verse: Nokware mu, Elia bere so no, na mmea akunafo bebree wɔ Israelman mu. Saa bere no osu antɔ mfe abiɛsa ne asram asia enti ɛmaa ɔkɔm kɛse baa ɔman no nyinaa mu.

26.verse: Nanso Onyankopɔn ansoma odiyifo Elia ankɔ obiara nkyɛn sɛ ɔbea kunafo a na ɔwɔ Sarepta a ɛwɔ Sidon no nkyɛn.

27.verse: Bio, saa bere no na akwatafo bebree wɔ Israelman mu nanso odiyifo Elisa ansa obiara yare sɛ ɔsahene Naaman a ofi Siriaman mu no nko ara.”

28.verse: Nnipa a wɔwɔ hyiadan no mu tee ne nsɛm a ɔkae no, wɔn bo fuwii papaapa.

29.verse: Wɔde abufuw piapiaa no fii kurow no mu de no kɔɔ bepɔw a wɔn kurow da so no ano sɛ wɔrekɔwɔ n’atiko ama wakɔhwe bepɔw no ase.

30.verse: Nanso ɔfaa wɔn mu kɔɔ ne baabi.

31.verse: Yesu tu hohommɔne - Yesu kɔɔ Kapernaum a ɛwɔ Galilea. Ɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ nnipa no homeda biara.

32.verse: Ɛha nso ne nkyerɛkyerɛ no yɛɛ nkurɔfo no nwonwa efisɛ, ɔkasae wɔ tumi so.

33.verse: Na ɔbarima bi wɔ hyiadan no mu hɔ a hohommɔne ahyɛ no ma. Ohuu Yesu no, ɔteɛɛm se,

34.verse: “Yesu Nasaretni, mmɛhaw yɛn. Yɛne wo nni hwee yɛ. Woaba sɛ worebɛsɛe yɛn anaa? Minim onipa ko a woyɛ. Wone Onyankopɔn Ba Kronkronni no.”

35.verse: Yesu hyɛɛ hohommɔne no sɛ, “Tu fi ne mu kɔ!” Hohommɔne no de ɔbarima no hwee fam na etu fii ne mu kɔe a hwee anyɛ no.

36.verse: Nnipa no nyinaa ho dwiriw wɔn, na wobisabisaa wɔn ho wɔn ho se, “Asɛm bɛn ni. Onipa bɛn ni a ɔde tumi ne ahoɔden teɛ ahohommɔne ma wotie yi?”

37.verse: Nea ɔyɛɛ yi ho asɛm trɛwee ɔman no mu nyinaa.

38.verse: Petro n’asebea ayaresa - Yesu fi hyiadan no mu no, ɔkɔɔ Simon fi kɔtoo sɛ atiridii abɔ Simon n’asebea. Nnipa a wɔwɔ hɔ no srɛɛ no sɛ ɔnsa no yare.

39.verse: Ɔkɔɔ nea ɔda hɔ kogyinaa ne nkyɛn, teɛɛ ɔyare no ma egyaee amonom hɔ ara ma ɔsɔre maa wɔn aduan dii.

40.verse: Onwini dwoe no, wɔde ayarefo pii bae sɛ Yesu nsa wɔn yare. Ɔde ne nsa guu wɔn so saa wɔn yare.

41.verse: Ahohommɔne fii nnipa no pii mu fii a na wɔreteɛteɛm se, “Wone Onyankopɔn Ba no.” Nanso Yesu kaa wɔn anim hyɛɛ wɔn se wommua wɔn ano, efisɛ, na ahohommɔne no nim sɛ ɔno ne Kristo no.

42.verse: Yesu asɛnka wɔ Yudea - Ade kyee no, Yesu tew ne ho kɔɔ sare so baabi a ɛhɔ yɛ dinn. Nkurɔfo no kyin hwehwɛɛ no na wohuu no no, wɔsrɛɛ no sɛ ɔntena wɔn nkyɛn wɔ Kapernaum hɔ.

43.verse: Yesu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Ɛsɛ sɛ meka Asɛmpa a ɛfa Onyankopɔn Ahenni ho no mekyerɛ afoforo nso, efisɛ, ɛno nti na wɔsomaa me.”

44.verse: Yesu kyinkyinii Yudeaman no mu kɔɔ hyiadan ahorow mu kɔkyerɛkyerɛe.

1.verse: Asuafo no frɛ - Da bi a Yesu reka asɛmpa wɔ Genesaret tare ho no, nnipakuw bɛkyeree ne so sɛ wɔrebetie Onyankopɔn asɛm.

2.verse: Ohuu akorow abien a apofofo bi a wɔrehohoro wɔn asau wɔ mu no agyaw wɔ ɔtare no ho.

3.verse: Yesu kɔtenaa ɔkorow no baako a na ɛyɛ Simon de no mu. Ɔka kyerɛɛ Simon se ompia nkɔ nsu no mu kakra sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a obetumi afi hɔ akasa akyerɛ nnipa no.

4.verse: Yesu wiee n’asɛnka no, ɔka kyerɛɛ Simon se, “Hare kɔ baabi a emu dɔ kakra na munkogu mo asau no na mubeyi nam bebree.”

5.verse: Simon kae se, “Owura, yɛyɛɛ adwuma anadwo mu no nyinaa yɛannya hwee, nanso w’asɛm nti, yebegu yɛn asau no.”

6.verse: Woguu asau no na woyii nam bebree maa anka mpo asau no retetew.

7.verse: Wɔfrɛɛ wɔn mfɛfo a wɔwɔ ɔkorow baako no mu no ma wɔbɛboaa wɔn twee asau no. Nam no yɛɛ akorow abien no nyinaa ma ma a anka ɛreyɛ amemem mpo.

8.verse: Simon Petro huu nea aba no, obuu Yesu nkotodwe kae se, “Me wura, mesrɛ wo, fi me nkyɛn kɔ na meyɛ ɔdebɔneyɛfo a mensɛ sɛ wobɛn me.”

9.verse: Nam dodow a woyii no yɛɛ Petro ne n’ahokafo no nwonwa.

10.verse: Saa ara nso na ɛyɛɛ Yakobo ne Yohane, Sebedeo mma no nso nwonwa. Yesu ka kyerɛɛ Petro se, “Nsuro, efi nnɛ, wobɛyɛ nnipa yifo.”

11.verse: Wɔde akorow no beduu nsu no ano hɔ no, wogyaw wɔn nneɛma nyinaa hɔ bedii n’akyi.

12.verse: Ɔkwatani bi ayaresa - Da bi a Yesu wɔ kurow bi mu no, ɔbarima bi a kwata ayɛ ne honam nyinaa bɛkotow n’anim srɛɛ no se, “Owura, mesrɛ wo, sɛ ɛyɛ wo pɛ a, sa me yare.”

13.verse: Ɛhɔ ara Yesu teɛɛ ne nsa de kaa no kae se, “Yiw, ɛyɛ me pɛ. Wo ho mfi.” Amonom hɔ ara, ne ho fii.

14.verse: Yesu hyɛɛ no se, “Wo ne obiara nni w’ayaresa yi ho nkɔmmɔ. Kɔ na fa wo ho kɔkyerɛ ɔsɔfo na bɔ afɔre a Mose hyɛɛ sɛ akwatafo a wɔn ho afi no mmɔ sɛ adansedi no.”

15.verse: Yesu anwonwadwuma a ɔyɛe yi maa ne ho asɛm trɛwee mpɔtam hɔ nyinaa maa nnipa bebree betiee no pɛe sɛ ɔsa wɔn yare nso.

16.verse: Nanso na ɔtaa twe ne ho kɔ sare so kɔbɔ mpae.

17.verse: Bere bi a Yesu rekyerɛkyerɛ no, na Farisifo ne mmara no akyerɛkyerɛfo bi a wofi Galilea ne Yudea nkurow ahorow so ne Yerusalem nso wɔ hɔ bi a wɔretie no. Saa bere no, na Onyankopɔn ayaresa tumi ahyɛ no ma.

18.verse: Obubuafo bi ayaresa - Mmarima bi baa hɔ a wɔso obubuafo bi.

19.verse: Esiane sɛ na wontumi mfa nnipakuw no mu nkɔ Yesu nkyɛn nti, wɔforoo ɔdan a Yesu wɔ mu no kotuu atifi tokuru, de obubuafo a ɔda ne kɛtɛ so no faa mu gyaagyaa no brɛoo, kɔtoo Yesu anim.

20.verse: Yesu huu gyidi a wɔwɔ no, ɔka kyerɛɛ ɔyarefo no se, “Onua, wɔde wo bɔne akyɛ wo.”

21.verse: Farisifo no ne mmara no akyerɛkyerɛfo no tee asɛm a Yesu kae no, wobisabisaa wɔn ho wɔn ho se, “Hena ne saa onipa yi a ɔreka abususɛm yi? Hena na otumi sɛ ɔde bɔne kyɛ ka Onyankopɔn ho?”

22.verse: Esiane sɛ Yesu huu nea wodwinnwen nti, obuaa wɔn se, “Adɛn nti na mudwen sɛ asɛm a mekae yi yɛ abususɛm?”

23.verse: Yesu bisaa wɔn se, “Nea ɛwɔ he na ɛyɛ den, sɛ wɔbɛka akyerɛ obi se, wɔde wo bɔne akyɛ wo anaasɛ, wɔbɛka se, sɔre na nantew?”

24.verse: Na sɛ ɛbɛyɛ na mubehu sɛ Onipa Ba no wɔ tumi sɛ ɔde bɔne kyɛ wɔ asase so nti, mereka akyerɛ wo se, “Sɔre yi wo kɛtɛ na kɔ fie!”

25.verse: Amonom hɔ ara, ɔsɔree, yii ne kɛtɛ, kɔɔ fie. Ɔrekɔ no nyinaa na ɔreyi Onyankopɔn ayɛ.

26.verse: Wɔn a wogyina hɔ no ho dwiriw wɔn. Ehu kaa wɔn. Woyii Onyankopɔn ayɛ kae se, “Ɛnnɛ de, yɛahu anwonwade.”

27.verse: Yesu frɛ Lewi - Eyi akyi no, Yesu fii hɔ kohuu ɔtowgyeni Lewi sɛ ɔte atowgyei. Ohuu no no, ɔka kyerɛɛ no se, “Bedi m’akyi.”

28.verse: Ɛhɔ ara, Lewi sɔre, gyaw ne nneɛma nyinaa hɔ dii n’akyi.

29.verse: Akyiri yi, Lewi tow pon wɔ ne fi maa Yesu. Towgyefo ne nnipa ahorow bebree kɔɔ apontow no ase.

30.verse: Farisifo ne mmara no akyerɛkyerɛfo no hui sɛ Yesu ne saa nnipa no ato nsa redidi no, wonwiinwii bisaa no se, “Adɛn nti na wo ne towgyefo ne nnebɔneyɛfo ato nsa redidi?”

31.verse: Yesu buaa wɔn se, “Wɔn a wɔyare no na ɔyaresafo ho hia wɔn na ɛnyɛ wɔn a wɔnyare.

32.verse: Mamma sɛ merebɛfrɛ atreneefo na mmom mebɛfrɛɛ nnebɔneyɛfo sɛ wɔnsakra wɔn adwene.”

33.verse: Mmuadadi ho asɛmmisa - Nnipa no kɔɔ so bisaa no bio se, “Adɛn nti na Yohane Osuboni asuafo ne Farisifo asuafo no de wɔtaa di mmuada, na w’asuafo de daa wodidi na wɔnom?”

34.verse: Yesu nso bisaa wɔn se, “Ɛho hia sɛ wɔn a wɔn ani agye, anaasɛ wɔn a wɔahyia wɔn ayeforo ase no di mmuada, wɔ bere a ayeforo kunu no wɔ wɔn nkyɛn anaa?

35.verse: Nanso da bi bɛba a wɔbɛfa ayeforokunu no afi wɔn nkyɛn, saa bere no na wobedi mmuada.”

36.verse: Yesu buu wɔn bɛ yi se, “Obi mfa ntama foforo ntare ntama dedaw mu. Ɔyɛ saa a foforo no bɛma dedaw no asuane. Afei ɛbɛma nsonoe ada foforo no ne dedaw no ntam.

37.verse: Obiara nso mfa nsa foforo ngu mmoa nhoma nsa nkotoku dedaw mu. Ɔyɛ saa a nsa no bɛpaapae nkotoku no na ahwie agu na nkotoku no nso asɛe.

38.verse: Eyi nti, nsa nkotoku afoforo mu nko ara na ɛsɛ sɛ wɔde nsa foforo gugu.

39.verse: Obi nnom mmarimasa nwie mmisa ntinkum ase. Nea ɔnom no ka se, nea apae no na eye.”

1.verse: Homeda ho asɛmmisa - Homeda bi a Yesu ne n’asuafo no nam aburowfuw bi mu no asuafo no pempan aburow no bi huan, wee.

2.verse: Farisifo bi bisaa no se, “Adɛn na moyɛ ade a etia Homeda ho mmara a wɔahyɛ no?”

3.verse: Yesu buaa wɔn se, “Monkenkan nea ɔhene Dawid yɛe bere a ɔkɔm dee ɔne wɔn a wɔka ne ho no wɔ Kyerɛwsɛm no mu anaa?

4.verse: Ɔkɔɔ asɔredan mu kɔfaa abodoo a wɔde abɔ afɔre ama Onyankopɔn a mmara mma ho kwan sɛ obi di gye asɔfo nko ara no de bi maa wɔn a wɔka ne ho no nso dii.”

5.verse: Yesu kae se, “Onipa Ba no ne Homeda no wura.”

6.verse: Homeda foforo bi nso a Yesu rekyerɛkyerɛ wɔ asɔredan mu no, na ɔbarima bi a ne nsa nifa awu nso wɔ hɔ bi.

7.verse: Mmara no akyerɛkyerɛfo ne Farisifo no hwɛɛ Yesu dinn sɛ ɔbɛsa onipa yi yare Homeda yi nso anaa. Nea na wɔrehwehwɛ ara ne sɛ obebu mmara no so, asa yare na wɔn nsa aka no akyere no.

8.verse: Yesu huu wɔn adwene nanso ɔka kyerɛɛ ɔbarima no se, “Sɔre begyina anim ha, na obiara nhu wo.” Ɔbarima no sɔre begyinaa hɔ.

9.verse: Yesu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Mibisa mo. Dɛn na Mmara no ma ho kwan sɛ yɛnyɛ no Homeda; sɛ yɛbɛyɛ papa anaa yɛbɛyɛ bɔne, sɛ yebegye obi nkwa anaasɛ yɛbɛma wawu?”

10.verse: Yesu hwɛɛ wɔn nyinaa hyiae na ɔka kyerɛɛ ɔbarima no se, “Teɛ wo nsa.” Na ɔteɛɛ ne nsa no emu yɛɛ den sɛ baako no.

11.verse: Nea Yesu yɛe yi hyɛɛ nnipa no abufuw yiye ma wofii ase bɔɔ ne ho pɔw.

12.verse: Yesu yi asuafo dumien - Da bi Yesu kɔɔ bepɔw bi so sɛ ɔrekɔbɔ mpae. Ɔbɔɔ mpae anadwo mu no nyinaa.

13.verse: Ade kyee no, ɔfrɛɛ n’akyidifo no nyinaa baa ne nkyɛn na oyii wɔn mu dumien. Saa dumien yi na ɔfrɛɛ wɔn asomafo.

14.verse: Dumien a oyii wɔn no din na edidi so yi: Simon, a ɔtoo ne din Petro; Andrea, Simon ne nua; Yakobo, Yohane, Filipo, Bartolomeo,

15.verse: Mateo, Toma, Yakobo, a ɔyɛ Alfeo ba; Simon, a wɔfrɛ no Selote;

16.verse: Yuda, a ɔyɛ Yakobo ba; ne Yuda Iskariot a oyii Yesu mae no.

17.verse: Yesu sa nyarewa - Yesu fi bepɔw no so sian baa fam maa n’akyidifo bebree ne nnipakuw a wofi Yudea, Yerusalem ne mpoano nkurow Tiro ne Sidon mu no betwaa ne ho hyiae.

18.verse: Wɔbae sɛ wɔrebetie no ama wasa wɔn nyarewa nso. Otuu ahohommɔne bebree.

19.verse: Obiara bɔɔ mmɔden sɛ ɔde ne nsa bɛka Yesu. Ayarefo a wɔde wɔn nsa kaa Yesu no nyinaa ho tɔɔ wɔn.

20.verse: Afei ɔdanee n’ani ka kyerɛɛ n’asuafo no se, “Nhyira ne mo a moyɛ ahiafo, na mo na Onyankopɔn Ahenni no yɛ mo dea!

21.verse: Nhyira ne mo a ɔkɔm de mo, na mo na wɔbɛma mo amee. Nhyira ne mo a mo werɛ ahow, na mo na wɔbɛma mo ani agye.

22.verse: Nhyira ne mo a me din nti nnipa tan mo, na wɔpa mo, na wɔyaw mo, na wogu mo din ho fi.

23.verse: Sɛ ɛba saa a, momma mo ani nnye na munni ahurusi! Munni ahurusi, efisɛ, mo akatua retwɛn mo wɔ ɔsoro. Na saa ara nso na wɔn agyanom yɛɛ tete adiyifo no.

24.verse: “Na mo adefo de, munnue efisɛ, nea ɛma mo ani gye no, mo nsa aka dedaw; eyi nti munni kyɛfa biara bio.

25.verse: Munnue, mo a moamee mprempren, na mo na ɔkɔm bɛde mo! Munnue, mo a moreserew mprempren, na mo na mubesi apini, asu.

26.verse: Munnue, mo a nnipa kamfo mo, efisɛ, saa ara na wɔn nenanom kamfoo atoro adiyifo no.

27.verse: Monnɔ mo atamfo - “Mereka akyerɛ mo a moretie me no nyinaa se, monnɔ mo atamfo; monyɛ wɔn a wɔtan mo no papa.

28.verse: Munhyira wɔn a wɔdome mo; mommɔ mpae mma wɔn a wɔtan mo.

29.verse: “Sɛ obi bɔ w’asom a, dan baako a aka no ma no. Sɛ obi pa wo ntama a, worɔw w’atade ka ho.

30.verse: Sɛ obi srɛ wo biribi a, fa ma no. Obi gye w’ade a, mmisa no bio.

31.verse: Na nea mopɛ sɛ nnipa nyɛ mo no, mo nso monyɛ wɔn saa ara.

32.verse: “Na sɛ modɔ wɔn a wɔdɔ mo no nko ara a, mfaso bɛn na mubenya? Nnebɔneyɛfo nso dɔ wɔn a wɔdɔ wɔn no.

33.verse: Na sɛ moyɛ wɔn a wɔyɛ mo papa no nko ara yiye a, mfaso bɛn na mubenya? Nnebɔneyɛfo mpo yɛ wɔn a wɔyɛ wɔn papa no nso yiye.

34.verse: Na sɛ mobɔ wɔn a mususuw sɛ wobetumi atua no nko ara bosea a, papa bɛn na moayɛ? Nnebɔneyɛfo nso bobɔbobɔ wɔn ho wɔn ho bosea hwɛ sɛ wɔn nsa bɛka wɔn sika bio.

35.verse: “Monnɔ mo atamfo. Monyɛ wɔn papa. Momma wɔn nea ehia wɔn a, mo ani nni akyiri bio. Na sɛ moyɛ eyinom a, mo akatua bɛyɛ kɛse wɔ soro na moayɛ Onyankopɔn mma; efisɛ Onyankopɔn yɛ nnebɔneyɛfo adɔe dom bonniayɛfo nso.

36.verse: “Monyɛ mmɔborɔhunufo sɛnea mo Agya a ɔwɔ soro no yɛ mmɔborɔhunufo no.

37.verse: Mummmu ntɛn, na wɔammu mo ntɛn; mummmu fɔ, na wɔammu mo fɔ; momfa mfiri, na wɔde afiri mo.

38.verse: Sɛ moma a, wɔbɛhyɛ mo ananmu. Nea mode ma no, wɔde susudua a wɔahyɛ no ma, amia so ama abu so na ebesusuw ama mo. Susudua a mode besusuw ama no, ɛno ara na wɔde besusuw ama mo.”

39.verse: Yesu nam abebu so kasa kyerɛɛ wɔn bio se, “Onifuraefo betumi akyerɛ onifuraefo kwan ama ayɛ yie anaa? Sɛ ɛba saa a, wɔn baanu nyinaa bɛtɔ amoa mu.

40.verse: Osuani nsen ne wura. Nanso sɛ ɔyere ne ho sua nea wɔrekyerɛ no no yiye a, ɔbɛsɛ ne wura.

41.verse: “Adɛn nti na woma anhwea a egu wo nua ani so haw wo, bere a ɔbo da wo de so?

42.verse: Ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na woatumi aka akyerɛ wo nua se, ‘Ma minhuw anhwea a egu w’ani so no mma wo’ wɔ bere a ɔbo a ɛda w’ani so no wunhu. Nyaatwom, di kan yi ɔbo a ɛda w’ani so no ansa na woatumi ahuw anhwea a egu wo nua ani so no ama no.

43.verse: “Dua pa nsow aba bɔne, na dua bɔne nso nsow aba pa.

44.verse: Dua biara aba na wɔnam so hu dua ko a ɛyɛ. Worentumi ntew asɛ mfi akatewa so.

45.verse: Onipa pa fi nnepa a ɛwɔ ne koma mu yɛ ade pa. Saa ara nso na onipa bɔne nso fi ne nnebɔne a ɛwɔ ne koma mu yɛ ade bɔne. Nea ahyɛ onipa koma ma no, na epue fi n’ano.

46.verse: “Adɛn nti na mofrɛ me Awurade, nanso munni m’asɛm so?

47.verse: Mekyerɛ mo sɛnea onipa biara a ɔba me nkyɛn, na otie m’asɛm di so no te.

48.verse: Ɔte sɛ obi a na ɔresi dan na otwaa ne dan no fapem ma esii ɔbotan so. Na osu tɔe maa nsu no yiri bɛbɔ faa ɔdan no ase nanso antumi ammu, efisɛ, osi sii ɔbotan so.

49.verse: “Na nea ɔte m’asɛm na onni so no, te sɛ obi a ɔresi dan, na osii dan no sii anhwea so, na osu tɔe maa nsu no yiri bɛbɔ faa ase ma edwiriwii.

1.verse: Ɔsraani panyin bi gyidi - Yesu kasa kyerɛɛ nkurɔfo no wiei no, ɔkɔɔ Kapernaum.

2.verse: Saa bere no ara mu na Roma ɔsraani panyin bi somfo a ɔpɛ n’asɛm yiye yare denneenen a ɔreyɛ awu.

3.verse: Ɔsraani panyin no tee Yesu nka no, ɔsomaa Yudafo mpanyimfo bi sɛ wɔnkɔsrɛ no na ɔmmɛsa ne somfo no yare mma no.

4.verse: Woduu Yesu nkyɛn no, wɔde asɛm no too n’anim srɛɛ no sɛ, ɔmmoa ɔsraani panyin no, efisɛ, ɔyɛ onipa pa.

5.verse: Wɔkae se, “Ɔyɛ obi a ɔdɔ yɛn man na wasi hyiadan ama yɛn.”

6.verse: Yesu ne wɔn siim. Wɔreyɛ adu fie hɔ no, ɔsraani panyin no somaa ne nnamfo bi se, wɔnkɔka nkyerɛ Yesu se, “Awurade, nhaw wo ho, na mensɛ sɛ woba me fi.

7.verse: Saa ara na memfata sɛ meba baabi a wowɔ. Kasa, na me somfo no ho bɛyɛ no den.

8.verse: Meyɛ obi a mehyɛ tumi ase, nanso mewɔ asraafo bebree hyɛ m’ase. Meka kyerɛ wɔn mu bi se, ‘Kɔ’ a, ɔkɔ. Meka kyerɛ ɔfoforo se, ‘Bra’a, ɔba. Na mehyɛ me somfo se, ‘Yɛ eyi’ a, ɔyɛ.”

9.verse: Yesu tee asɛm yi no, ne ho dwiriw no na ɔdanee n’ani ka kyerɛɛ nnipakuw a wodi n’akyi no se, “Anokwa, Israelman mu nyinaa, minhuu obiara a ɔwɔ gyidi sɛ saa ɔbarima yi da.”

10.verse: Bere a abɔfo no san koduu fie hɔ no, wohui sɛ ɔsomfo no ho ayɛ no den.

11.verse: Yesu nyan okunafo bi ba wɔ Nain - Eyi akyi no, Yesu ne n’asuafo ne nnipakuw bi a wɔka ne ho no kɔɔ kurow bi a wɔfrɛ no Nain mu.

12.verse: Woduu kurotia no, ohui sɛ wɔrekosie obi. Na owufo no yɛ ɔbea kunafo bi a ɔwɔ kurow no mu no babarima koro. Na adɔfo bebree di amu no akyi.

13.verse: Na Awurade huu no no, n’asɛm yɛɛ no mmɔbɔ, na ɔka kyerɛɛ no se, “Gyae su!”

14.verse: Yesu kosoo funnaka no mu maa wɔn a ɛyɛ wɔn de no gyinae. Ɔka kyerɛɛ owufo no se. “Aberante, mise wo sɛ, nyan!”

15.verse: Aberante no sɔre tenaa ase na ɔkasae. Afei Yesu de no maa ne na.

16.verse: Nnipa no nyinaa ho dwiriw wɔn yiye na woyii Onyankopɔn ayɛ kae se, “Odiyifo kɛse bi asɔre wɔ yɛn mu, na Onyankopɔn asian aba ne manfo mu.”

17.verse: Nea Yesu yɛe yi ho asɛm trɛw koduu Yudea ne nkurow a atwa ho ahyia no nyinaa mu.

18.verse: Yohane Osuboni - Yohane asuafo kɔbɔɔ no nea asi no nyinaa ho amanneɛ.

19.verse: Yohane somaa n’asuafo no mu baanu kɔɔ Yesu nkyɛn kobisaa no se, “Wone nea ɔreba no, anaasɛ yɛntwɛn ɔfoforo?”

20.verse: Asuafo no duu Yesu nkyɛn no, wɔka kyerɛɛ no se, “Yohane Osuboni asoma yɛn wo nkyɛn sɛ yemmebisa wo se, “Wone nea ɔreba na anaasɛ yɛntwɛn ɔfoforo?”

21.verse: Saa bere no ara mu, Yesu saa nyarewa bebree; otuu ahohommɔne na ɔmaa anifuraefo huu ade.

22.verse: Yesu buaa wɔn se, “Monkɔka nea moahu na moate yi nkyerɛ Yohane se, mema anifuraefo hu ade, mmubuafo nantew, mesa akwatafo yare, asotifo te asɛm, awufo nyan na meka asɛmpa kyerɛ honhom mu ahiafo.

23.verse: ’Nhyira ne nea merento no hintidua.’”

24.verse: Yesu di Yohane ho adanse - Yohane asuafo no fi Yesu nkyɛn kɔe no, Yesu dii Yohane ho adanse kyerɛɛ nnipakuw no. Obisaa wɔn se, “Mokɔɔ sare so no, dɛn na muhui? Sare a mframa rehim no anaa?

25.verse: Ɛnne dɛn na muhui? Obi a ofura sirikyi anaa? Ahemfi na yehu wɔn a wodi yiye na wofura ntama pa.

26.verse: Na ɛnne na dɛn na muhui? Odiyifo? Yiw, na nea muhuu no no sen odiyifo mpo.

27.verse: Na saa Yohane yi na Kyerɛwsɛm no ka fa ne ho se, ‘Mɛsoma me bɔfo adi w’anim kan. Ɔno na obesiesie kwan ama wo.’

28.verse: Meka kyerɛ mo se, onipa biara nni hɔ a wɔawo no a ɔyɛ kɛse sen Yohane. Nanso nea ɔyɛ akumaa koraa wɔ Onyankopɔn ahemman mu no sen no.”

29.verse: Na wɔn a wɔtee nea ɔkae no nyinaa a towgyefo mpo ka ho bi gye too mu sɛ Onyankopɔn yɛ ɔtreneeni; na wɔsakraa wɔn adwene maa Yohane bɔɔ wɔn asu.

30.verse: Na Farisifo ne mmara no akyerɛkyerɛfo no de, wɔpoo Onyankopɔn asɛm nti, wɔamma Yohane ammɔ wɔn asu.

31.verse: Yesu bisaa wɔn se, “Dɛn na menka mfa nnɛɛmma yi ho; na dɛn ho na memfa wɔn nto?

32.verse: Wɔte sɛ mmofra bi a wɔregoru wɔ agodibea na wɔn mu bi reka akyerɛ afoforo se, ‘Yɛbɔɔ akyene maa mo nanso moansaw! Yetwaa agyaadwo, nanso moansu!’

33.verse: Yohane Osuboni aba a onnidi na ɔnnom nsa, nso muse, ‘Ɔwɔ hohommɔne!’

34.verse: Onipa Ba no nso aba a odidi na ɔnom a muse, ‘Monhwɛ odidifo ne ɔsanomfo a ɔyɛ towgyefo ne nnebɔneyɛfo adamfo!’

35.verse: Nanso wɔn a wodi Onyankopɔn akyi nokware mu no de wɔn bra di adanse sɛ, n’akwan nyinaa ye.”

36.verse: Ɔbea debɔneyɛfo sra Yesu aduhuam - Farisini bi frɛɛ Yesu adidi ma ɔpenee so kɔe.

37.verse: Ɔte hɔ redidi no, ɔbea bi a obu bra bɔne wɔ kurow no mu tee ne nka no, ɔde aduhuam bi a ɛsom bo tumpan ma kɔɔ hɔ.

38.verse: Ɔkotow Yesu nan ase sui maa ne nisu no fɔw Yesu nan ase. Afei ɔde ne tinhwi popaa nisu no, soo ne nan de aduhuam no sraa ho.

39.verse: Farisini a ɔfrɛɛ Yesu adidi no huu nea ɔbea no yɛe no, ɔkae wɔ ne tirim se, “Sɛ saa onipa yi yɛ odiyifo ampa ara a, anka obehu sɛ saa ɔbea yi bu ɔbra bɔne.”

40.verse: Yesu huu Farisini no adwene ma ɔka kyerɛɛ no se, “Simon, mewɔ asɛm bi ka kyerɛ wo.” Simon nso ka kyerɛɛ Yesu se, “Kyerɛkyerɛfo, ka ɛ.”

41.verse: Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no se, “Osikani bi bɔɔ nnipa baanu bi bosea. Ɔmaa ɔbaako sidi mpemnum; ɛnna ɔbaako no nso ɔmaa no sidi ahanum.

42.verse: Wɔn mu biara antumi antua ne ka a ɔde no no nti ɔde kyɛɛ wɔn. Wɔn mu hena na wugye di sɛ ɔbɛpɛ osikani no asɛm yiye?”

43.verse: Simon buae se, “Migye di sɛ nea ɔde ne ka kɛse kyɛɛ no no.” Yesu kae se, “Woabua no yiye.”

44.verse: Afei Yesu danee n’ani kyerɛɛ ɔbea no bisaa Simon se, “Woahu saa ɔbea yi? Mebaa wo fi, woamma me nsu anhohoro me nan ase; nanso saa ɔbea yi de ne nisu ahohoro me nan ase, asan de ne tinhwi apopa.

45.verse: Mebae yi, woanyɛ me atuu amfa amma me akwaaba; nanso efi bere a ɔbea yi bɛtoo me wɔ ha yi, onnyaee me nan mu so.

46.verse: Woamfa ngo amfɔw me tirim; nanso ɔbea yi de aduhuam a ɛsom bo asra me nan ase.

47.verse: Eyi nti mereka akyerɛ wo se, nea ɔbea yi ayɛ nti, wɔde ne bɔne a ɛdɔɔso no akyɛ no, efisɛ, wayi ɔdɔ kɛse bi adi akyerɛ. Na nea wɔde ne bɔne a esua akyɛ no no, ne dɔ nso sua.”

48.verse: Afei Yesu ka kyerɛɛ ɔbea no se, “Wɔde wo bɔne akyɛ wo.”

49.verse: Wɔn a ɔne wɔn te adidii no bisabisaa wɔn ho wɔn ho se, “Hena ne saa onipa yi a otumi de bɔne kyɛ?”

50.verse: Yesu ka kyerɛɛ ɔbea no se, “Wo gyidi agye wo nkwa. Fa asomdwoe kɔ.”

1.verse: Mmea a wodii Yesu akyi - Eyi akyi no, Yesu ne n’asuafo dumien no kyinkyinii Galilea nkurow ne nkuraa bi ase kaa Onyankopɔn ahenni no ho asɛm.

2.verse: Ɔrekɔ no, nnipa a na wodi n’akyi no bi ne Maria Magdalene a otuu ahohommɔne ason fii ne mu no,

3.verse: ne Yohana a ɔyɛ Kusa, Herode fi sohwɛfo panyin yere, ne Susana. Saa mmea yi ne afoforo bi na wofii wɔn ahonya mu hwɛɛ Yesu ne n’asuafo.

4.verse: Okuafo gu aba - Da bi a nnipa bebree bi fi nkurow nkurow so baa ne nkyɛn no, ɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ wɔn abebu mu se,

5.verse: “Da bi, okuafo bi kɔɔ n’afum koguu aba. Ogui no, aba no bi koguu kwan mu maa nnipa tiatiaa so na nnomaa bɛsosɔwee.

6.verse: Ebi nso koguu abotan so, enti efifii no, ankyɛ na ne nyinaa hyewee, efisɛ, annya nsu.

7.verse: Aba no bi nso koguu nsɔe mu. Efifii no, nsɔe no kyekyeree no na ewui.

8.verse: Ebi nso koguu asase pa mu, enyinii, sow aba mmɔho ɔha.” Na ɔkaa eyi no, ɔka kaa ho se, “Nea ɔwɔ aso a obetie no, ontie.”

9.verse: Na n’asuafo no bisaa no saa abebu yi ase no,

10.verse: obuaa wɔn se, “Mo de, wɔde Onyankopɔn Ahenni ho ahintasɛm ama mo, na afoforo de, wɔkasa kyerɛ wɔn abebu mu, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wɔbɛhwɛ nanso wɔrenhu na wɔbɛte nanso wɔrente ase.

11.verse: Abebu no asekyerɛ - “Afei abebu no asekyerɛ ni. Aba no ne Onyankopɔn asɛm.

12.verse: Aba a eguu kwan mu no gyina hɔ ma wɔn a wɔate Onyankopɔn asɛm no na ɔbonsam behwim fi wɔn koma mu, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wɔrennye nni na wɔrennya nkwagye.

13.verse: Aba a eguu abotan so no gyina hɔ ma wɔn a wɔte asɛm no na wɔde anigye so mu nanso entim wɔn mu. Na esiane wɔn gyidi a esua no nti, ɛnkyɛ na asɛm no awu. Na sɛ sɔhwɛ ba wɔn so a, wɔpa abaw.

14.verse: Aba a eguu nsɔe mu no gyina hɔ ma wɔn a wɔte Onyankopɔn asɛm, na wodi so, nanso asetena mu haw ne abɛbrɛsɛ, ahonya ne wiase afɛfɛde nti, asɛm no ntumi nyɛ wɔn mu adwuma sɛnea ɛsɛ.

15.verse: Aba a eguu asase pa mu no gyina hɔ ma wɔn a wɔde koma pa tie asɛmpa no, na wodi so, gyina pintinn de abrabɔ pa di ho adanse.

16.verse: Kanea ho bɛ - “Obi nsɔ kanea na ɔmfa kɛntɛn mmutuw so, anaa ɔmfa nhyɛ mpa ase na mmom, ɔde si kaneadua so na ahyerɛn ama wɔn a wɔba mu no.

17.verse: Nea ahintaw no bɛda adi, na nea ɛwɔ kokoam no nso ada gua.

18.verse: Enti nea mutie no, muntie no yiye. Obiara a ɔwɔ no wɔbɛma no pii aka ho, na nea onni ahe bi no, nea osusuw sɛ ɛyɛ ne de no mpo, wobegye afi ne nsam.”

19.verse: Yesu ne na ne ne nuanom - Da bi, Yesu ne na ne ne nuanom pɛe sɛ wɔne no kasa nanso esiane nnipakuw a na wɔatwa ne ho ahyia no nti, wɔantumi ne no ankasa.

20.verse: Obi kɔka kyerɛɛ Yesu se, ne na ne ne nuanom gyina nkyɛn hɔ baabi rehwehwɛ no.

21.verse: Yesu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Me na ne me nuanom ne wɔn a wotie Onyankopɔn asɛm na wodi so.”

22.verse: Yesu brɛ ahum ase - Da bi a Yesu ne n’asuafo te ɔkorow mu no, ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Momma yentwa nkɔ asuogya nohɔ.” Wosiim a wɔrekɔ no,

23.verse: Yesu dae. Saa bere no ara mu, ahum kɛse bi tui maa nsu bɛtaa ɔkorow no mu maa ɔkorow no yɛe sɛ ɛremem. Eyi maa asuafo no koma tui yiye.

24.verse: Asuafo no de hu ne nteɛteɛm nyanee no se, “Awurade, Awurade, yɛremem!” Amonom hɔ ara, Yesu sɔre teɛteɛɛ ahum ne asorɔkye no ma ɛyɛɛ dinn.

25.verse: Afei obisaa wɔn se, “Adɛn na munni gyidi?” Wɔn nyinaa suroe de ahodwiriw bisabisaa wɔn ho wɔn ho se, “Onipa bɛn ni a ahum ne asorɔkye mpo tie no yi?”

26.verse: Yesu tu ɔbarima bi ahohommɔne - Yesu ne n’asuafo no twaa po no beduu Gerasefo asase a ɛne Galilea di nhwɛanim no so.

27.verse: Yesu fi ɔkorow no mu sii fam pɛ, ɔbarima bi a ahohommɔne ahyɛ no ma akyɛ a ɔda adagyaw na ɔnte fie, na mmom ɔte amusiei a aboda mu na ɔdeda no behyiaa no.

28.verse: Ohuu Yesu no, ɔteɛɛm, kotow ne nan ase san teɛteɛɛm se, “Yesu, Ɔsorosoro Nyankopɔn Ba, dɛn na wo ne me wɔ yɛ? Mesrɛ wo, nyɛ me ayayade biara.”

29.verse: Ɔkaa saa asɛm yi, efisɛ, na Yesu ateɛteɛ ahohommɔne no sɛ womfi ne mu. Saa ahohommɔne yi taa ka no na sɛ wɔde hama kyekyere ne nsa ne ne nan mpo a, otumi tetew mu ma ahohommɔne no pam no kɔ wuram.

30.verse: Yesu bisaa no se, “Wo din de dɛn?” Obuaa no se, “Ɛdɔm.” Efisɛ na ahohommɔne ahyɛ no ma.

31.verse: Ahohommɔne no srɛɛ Yesu sɛ ɔnnhyɛ wɔn mmma wonnkogu amanehunu bon no mu.

32.verse: Saa bere no mu na mprako bi redidi wɔ bepɔw no nkyɛn mu baabi. Ahohommɔne no srɛɛ Yesu sɛ ɔmma wɔn ho kwan na wɔnkɔhyɛn mprako no mu. Na ɔmaa wɔn ho kwan.

33.verse: Enti ahohommɔne no fii ɔbarima no mu kɔhyɛn mprako no mu ma wɔbɔɔ kiridi, sianee bepɔw no koguu ɔtare no mu wuwui.

34.verse: Wɔn a wɔhwɛ mprako no so no huu nea asi no, wɔde hu ne ahopopo tutuu mmirika kɔbɔɔ amanneɛ wɔ kurom maa asɛm no trɛwee wɔ mpɔtam hɔ nyinaa.

35.verse: Nnipa a wɔtee asɛm no bɔɔ twi kɔhwɛɛ nea asi. Woduu nea Yesu wɔ no, wohuu ɔbarima no sɛ ne ho atɔ no a ofura ntama te Yesu nkyɛn. Nnipa no nyinaa ho dwiriw wɔn.

36.verse: Na wɔn a wohuu ɔkwan a Yesu faa so saa ɔbarima no yare no bɔɔ wɔn a wɔbaa hɔ no amanneɛ.

37.verse: Ehu hyɛɛ Gerasefo a na wɔahyia hɔ no nyinaa ma ma wɔsrɛɛ Yesu sɛ omfi wɔn nkyɛn hɔ nkɔ. Eyi nti, Yesu kɔtenaa ɔkorow no mu san twa kɔɔ asuogya hɔ nohɔ.

38.verse: Ansa na Yesu rebefi hɔ no, ɔbarima a otuu ahohommɔne fii ne mu no srɛɛ no sɛ ɔne no bɛkɔ. Nanso Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no se,

39.verse: “Kɔ na kodi nea Onyankopɔn ayɛ ama wo no ho adanse kyerɛ wo manfo.” Ɔbarima no fii hɔ kodii anwonwade a Yesu ayɛ ama no no ho adanse kyerɛɛ kurom hɔfo nyinaa.

40.verse: Yairo babea - Yesu duu asuogya hɔ no, nnipakuw no de anigye hyiaa no kwan, efisɛ, na wɔatwɛn no abrɛ.

41.verse: Ɔbarima bi a wɔfrɛ no Yairo a na ɔyɛ Yudafo hyiadan mu panyin baa ne nkyɛn, bebuu no nkotodwe, srɛɛ no sɛ, ɔne no nkɔ ne fi

42.verse: na ne babea koro a wadi bɛyɛ mfe dumien reyɛ awu. Bere a Yesu rekɔ no, na nnipakuw no kyere ne so.

43.verse: Ɔbea bi a mogya atu no mfirihyia dumien a obiara ntumi nsa no yare no,

44.verse: fii Yesu akyi soo n’atade ano. Amonom hɔ ara, mogya a etu no no twae.

45.verse: Yesu bisae se, “Hena na osoo m’atade ano no?” Obiara buae se, ɛnyɛ ɔno. Eyi maa Petro kae se, “Awurade, na sɛ nnipa no akyere wo so.”

46.verse: Yesu buaa no se, “Dabi, obi aso m’atade mu efisɛ, mete nka sɛ tumi bi afi me mu.”

47.verse: Ɔbea no hui sɛ ohintaw a ɛrenyɛ ye, ɛno nti, ɔde hu ne ahopopo bebuu Yesu nkotodwe wɔ nnipa no nyinaa anim, kyerɛɛ no nea enti a osoo ne mu ne sɛnea ne ho atɔ no no.

48.verse: Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no se, “Me ba, wo gyidi ama wo ho ayɛ wo den. Fa asomdwoe kɔ.”

49.verse: Yesu gu so rekasa no, obi fii Yairo fi bɛka kyerɛɛ Yairo se, “Wo babea no anya awu enti nhaw Kyerɛkyerɛfo no bio.”

50.verse: Yesu tee asɛm no, osee Yairo se, “Nsuro, gye di na wo babea no benyan anya nkwa.”

51.verse: Ɔduu fie hɔ no, wamma obiara anka ne ho ankɔ ɔdan a abofra no da mu no mu gye Petro, Yohane, Yakobo ne abofra no awofo nko ara.

52.verse: Na nnipa a wɔwɔ hɔ no nyinaa resu, di awerɛhow. Yesu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Munnsu, onwui na wada.”

53.verse: Wɔserew no dii ne ho fɛw, efisɛ, na wɔn de, wonim pefee sɛ wawu.

54.verse: Yesu soo ne nsa ka kyerɛɛ no se, “Me ba, sɔre!”

55.verse: Amonom hɔ ara, ɔsɔree na Yesu kae se wɔmma no biribi nni.

56.verse: N’awofo no ho dwiriw wɔn yiye nanso Yesu bɔɔ wɔn ano se, wɔnnka nea asi no nnkyerɛ obiara.

1.verse: Dumien no soma - Da bi Yesu frɛɛ Dumien no hyiae maa wɔn tumi ne ahoɔden a wɔde betu ahohommɔne na wɔde asa nyarewa nso.

2.verse: Afei ɔsomaa wɔn sɛ wɔnkɔka Onyankopɔn Ahenni ho asɛm na wɔnsa nyarewa.

3.verse: Na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Mo akwantu yi mu, mommfa biribiara nnkɔ, sɛ ɛyɛ poma anaa akwantubɔtɔ, anaa aduan biara, anaa sika, anaa ntade abien abien.

4.verse: Na sɛ mokɔ kurow bi mu a, ofi biara a mobɛsoɛ mu no, ɛhɔ ara na montena kosi sɛ mubefi kurow no mu.

5.verse: ”Sɛ mokɔ kurow biara mu na wɔannye mo, na morefi hɔ akɔ a, momporoporow mo nan ase mfuturu mfa nkyerɛ sɛ, mo ne wɔn nni hwee yɛ bio.”

6.verse: Wofii hɔ no, wɔkɔɔ nkuraase nkuraase kɔkaa asɛmpa no, saa nyarewa pii nso.

7.verse: Herode pɛ sɛ ohu Yesu - Ɔmansinhene Herode tee nea Yesu ayɛ no nyinaa no, ɛhaw no yiye, efisɛ, na ebinom keka se Yohane Osuboni na wasɔre afi awufo mu,

8.verse: na afoforo nso se ɛyɛ Elia anaa tete adiyifo no mu baako na wasɔre afi awufo mu aba.

9.verse: Herode kae se, “Yohane de, matwa ne ti, na hena koraa ne saa onipa yi a mete anwonwasɛm a ɛte sɛɛ fa ne ho yi?” Eyi nti, ɔpɛe sɛ ohu no.

10.verse: Yesu ma nnipa mpemnum aduan - Asomafo no fi wɔn akwantu mu bae no, wɔbɔɔ nsɛm a esisii hɔ nyinaa ho amanneɛ kyerɛɛ Yesu. Eyi akyi, Yesu ne wɔn twee wɔn ho kɔɔ baabi a ɛbɛn Betsaida.

11.verse: Nnipakuw no huu nea Yesu ne n’asomafo no wɔ no, wotiw wɔn ma ogyee wɔn fɛw so, kaa Onyankopɔn Ahenni ho asɛm kyerɛɛ wɔn, saa ayarefo yare.

12.verse: Anim rebiribiri no, dumien no baa ne nkyɛn bɛka kyerɛɛ no se, “Ka kyerɛ nnipa no na wɔnkɔ nkurow ne nkuraa a atwa yɛn ho ahyia yi mu nkɔpɛ nea wobedi ne nea wɔbɛda, efisɛ, baabi a yɛwɔ yi yɛ sare so.”

13.verse: Yesu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Mo ara momma wɔn biribi nni.” Wobuaa no se, “Yɛwɔ abodoo anum ne mpataa abien pɛ. Ɛno nti, gye sɛ yɛkɔtɔ aduan brɛ wɔn nyinaa.”

14.verse: Na nnipa bɛyɛ mpemnum na ahyia wɔ hɔ. Yesu ka kyerɛɛ n’asuafo no se, “Monhwɛ na nnipa no ntenatena ase aduonum aduonum.”

15.verse: Wɔyɛɛ sɛnea Yesu kae no.

16.verse: Afei Yesu faa abodoo anum no ne mpataa abien no na ɔhwɛɛ soro, daa so ase, hyiraa so, bubuu mu de maa n’asuafo no sɛ wɔnkyɛ mma nnipa no.

17.verse: Obiara didi mee. Afei asuafo no boaboaa nea wodi ma ɛkae no ano no, ɛyɛɛ nkɛntɛmma dumien.

18.verse: Petro kyerɛ onipa ko a Yesu yɛ - Da bi Yesu nko ara kɔhyɛɛ baabi bɔɔ mpae. Eyi akyi no, obisaa n’asuafo no se, “Nnipa ka se mene hena?”

19.verse: Wobuaa no se, “Ebinom ka se, woyɛ Yohane Osuboni, ebinom nso ka se Elia, na afoforo nso se, woyɛ tete adiyifo no baako na wasɔre afi awufo mu aba.”

20.verse: Yesu bisaa wɔn se, “Na mo nso muse mene hena?” Petro buaa no se, “Wone Kristo, nea Onyankopɔn asoma no no.”

21.verse: Yesu hyɛ ne wu ho nkɔm - Yesu bɔɔ wɔn ano se wɔnnka nnkyerɛ obiara.

22.verse: Ɔtoaa so se, “Ɛsɛ sɛ Kristo no hu amane pii; Yudafo mpanyimfo ne asɔfo mpanyin ne mmara no akyerɛkyerɛfo nso bɛpo no. Akyiri yi wobekum no, na ne nnansa so wasɔre.”

23.verse: Afei ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn nyinaa se, “Sɛ obi pɛ sɛ odi m’akyi a, ɔmpa ne ho akyi na daa ɔnsoa n’asɛnnua na onni m’akyi.

24.verse: Na obiara a ɔma n’ani ku ne ho sen me no, ɔbɛhwere ne nkwa; na nea me nti ɔbɛhwere ne nkwa no, ne nsa bɛka.

25.verse: Na sɛ onipa nya wiase yi mu nneɛma nyinaa na ɔhwere ne kra a, dɛn mfaso na obenya?

26.verse: “Na nea n’ani bewu me ne me nsɛm ho no, ɔno nso da a me, Kristo, bɛba wɔ me ne Agya no ne abɔfo kronkron no anuonyam mu no, m’ani bewu ne ho.

27.verse: Na mereka akyerɛ mo se, mo a mugyina ha yi mu bi wɔ hɔ a wɔrenwu kosi sɛ wobehu Onyankopɔn Ahenni no.”

28.verse: Yesu anuonyam da adi - Yesu kaa ne nsɛm yi wiei no, ɛbɛyɛ nnawɔtwe akyi ɔne Petro, Yohane ne Yakobo kɔɔ bepɔw bi so sɛ wɔrekɔbɔ mpae.

29.verse: Na Yesu gu so rebɔ mpae no, n’animdua sesae, na n’atade nso hyerɛnee.

30.verse: Prɛko pɛ, nnipa baanu a ɛyɛ Mose ne Elia ne no bɛkasae.

31.verse: Saa nnipa baanu yi bepuee hɔ anuonyam mu kaa ne wu a obewu wɔ Yerusalem no ho asɛm kyerɛɛ no.

32.verse: Saa bere no na Petro ne nnipa a wɔka ne ho no adeda hatehatee na wonyannyanee a wɔn ani so tetew wɔn no, wohuu Yesu sɛ ɔwɔ n’anuonyam mu ne nnipa baanu bi a wɔka ne ho.

33.verse: Na ɛbae sɛ nnipa no refi Yesu nkyɛn akɔ no, Petro ka kyerɛɛ Yesu se, “Awurade, eye sɛ yɛn nso yɛwɔ ha bi. Ma yɛmmɔ asese abiɛsa; wo de baako, Mose de baako na Elia nso de baako.” Na Petro nnim asɛm a ɔreka no.

34.verse: Ogu so rekasa no, omununkum bɛkataa wɔn so ma wosuroe.

35.verse: Na ɛnne bi fi omununkum no mu kae se, “Oyi ne me Ba a mayi no. Muntie no!”

36.verse: Kasa yi akyi no, wohui sɛ aka Yesu nko ara na ogyina hɔ. Na mmere no mu, wɔanka nea wohui no ankyerɛ obiara.

37.verse: Otwafo bi ayaresa - Ade kyee a wosian fii bepɔw no so bae no, nnipakuw bi behyiaa Yesu.

38.verse: Ɔbarima bi fi nnipakuw no mu teɛɛm se, “Kyerɛkyerɛfo, mesrɛ wo, bra bɛhwɛ me ba a midi no ba koro ma me;

39.verse: sɛ hohommɔne ba ne so a, amonom ɔteɛm, otwa hwe, osinsen, n’ano pu ahuru, na obu fa so, na ɛkyɛ ansa na afi ne so.

40.verse: Na mesrɛɛ w’asuafo no sɛ wontu hohommɔne no, nanso wɔantumi.”

41.verse: Yesu kae se, “O! Mo a munni gyidi, mentena mo nkyɛn na minnya mo ho boasetɔ nkosi da bɛn!” Afei ɔdanee n’ani ka kyerɛɛ ɔbarima no se, “Fa wo ba no bra ha.”

42.verse: Ɔde abofra no reba no, hohommɔne no twaa no hwee fam ma osinsenii. Nanso Yesu teɛteɛɛ hohommɔne no maa abofra no ho yɛɛ no den na ɔde no maa n’agya.

43.verse: Onyankopɔn tumi ne ne kɛseyɛ a ɛdaa adi wɔ hohommɔne no tu mu no maa nnipa no ho dwiriw wɔn. Na wɔredwinnwen nea asi yi ho no, Yesu ka kyerɛɛ n’asuafo no se,

44.verse: “Muntie asɛm a merebɛka yi yiye. Wobeyi Kristo no ama.”

45.verse: Nea ɔkae yi na ɛyɛ ahintasɛm nti, asuafo no ante ase. Nanso na wosuro sɛ wobebisa no ase.

46.verse: Nea ɔyɛ kɛse Onyankopɔn anim - Asuafo no gyee akyinnye a ɛfa wɔn mu nea ɔbɛyɛ kɛse Onyankopɔn Ahenni mu no ho.

47.verse: Na Yesu huu wɔn adwene no, osoo abofra bi mu de no begyinaa ne nkyɛn pɛɛ,

48.verse: na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Obiara a obegye saa abofra yi wɔ me din mu no, gye me; na nea ogye me no nso, gye nea ɔsomaa me no. Nea ɔyɛ aketewaa wɔ mo nyinaa mu no, ɔno ne ɔkɛse.”

49.verse: Yohane nso ka kyerɛɛ no se, “Awurade, yehuu obi a ɔnka yɛn ho sɛ ɔde wo din tu ahohommɔne enti yɛbraa no.”

50.verse: Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no se, “Ɛnsɛ sɛ anka mobra no, efisɛ, nea ontia mo no na ɔwɔ mo afa.”

51.verse: Samariafo bi po Yesu - Na bere a ɛsɛ sɛ Yesu san kɔ soro no rebɛn no, osii ne bo sɛ ɔbɛkɔ Yerusalem.

52.verse: Ansa na ɔrebɛkɔ no, ɔsomaa nnipa bi dii kan kɔɔ Samaria akuraa bi ase sɛ wɔnkosiesie baabi mma no.

53.verse: Nanso Samariafo no annye Yesu, efisɛ, wohui sɛ na ɔrekɔ Yerusalem.

54.verse: Asuafo no tee nea aba no, Yakobo ne Yohane bisaa Yesu se, “Awurade, wopɛ sɛ yɛma ogya fi soro bɛhyew wɔn pasaa anaa?”

55.verse: Yesu danee n’ani kyerɛɛ wɔn kaa wɔn anim,

56.verse: na wofii hɔ kɔɔ akuraa foforo bi ase.

57.verse: Kristo akyidi mu brɛ - Bere a wɔrekɔ no, ɔbarima bi baa Yesu nkyɛn bɛka kyerɛɛ no se, “Baabiara a wobɛkɔ no, medi w’akyi.”

58.verse: Yesu buaa no se, “Sakraman wɔ wɔn abon, wim nnomaa nso wɔ mmirebuw, nanso Kristo no de, onni dabere.”

59.verse: Yesu ka kyerɛɛ ɔbarima foforo bi nso se, “Bedi m’akyi.” Nanso ɔbarima no kae se, “Awurade, ma me kwan na minkosie m’agya ansa.”

60.verse: Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no se, “Ma wɔn a wɔte ase na wɔawu wɔ honhom mu no nyɛ saa nnwuma no, na wo de, kɔka Onyankopɔn Ahenni no ho asɛm kyerɛ amanaman nyinaa.”

61.verse: Na ɔfoforo nso kae se, “Awurade, medi w’akyi; nanso ma me kwan na me ne m’abusuafo nkodi nkra ansa.”

62.verse: Nanso Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no se, “Obiara a ɔbɛma n’adwene ayɛ no ntanta wɔ dwumadi bi a mede ahyɛ ne nsa no ho no, mfata Onyankopɔn Ahenni on.”

1.verse: Asuafo aduɔson no soma - Eyi akyi, Yesu yii n’akyidifo no mu aduɔson somaa wɔn baanu baanu kɔɔ nkurow ne nkuraa a akyiri yi ɔbɛkɔ hɔ no so.

2.verse: Ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Otwa adwuma no dɔɔso, nanso adwumayɛfo no sua. Enti monsrɛ adwumawura no na ɔmma adwumayɛfo bebree mmra ne twa adwuma no mu.

3.verse: Monkɔ, na meresoma mo sɛ nguan akɔ mpataku mu.

4.verse: Mommfa sika, akwantubɔtɔ anaa mpaboa; na munnkyia obiara nso a mubehyia no wɔ kwan so.

5.verse: “Sɛ mokɔ ofi biara mu a, munni kan nkyia ofie hɔfo no se, ‘Asomdwoe nka mo!’

6.verse: Na sɛ asomdwoe ba bi wɔ hɔ a, mo asomdwoe bɛba ne so; na sɛ obi a ɔte saa nni hɔ a, mo asomdwoe bɛsan aba mo nkyɛn.

7.verse: Ofi biara a mokɔ mu no, momma ɛhɔ nyɛ mo atenae; aduan biara a wɔde bɛma mo no, munni, efisɛ, ɛsɛ sɛ odwumayɛfo biara nya n’adwumayɛ so akatua; munnni atutena wɔ afi mu.

8.verse: “Na sɛ mokɔ kurow biara mu na wogye mo fɛw so a, aduan biara a wɔde bɛma mo no, munni.

9.verse: Monsa kurow no mu ayarefo yare, na monka nkyerɛ ɛhɔfo nyinaa se, ‘Onyankopɔn Ahenni no abɛn mo.’

10.verse: “Nanso sɛ mokɔ kurow biara mu na wɔannye mo fɛw so a, monkɔ ne mmɔnten so nkɔpae mu nka se,

11.verse: ‘Mo kurom ha mfuturu a ɛwɔ yɛn nan ase mpo, yɛreporoporow agu, de atia mo; na mmom munhu pefee sɛ Onyankopɔn Ahenni no abɛn.’

12.verse: Mereka akyerɛ mo se, saa kurow no, asɛm a ɛbɛto wɔn atemmuda no bɛsen nea ɛtoo Sodom no.

13.verse: Korasin, due! Betsaida, due! Anwonwade a meyɛɛ wɔ mo mu no, sɛ meyɛɛ wɔ Tiro ne Sidon a, anka ɛhɔfo no de awerɛhow ne ahonu asakra wɔn adwene dedaw.

14.verse: Atemmuda no, asɛm a ɛbɛto wɔn no bɛsen nea ɛbɛto Tiro ne Sidon.

15.verse: Na wo Kapernaum, wugye di sɛ wubenya ɔsoro anuonyam.? Dabida, wobɛkɔ asaman.

16.verse: “Obiara a otie mo no tie me, na nea ɔpo mo no po me, na nea ɔpo me no nso po nea ɔsomaa me no.”

17.verse: Aduɔson no amanneɛbɔ - Aduɔson no san de anigye bae bɛbɔɔ amanneɛ se, “Awurade, wo din nti, ahohommɔne mpo abrɛ wɔn ho ase ama yɛn.”

18.verse: Na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Mihui sɛ ɔbonsam retew afi soro sɛ anyinam abɛhwe fam.

19.verse: Mama mo tumi ne ahoɔden a mode betiatia awɔ ne nkekantwɛre ne ɔtamfo no tumi biara a ɔwɔ so na biribiara nso rentumi mo.

20.verse: Nanso mommma mo ani nnnye sɛ ahohommɔne brɛ wɔn ho ase ma mo, na mmom, momma mo ani nnye sɛ wɔakyerɛw mo din wɔ soro.”

21.verse: Yesu aseda mpae - Saa bere no ara mu, Yesu de Honhom Kronkron mu anigye bɔɔ mpae se, “Agya, ɔsoro ne asase wura, meda wo ase sɛ wode saa nneɛma yi ahintaw wɔn a wosusuw sɛ wɔyɛ anyansafo, na mmom woada nokware no adi akyerɛ wɔn a wɔde ahobrɛase gye wo di sɛ mmofra no. Nanso, Agya, wo pɛ mu na woma ɛbaa saa.

22.verse: M’agya de nneɛma nyinaa ahyɛ me nsa; na obiara nnim Ɔba no, gye Agya no. Saa ara nso na obiara nnim Agya no, gye Ɔba no ne wɔn a Ɔba no bɛda Agya no adi akyerɛ wɔn no.”

23.verse: Ɛkaa ɔne n’asuafo no, ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Nhyira ne aniwa a ehu nea muhu!

24.verse: Efisɛ, adiyifo ne ahene pii pɛe sɛ anka wohu nea muhu yi, na wɔte nea mote yi, nanso, wɔanhu na wɔante.”

25.verse: Mmaranimfo bi asɛmmisa - Mmaranimfo bi pɛe sɛ ɔsɔ Yesu hwɛ enti obisaa no se, “Kyerɛkyerɛfo, menyɛ dɛn na manya nkwa a enni awiei?”

26.verse: Yesu nso bisaa no se, “Dɛn na wɔakyerɛw wɔ Mose mmara no mu? Na wote ase dɛn?”

27.verse: Obuaa no se, “Mmara no ka se, ‘Fa wo koma, ne wo kra, ne w’ahoɔden, ne w’adwene nyinaa dɔ Awurade wo Nyankopɔn, na dɔ wo yɔnko sɛ wo ho!”

28.verse: Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no se, “Woabua no yiye. Yɛ eyinom na wubenya nkwa.”

29.verse: Nanso ɔbarima no pɛe sɛ ɔkyerɛ sɛ odi mmara no nyinaa so nti, obisaa Yesu se, “Hena ne me yɔnko?”

30.verse: Samariani a ohuu mmɔbɔ no - Yesu nso maa no mfatoho bi se, “Da bi na ɔbarima bi retu kwan fi Yerusalem akɔ Yeriko. Na ɔnam kwan so no, ɔkɔtɔɔ akwanmukafo mu na wogyee ne ho nneɛma nyinaa, hwee no, pirapiraa no ma ɔtɔɔ berɛw, gyaw no too kwankyɛn kɔe.

31.verse: “Ankyɛ biara, Yudani sɔfo bi bepuee ne so nanso ɔman faa nkyɛn kɔe.

32.verse: Saa ara nso na Lewini bi nso bepuee ne so man faa nkyɛn.

33.verse: “Ankyɛ biara na Samariani bi nso bepuee hɔ. Ohuu no no, ɔyɛɛ no mmɔbɔ.

34.verse: Ɔkɔkotow ne nkyɛn, hohoroo n’apirakuru no anim, de aduru guguu mu, kyekyeree. Afei ɔmaa no so de no tenaa n’afurum so dii aboa no nkyɛn de no kɔɔ ahɔhobea bi hwɛɛ no anadwo mu no nyinaa.

35.verse: Ade kyee no, ogyaw ahɔhobea sohwɛfo no sika a ɛbɛso no hwɛ sɛ ɔmfa nhwɛ no. Ɔsan hyɛɛ no bɔ se, ‘Ɛka foforo biara a wobɛbɔ wɔ ne ho no, mɛba abetua.’

36.verse: “Afei saa nnipa baasa yi mu hena na ɔyɛɛ ne yɔnko?”

37.verse: Mmaranimfo no buae se, “Nea ohuu opirafo no mmɔbɔ no.” Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no se, “Wo nso, kɔ na kɔyɛ saa ara.”

38.verse: Marta ne Maria - Ɛbae sɛ Yesu ne n’asuafo rekɔ Yerusalem no, wɔkoduu akuraa bi ase. Woduu hɔ no, ɔbea bi a wɔfrɛ no Marta de no kɔɔ ne fi.

39.verse: Marta nuabea bi a wɔfrɛ no Maria tenaa fam wɔ Yesu nkyɛn tiee no.

40.verse: Saa bere no, Marta a n’ani abere reyɛ aduan no baa Yesu nkyɛn bɛka kyerɛɛ no se, “Awurade, mayɛ adwuma abrɛ enti ka kyerɛ Maria na ommeso me mu.”

41.verse: Awurade buaa no se, “Marta, Marta, wudwinnwen haw wo ho wɔ nneɛma pii ho.

42.verse: Ade baako pɛ na ehia; ɛno na Maria afa no; na wɔrennye mfi ne nsam.”

1.verse: Yesu kyerɛ mpaebɔ - Da bi na Yesu rebɔ mpae wɔ baabi. Owiei no, n’asuafo no mu baako ka kyerɛɛ no se, “Awurade, kyerɛ yɛn mpaebɔ sɛnea Yohane kyerɛɛ n’asuafo mpaebɔ no.”

2.verse: Ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Sɛ morebɔ mpae a, monka se, ‘Agya, wo din ho ntew. W’ahenni mmra.

3.verse: Ma yɛn yɛn ano aduan daa.

4.verse: Fa yɛn bɔne kyɛ yɛn sɛnea yɛn nso, yɛde wɔn a wɔfom yɛn no bɔne kyɛ wɔn no. Na nnyaa yɛn mma yɛnnkɔ sɔhwɛ mu.”

5.verse: Yesu bisaa wɔn se, “Mo mu hena na ɔbɛkɔ ne yɔnko hɔ dasum akɔka akyerɛ no se, ‘Me nua, fɛm me aduan kakra,

6.verse: efisɛ, ɔhɔho bi abefi me mu, na minni aduan biara a mede bɛma no,’

7.verse: na ɔbɛma no mmuae afi ne dan mu se, ‘Nhaw me! Mato me pon mu ne me mma ada. Merentumi nsɔre mma wo biribiara.’

8.verse: “Mereka akyerɛ mo se, na ade asa no nti, ɔyɛ ne yɔnko koraa mpo a, ɔrensɔre. Nanso esiane sɛ ɔkɔɔ so srɛɛ no no nti, ɛbɛma wasɔre ama no nea ehia no no nyinaa.

9.verse: ”Ɛno nti mereka akyerɛ mo se; Mommisa, na wɔbɛma mo; monhwehwɛ na mubehu; mompem na wobebue mo.

10.verse: Na obiara a obisa no, wɔma no; na obiara a ɔhwehwɛ no, ohu; na nea ɔpem no, wobue no.

11.verse: “Agya bɛn na ɔwɔ mo mu na ne ba bisa no abodoo a ɔbɛma no ɔbo,

12.verse: anaasɛ obisa no apataa a, ɔbɛma no ɔwɔ, anaasɛ obisa nkesua a ɔbɛma no ankaadweaa?

13.verse: Na sɛ mo a moyɛ nnebɔneyɛfo mpo nim sɛnea moma mo mma nnepa a, ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na mo Agya a ɔwɔ soro no remfa Honhom Kronkron no mma wɔn a wobisa no no!”

14.verse: Yesu ne Beelsebul - Bere bi Yesu tuu hohommɔne bi a ɛyɛ mumu fii onipa bi mu. Hohommɔne no tu fii ne mu no, ɔkasae ma ɛyɛɛ nnipa a na wɔwɔ hɔ no nyinaa ahodwiriw.

15.verse: Nanso ebinom kae se, “Ɔnam ahohommɔne panyin Beelsebul tumi so na etu ahohommɔne.”

16.verse: Afoforo nso pɛe sɛ wɔsɔ no hwɛ nti, wɔka kyerɛɛ no se, ɔnyɛ nsɛnkyerɛnne bi a efi soro nkyerɛ wɔn.

17.verse: Nanso ohuu wɔn adwene maa wɔn mmuae se, “Kurow biara a emu akyekyɛ no dan amamfo. Saa ara nso na ofi biara a emu kyekyɛ no gu.

18.verse: Na sɛ ɔbonsam nso ko tia ne ho a, ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na n’ahenni agyina? Nea enti a mereka saa asɛm yi ne sɛ, muse menam Beelsebul tumi so na mitu ahohommɔne.

19.verse: Na sɛ menam Beelsebul tumi so na mitu ahohommɔne a, hena so na mo nkurɔfo nam tu ahohommɔne? Saa na ɛte de a, mo nkurɔfo no ara na wobebu mo atɛn.

20.verse: Nanso sɛ menam Onyankopɔn tumi so na etu hohommɔne de a, na ɛkyerɛ sɛ Onyankopɔn Ahenni no aba mo so.

21.verse: Sɛ ɔhoɔdenfo de akode wɛn ne fi a, obiara rentumi nkowia n’agyapade;

22.verse: nanso sɛ nea ne ho yɛ den na ɔwɔ akode pa sen no kɔ ne so a, odi ne so nkonim, gye n’akode a ɔde ne ho too so no, sesaw n’agyapade no nyinaa kɔ.

23.verse: “Obiara a onni m’afa no tia me, na nea ɔne me mmoaboa ano no, hwete mu.

24.verse: “Sɛ wotu hohommɔne fi onipa bi mu a, ekyinkyin hwehwɛ homebea nanso ennya bi. Na sɛ wannya homebea a, ɔka se, ‘Mɛsan makɔ onipa a mifi ne mu bae no mu bio.’

25.verse: Na sɛ ɔsan kɔ onipa no mu a, obehu sɛ ɛhɔ tew a efi biara nni mu na biribiara yɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ.

26.verse: Afei ɔsan n’akyi kɔfa ahohommɔne afoforo ason a wɔyɛ den kyɛn no ba ma wɔn nyinaa bɛtena hɔ. Eyi ma onipa no sɛe koraa sen sɛnea anka na ɔte kan no.”

27.verse: Ade a ɛho hia - Yesu gu so rekasa no, ɔbea bi fi nnipakuw no mu kae se, “Nhyira nka yafunu a ɛwoo wo ne nufu a wunumuu ano!”

28.verse: Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no se, “Ɛwom de, nanso nhyira ne wɔn a wɔte Onyankopɔn asɛm na wodi so.”

29.verse: Yudafo bisa nsɛnkyerɛnne - Nnipa no kyeree Yesu so no, ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn se,”Nnɛɛmma yi yɛ nnebɔneyɛfo. Wɔhwehwɛ nsɛnkyerɛnne bi ahu nanso wɔrenhu nsɛnkyerɛnne biara sɛ Yona nsɛnkyerɛnne no.

30.verse: Na sɛnea Yona yɛe no yɛɛ nsɛnkyerɛnne maa Niniwefo a, saa ara na Kristo nso bɛyɛ nsɛnkyerɛnne ama nnɛɛmma yi.

31.verse: “Atemmuda no, Sheba hemmea ne nnɛɛmma bɛsɔre ayi ɔman yi atɛn, efisɛ, ofi asase ano nohoɔ betiee Salomo nyansa nsɛm. Nanso nea ɔsen Salomo no wɔ ha.

32.verse: “Atemmuda no, Niniwe mmarima ne nnɛɛmma bɛsɔre ayi ɔman yi atɛn, efisɛ, bere a Yona kaa asɛmpa no wɔsakraa wɔn adwene. Nanso nea ɔsen Yona wɔ ha.

33.verse: Kanea adwuma - “Obiara nsɔ kanea mfa nsie, na mmom, ɔde si petee mu na ahyerɛn ama wɔn a wɔba mu no nyinaa.

34.verse: W’ani yɛ wo nipadua kanea. Ɛno nti sɛ, w’ani ye a, na wo nipadua nso yɛ hann. Nanso sɛ enye a ɛma wo nipadua no dan sum tumm.

35.verse: Enti hwɛ yiye na hann a ɛwɔ wo mu no annan sum.

36.verse: Sɛ wo nipadua yɛ hann a esum nni fa baabiara a, nipadua no bɛhyerɛn sɛnea kanea hyerɛn gu wo so.”

37.verse: Farisini bi fi adidi - Yesu kasa wiei no, Farisini bi hyiaa no adidi enti ɔkɔe sɛ ɔne no rekodidi.

38.verse: Farisini no hui sɛ Yesu anhohoro ne nsa ansa sɛnea wɔn amanne kyerɛ ansa na ɔredidi no, ɛyɛɛ no nwonwa.

39.verse: Yesu huu Farisini no adwene ka kyerɛɛ no se, “Mo Farisifo de, mohohoro nkuku ne nsanka ho nanso efi, anibere ne nnebɔne ahyɛ mo mu ma tɔ.

40.verse: Adweneharefo! Ɛnyɛ nea ɔyɛɛ akyiri no ara na ɔyɛɛ emu nso?

41.verse: Monyɛ ahiafo adɔe na biribiara ho bɛtew ama mo.

42.verse: “Mo Farisifo, munnue! Moma mo nnɔbae so ntotoso du du nanso mototo adetreneeyɛ ne ɔdɔ a mode dɔ Onyankopɔn no ase. Sɛ mokɔ hyiadan mu a, mpanyin tenabea na mopɛ. Saa ara nso na sɛ mokɔ bagua mu a, mopɛ sɛ nnipa hu mo kyia mo.

43.verse: “Mo Farisifo, munnue! Sɛ mokɔ hyiadan mu a, mpanyin tenabea na mopɛ.

44.verse: Munnue! Efisɛ, mote sɛ adamoa a ɛso asram na nnipa nantew so a wonnim sɛ wɔnam adamoa so.”

45.verse: Mmaranimfo no mu baako ka kyerɛɛ no se, “Kyerɛkyerɛfo, sɛ woka saa a na woakasa atia yɛn nso.”

46.verse: Yesu buaa no se, “Mo mmaranimfo nso, munnue! Mohyɛ nnipa ma wodi mmara so pɛpɛɛpɛ nanso mo de, munni so sɛnea ɛsɛ.

47.verse: Munnue! Efisɛ, moatoto adiyifo a mo ankasa anaa mo agyanom kum wɔn no ada so.

48.verse: Mo nneyɛe yi di adanse sɛ mopene nea mo agyanom yɛe no so. N’asekyerɛ ne sɛ, mo agyanom kunkum adiyifo no na mo nso mototoo wɔn ada so maa wɔn.

49.verse: “Eyi ne nea Onyankopɔn aka afa mo ho: “Mɛsoma adiyifo ne asomafo aba mo nkyɛn na mobekunkum bi na moataa wɔn a aka no.’

50.verse: “Mereka akyerɛ mo se, adiyifo no mogya a wɔka gui fi wiase mfitiase no,

51.verse: efi Habel kum so kosi Sakaria a, wokum no wɔ afɔremuka ne kronkronbea ntam hɔ no so, wobebisa ɛho asɛm afi mo nkyɛn.

52.verse: “Mo, mmaranimfo, munnue! Mode nokware hintaw mo nkurɔfo. Mo ankasa munni so, na momma wɔn a wɔpɛ sɛ wodi so no kwan mma wonni so.”

53.verse: Ofi Farisini no fi hɔ a ɔrekɔ no, mmaranimfo ne Farisifo no dii n’akyi de nsɛmmisa guan ne ho

54.verse: pɛe sɛ ɔka biribi a wobegyina so anya no akyere no.

1.verse: Nyaatwomyɛ ho kɔkɔbɔ - Nnipa mpempem kyeree so a wonnya baabi ntu wɔn nan nsi mpo no, Yesu ka kyerɛɛ n’asuafo no kan se, “Monhwɛ mo ho so yiye wɔ Farisifo nyaatwom a etɛ sɛ mmɔkaw no ho.

2.verse: Biribiara a wɔyɛ no kokoam no bɛda adi na nea ahintaw no nso bepue.

3.verse: Enti nea moaka wɔ sum mu no, wɔbɛte wɔ hann mu. Na nea moaka no asomsɛm wɔ adan mu no, wɔbɛbɔ no dawuru.

4.verse: Onipa a munsuro no - “Me nnamfonom, mereka akyerɛ mo se, munnsuro wɔn a wokum nipadua na ɛno akyi wontumi nyɛ hwee bio no.

5.verse: Na mɛkyerɛ mo nea ɛsɛ sɛ musuro no. Munsuro nea wakum onipadua no awie no ɔwɔ tumi sɛ ɔtow kyene amanehunu kurom. Mereti mu akyerɛ mo se, oyi na munsuro no.

6.verse: “Wɔntɔn mmuruburu anum nnye sidi abien? Nanso Onyankopɔn werɛ remfi wɔn mu baako po da.

7.verse: Mo tinhwi mpo, wɔakan ne nyinaa. Enti munnsuro, efisɛ, mosom bo sen mmuruburu dodow biara.

8.verse: Kristo ne Honhom Kronkron - “Na mereka akyerɛ mo se, obiara a ɔbɛbɔ me din wɔ nnipa anim no, Kristo no nso bɛbɔ ne din wɔ Onyankopɔn abɔfo anim.

9.verse: Na nea ɔbɛpa me nnipa anim no, me nso mɛpa no, Onyankopɔn abɔfo anim.

10.verse: Obiara a ɔbɛkasa atia Kristo no, wɔde bɛkyɛ no. Nanso nea ɔbɛkasa atia Honhom Kronkron no de, wɔremfa nkyɛ no da.

11.verse: “Sɛ wɔde mo ba mpanyin anim wɔ hyia adan mu a, munnnwinnwen nsɛm a mobɛka anaasɛ nea mode beyi mo ho ano no ho,

12.verse: efisɛ, saa bere no ara mu Honhom Kronkron no bɛkyerɛ mo nea ɛsɛ sɛ moka.”

13.verse: Adifudepɛ ho kɔkɔbɔ - Obi fi nnipa no mu ka kyerɛɛ Yesu se, “Kyerɛkyerɛfo, ka kyerɛ me nua na ɔne me nkyɛ agyapade a yɛn agya de agyaw yɛn no mu.”

14.verse: Yesu buaa no se, “Damfo, hena na ɔyɛɛ me ɔtemmufo ne mo agyapadekyɛfo sɛ memmɛkyɛ mo agyapade mu mma mo?

15.verse: Ɔtoaa so se, “Monhwɛ mo ho yiye wɔ adifudepɛ ho, efisɛ, onipa nkwa nnyina n’ahonya dodow a ɔwɔ so.”

16.verse: Afei obuu wɔn bɛ yi se, “Ɔdefo bi wɔ hɔ a na ɔwɔ asase pa a ɛmaa no nnɔbae pii.

17.verse: Esiane sɛ na ne nnɔbae no nkɔ pata a wabɔ no so nti, ɛyɛɛ no dadwene ma obisaa ne ho se, ‘Minnya baabi a mede me nnɔbae bebrebe yi begu yi, menyɛ no dɛn?’

18.verse: Afei ɔkae se, ‘Minim nea mɛyɛ. Mebubu m’apata yi nyinaa na mabɔ no akɛse de nea mewɔ nyinaa asie hɔ.

19.verse: Na maka akyerɛ me kra se, ‘Ɔkra, ma w’ani nnye na didi, na nom efisɛ, wowɔ nneɛma pa pii a ɛbɛso wo mfe bebree!’

20.verse: “Nanso Onyankopɔn ka kyerɛɛ no se, ‘Ɔkwasea! Anadwo yi, wobegye wo kra afi wo nsam, na hena na nneɛma bebree a woapɛ agu hɔ yi, wode begyaw no?’

21.verse: “Ɛno nti, saa ara na obiara a ɔbɛboaboa agyapade ano de ne ho ato so no nyɛ ɔdefo Onyankopɔn anim ne no.”

22.verse: Fa wo ho to Onyankopɔn so - Yesu ka kyerɛɛ n’asuafo no se, “Munnnwinnwen mo kra ho sɛ dɛn na mubedi anaa mo nipadua ho sɛ dɛn na mubefura.

23.verse: Ɔkra som bo sen aduan na onipadua nso som bo sen ntama.

24.verse: Monhwɛ kwaakwaadabi, wonnua aba ɛnna wontwa. Saa ara nso na wonni pata a wɔde wɔn nnɔbae sie so, nanso Onyankopɔn ma wɔn aduan di. Monsom bo nsen wɔn anaa?

25.verse: “Munnnwinnwen mo nkwa ho. Mo mu hena na obetumi de da koro ato ne nna so?

26.verse: Na sɛ muntumi nyɛ ade ketewaa a ɛte sɛɛ mpo a, adɛn na mudwinnwen nneɛma akɛse ho?

27.verse: “Monhwɛ sɛnea sukooko nyin. Wɔnyɛ adwuma, ɛnna wɔnnwene ntama mfura. Nanso Salomo ahonya nyinaa mu, na onni ntama a ɛyɛ fɛ sɛ saa nhwiren no mu baako mpo.

28.verse: Mo a mo gyidi hinhim, sɛ Onyankopɔn siesie wuram nhwiren a efifi nnɛ na ɔkyena awu no ho ma ɛyɛ fɛ a, adɛn nti na ɔrensiesie mo nso mo ho mma ɛnyɛ fɛ.

29.verse: Saa ara nso na munnnwinnwen nea mubedi anaa nea mobɛnom ho.

30.verse: Saa nneɛma yi na wiase amanaman pere hwehwɛ nanso mo de, mo agya nim sɛ eyinom nyinaa ho hia mo.

31.verse: Enti monhwehwɛ Onyankopɔn Ahenni kan na ɔde eyinom nyinaa bɛma mo.

32.verse: “Ekuw ketewaa, munnsuro, efisɛ, ɛyɛ mo agya no pɛ sɛ ɔde ahenni no bɛma mo.

33.verse: Montontɔn mo ahode na monkyɛ ahiafo ade. Eyi bɛma mo agyapade a ɛwɔ soro no ayɛ pii. Monhyehyɛ mo agyapade wɔ soro, nea owifo ntumi nkowia na mfɔte ntumi nkɔwe.

34.verse: Na nea wo agyapade wɔ no, ɛhɔ na wo koma nso wɔ.

35.verse: Monwɛn - Munnyina pintinn na momma mo akanea nhyerɛn,

36.verse: na monyɛ sɛ wɔn a wɔretwɛn wɔn wura a ɔkɔ ayeforohyia ase a, sɛ ɔba na ɔbɔ pon mu pɛ a, wobebue no ntɛm no.

37.verse: Wɔn a wɔn wura no ba a ɔbɛba abɛto wɔn sɛ wɔretwɛn no no ani begye. Ɔbɛtow wɔn pon na ɔno ankasa asom wɔn.

38.verse: Sɛ ɔba dasum anaa ahemanakye mpo a, asomfo a ɔbɛba abɛto wɔn sɛ wɔrewɛn no no, ani begye.

39.verse: “Ɛsɛ sɛ muhu sɛ, sɛ ofiwura nim bere a owifo bɛba a, anka ɔbɛwɛn na owifo no annya ne ho kwan ammɛbɔ no korɔn.

40.verse: Enti munsiesie mo ho ntwɛn Onipa Ba no ba a ɔbɛba no, efisɛ, munnim bere ko a ɔbɛba.”

41.verse: Petro bisaa Yesu se, “Awurade, worebu bɛ yi akyerɛ yɛn nko ara anaasɛ obiara?”

42.verse: Yesu buaa no se, “Merekasa akyerɛ ɔsomfo nokwafo nyansafo biara a ne wura de ne fi sohwɛ bɛhyɛ ne nsa na wahwɛ ama obiara aduan wɔ ne bere mu.

43.verse: Nhyira ne ɔsomfo a ne wura no bɛba abɛto no sɛ wayɛ n’adwuma pɛpɛɛpɛ.

44.verse: Nokwarem, ɔde n’agyapade nyinaa bɛhyɛ ne nsa.

45.verse: “Na sɛ ɛba sɛ saa ɔsomfo yi nso ka se, ‘Me wura nnya mmae’ na ɛno nti, ɔhwe asomfo a aka no, na odidi, nom nsa bow a,

46.verse: ne wura no bɛba da a n’ani nna so sɛ ɔbɛba. Na sɛ ne wura no ba a, ɔbɛtwe n’aso dennen na wabu no sɛ obi a onnye Onyankopɔn nni.

47.verse: Ɔsomfo a onim nea ne wura pɛ na wanyɛ ne wura no apɛde no wɔbɛbɔ no mmaa pii.

48.verse: “Na ɔsomfo a onnim nea ne wura pɛ na enti ɔyɛɛ nea ne wura mpɛ no, wɔbɛbɔ no mmaa kakraa bi. Na obiara a wɔama no pii no, wobebisa pii afi ne nkyɛn; na nea wɔde bebree ahyɛ ne nsa no, obebu bebree ho nkontaa.

49.verse: Mpaapaemu - “Maba sɛ merebɛsɔ ogya wɔ asase so na sɛ asɔ dedaw a, na nea merehwehwɛ ara ne no.

50.verse: Asubɔ bi wɔ hɔ a wɔde bɛbɔ me a, ɛde me bɛkɔ amanehunu mu, na merennya ahotɔ gye sɛ wɔabɔ me saa asu no ansa.

51.verse: “Mususuw sɛ mebae sɛ mede asomdwoe reba asase yi so? Dabi! Ɛnyɛ asomdwoe na mede bae na mmom mpaapaemu.

52.verse: Efi nnɛ, mpaapaemu bɛba afi mu, baasa bɛba m’afa na baanu atia me anaasɛ baanu bɛba m’afa na baasa atia me.

53.verse: Agya ne ne babarima renyɛ adwene, ɛna ne ne babea renyɛ adwene, ase ne ase adwene renhyia.”

54.verse: Na ɔka kyerɛɛ nnipakuw no nso se, “Sɛ muhu sɛ osu amuna wɔ atɔe a, ntɛm ara, moka se, ‘Osu bɛtɔ’! Na osu tɔ ampa.

55.verse: “Saa ara nso na sɛ muhu sɛ mframa bɔ fi anafo reba a, moka se, ‘Ahohuru bɛba!’ Na ɛba mu ampa.

56.verse: Mo nyaatwomfo! Mutumi kyerɛ wim nsakrae ase, nanso nneɛma a ɛnnɛ yi atwa mo ho ahyia, ne nea ɛbɔ mo kɔkɔ no de, munhu.

57.verse: Adɛn nti na munim nea eye na monyɛ?

58.verse: “Sɛ wode obi ka a, bɔ mmɔden kohu no na wone no nka ho asɛm na wamfa wo ankɔ asennii amma ɔtemmufo amfa wo anto afiase.

59.verse: Sɛ woanyɛ no saa a, ɔbɛma woatua ka a wode no no nyinaa ansa na wagyaa wo.”

1.verse: Ɔsoro kwan no yɛ hihiaa - Saa bere no ara mu, nnipa bi bɛka kyerɛɛ Yesu se, Pilato akum Galileafo bi a wɔrebɔ afɔre ama Onyankopɔn maa wɔn mogya fraa afɔrebɔ no.

2.verse: Yesu buaa wɔn se, “Mugye di sɛ saa Galileafo no yɛ nnebɔneyɛfo sen wɔn a aka no nyinaa nti na wokum wɔn no?

3.verse: Dabida, sɛ mo nso moansakra mo adwene a, wobekum mo saa ara.

4.verse: “Anaasɛ mususuw sɛ nnipa dunwɔtwe a Siloa abantenten no bu guu wɔn so, kum wɔn no yɛ nnebɔneyɛfo sen nnipa a na wɔte Yerusalem no?

5.verse: Dabida, mo nso moansakra a, mubewuwu saa ara.”

6.verse: Afei, Yesu buu wɔn bɛ yi se, “Ɔbarima bi duaa akutu wɔ ne turo mu. Da bi ɔkɔɔ turo no mu hɔ sɛ ɔrekɔtew ɛso aba no bi nanso wannya bi.

7.verse: Ɛno akyi, ɔfrɛɛ turo no so hwɛfo no ka kyerɛɛ no se, ‘Mfe abiɛsa ni, bere biara a mɛba sɛ merebɛtew akutu no bi no, minnya bi. Adɛn nti na ɛresɛe kwa yi? Twa kyene.’

8.verse: “Turo no so hwɛfo no srɛɛ no sɛ, ‘Me wura, ma ensi hɔ afe yi nso na mingugu ase sumina nhwɛ

9.verse: sɛ ebia, ɛbɛsow aba bi anaa, na sɛ antumi ansow a, ɛnne metwa akyene.’”

10.verse: Yesu sa yare homeda - Homeda bi a Yesu rekyerɛkyerɛ wɔ hyiadan mu no,

11.verse: na ɔbea bi wɔ hɔ a hohommɔne mu yare bi akyere no mfe dunwɔtwe ama ne mu akoa a ontumi nteɛ ne mu koraa.

12.verse: Yesu huu no no, ɔfrɛɛ no fii nnipa no mu ka kyerɛɛ no se, “Ɔbea, wo ho nyɛ wo dɛn.”

13.verse: Ɔde ne nsa guu no so, na amonom hɔ ara otumi teɛɛ ne mu. Na ɔbea no yii Onyankopɔn ayɛ.

14.verse: Hyiadan no so panyin a ohuu ɔbea no ayaresa no de abufuw kae se, “Nnansia na ɛsɛ sɛ mode yɛ adwuma a saa nna no mu na ɛsɛ sɛ moba na wɔsa mo yare na ɛnyɛ homeda.”

15.verse: Na Awurade buaa no se, “Nyaatwomfo! Mo mu hena na ɔnsan ne nantwi anaa n’afurum na ɔnka no nkɔnom nsu homeda?

16.verse: Adɛn nti na Abraham aseni yi a ɔbonsam afa no dommum mfe dunwɔtwe ni no ɛnsɛ sɛ mesa no yare homeda?“

17.verse: Ɔkaa saa no, wɔn a na wɔne n’adwene nhyia no nyinaa ani wui. Nnipa no nso a na wɔwɔ hyiadan no mu nyinaa ani gyei n’anwonnwade ahorow a ɔyɛe no nyinaa ho.

18.verse: Onyaa aba ne mmɔkaw ho bɛ - Afei Yesu fitii ase kyerɛkyerɛɛ wɔn Onyankopɔn Ahenni no ho asɛm, na obisaa wɔn se, “Onyankopɔn Ahenni no te dɛn? Na dɛn na memfa nto ho nkyerɛkyerɛ ase?

19.verse: Onyankopɔn Ahenni no te sɛ onyaa aba ketewaa bi a obi dua wɔ n’afuw mu na enyin yɛ dutan kɛse ma nnomaa kɔnwene wɔn birebuw wɔ so.”

20.verse: Obisaa bio se, “Dɛn bio na memfa ntoto ho nkyerɛ ase?

21.verse: Ɛte sɛ mmɔkaw bi a abodootofo de fɔtɔw mmɔre ma etu.”

22.verse: Ɔpon teɛteaa no - Bere a Yesu rekɔ Yerusalem no, ɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ wɔ nkurow so ne nkuraa ase ansa na ɔredu hɔ.

23.verse: Ne nkyerɛkyerɛ no mu obi bisaa no se, “Awurade, nnipa kakraa bi na wobegye wɔn nkwa anaa?”

24.verse: Obuaa no se, “Mompere nhyɛn ɔpon teɛteaa no mu, efisɛ, nnipa pii bɛpere sɛ wobewura mu nanso wɔrentumi.

25.verse: Sɛ ɛba sɛ ofiwura no ato ɔpon no mu a, mobɛba abegyina akyi abɔ mu, aka se, ‘Owura, yɛsrɛ wo, bue yɛn.’ Na ɔno nso abisa mo se, ‘Mufi he? Minnim mo?’

26.verse: “Na mo nso moaka akyerɛ no se, ‘Yɛne wo too nsa didii na wokyerɛkyerɛɛ wɔ yɛn mmorɔn so.’

27.verse: “Na ofiwura no nso bebisa mo bio se, ‘Mufi he? Minnim mo. Mumfi m’ani so nkɔ, mo nnebɔneyɛfo!’

28.verse: “Na sɛ muhu Abraham, Isak, Yakob ne nkɔmhyɛfo no nyinaa sɛ wɔwɔ Onyankopɔn Ahenni no mu na muntumi nkɔ hɔ bi a, mode mo nsa begu mo ti atwa agyaadwo.

29.verse: Nnipa fi wiase afanan nyinaa behyia wɔ Onyankopɔn Ahenni no mu hɔ ato nsa adidi.

30.verse: Na monkae sɛ akyikafo bi wɔ hɔ a, wobedi kan, na adikanfo bi nso wɔ hɔ a, wɔbɛka akyiri.”

31.verse: Yesu twa Yerusalem ho agyaadwo - Saa bere no ara mu Farisifo bi baa Yesu nkyɛn bɛka kyerɛɛ no se, “Fi ha kɔ, efisɛ, Herode rehwehwɛ wo akum wo.”

32.verse: Yesu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Monkɔka nkyerɛ sakraman no se, metu ahohommɔne, na masa nyarewa ɛnnɛ ne ɔkyena na ne nnansa so no, medu Yerusalem.

33.verse: Nanso ɛsɛ sɛ menantew ɛnnɛ ne ɔkyena ne n’adekyee na etwa ara na etwa sɛ odiyifo bewu wɔ Yerusalem!

34.verse: “Yerusalem, Yerusalem, wo a wukum adiyifo na wusiw wɔn a wɔsomaa wɔn wo nkyɛn no abo! Mpɛn ahe ni a mepɛe sɛ meboaboa wo mma ano sɛ akokɔbeatan boaboa ne mma ano ne ntaban ase, nanso moampene so.

35.verse: Na mo afi bɛdan afituw na morenhu me kosi sɛ mobɛka se, “Nhyira ne nea ɔnam Awurade din mu reba no!”

1.verse: Yesu sa yare homeda - Homeda bi, Farisini panyin bi too nsa frɛɛ Yesu adidi. Adidi no ase hɔ no, na wɔn a wɔahyia no nyinaa rehwɛ nea Yesu bɛyɛ.

2.verse: Na ɔbarima bi wɔ hɔ a ɔyare ahonhon.

3.verse: Yesu bisaa Farisifo no ne mmaranimfo a na wɔwɔ hɔ no se, “Mmara ma ho kwan sɛ wɔsa yare homeda anaa?”

4.verse: Wɔammua no. Enti Yesu soo ɔyarefo no mu saa no yare, gyaa no kwan.

5.verse: Yesu bisaa wɔn a wɔahyia hɔ no nyinaa se, “Mo mu hena na sɛ n’afurum tɔ abura mu homeda a ɔrennyi no da no ara?”

6.verse: Nanso wɔatumi ammua no.

7.verse: Afei Yesu hui sɛ, nnipa a wɔfrɛɛ wɔn adidi no ase no mu biara pɛe sɛ ɔtena mpanyin tenabea no, obuu wɔn bɛ bi se,

8.verse: “Sɛ obi to nsa frɛ wo apontow ase a, mpere wo ho nkɔtena mpanyin tenabea, efisɛ, ebia na wato nsa afrɛ onipa titiriw bi a ɔsen wo.

9.verse: Sɛ ɛba saa a, nea ɔtoo nsa frɛɛ wo no betu wo afi agua a wote so no so de ama nea ɔsen wo no na wode aniwu akɔtena akyiri baabi.

10.verse: ”Enti sɛ obi hyia wo apontow ase a, kɔtena akyiri baabi na sɛ nea ohyiaa wo no behu wo a, waka akyerɛ wo se, ‘Onua, sɔre na kɔtena mpanyin tenabea.’ Ɛno bɛma woanya anuonyam wɔ nnipa a wɔahyia hɔ no nyinaa anim.

11.verse: Na obiara a ɔma ne ho so no, wɔbɛbrɛ no ase, na nea ɔbrɛ ne ho ase no, wɔbɛma no so.”

12.verse: Afei Yesu ka kyerɛɛ Farisini a ɔtoo nsa frɛɛ no no se, “Sɛ wotow pon a mfrɛ wo nnamfo, wo nuanom, w’abusuafo ne asikafo a wo ne wɔn bɔ fipam nko ara; sɛ woyɛ saa a, wɔn nso bɛto nsa afrɛ wo bi na ɛba saa a, na wonyɛɛ hwee.

13.verse: Na sɛ wotow pon a, hyia ahiafo, mmubuafo, mpakye ne anifuraefo.

14.verse: Esiane sɛ wontumi nyɛ saa bi mma wo no nti, ɛda a atreneefo bɛsɔre afi awufo mu no, Onyankopɔn behyira wo.”

15.verse: Apontow kɛse bi ho bɛ - Wɔn a wɔte adidii no mu baako tee nea Yesu kae no, ɔkae se, “Nhyira ne nea obedidi wɔ Onyankopɔn Ahenni no mu.”

16.verse: Yesu buaa no se, “Da bi ɔbarima bi tow pon kɛse hyiaa nnipa bebree.

17.verse: Bere soe no, ɔsomaa ne somfo bi sɛ ɔnkɔfrɛ wɔn a wɔahyia wɔn no sɛ wɔmmra.

18.verse: Nanso wɔn nyinaa yiyii wɔn ho wɔn ho ano. Nea odi kan no yii ne ho ano se, ‘Matɔ asase a ɛnnɛ na ɛsɛ sɛ mekɔhwɛ enti mesrɛ no sɛ merentumi mma.’

19.verse: Na ɔfoforo nso yii ne ho ano se, ‘Matɔ anantwi du a mede wɔn bɛyɛ m’afuw a ɛnnɛ na ɛsɛ sɛ mekɔsɔ wɔn hwɛ enti mesrɛ no sɛ merentumi mma.’
