20.verse: Ɔfoforo bi nso yii ne ho ano se, ‘Afei na maware, enti merentumi mma.’

21.verse: ”Ɔsomfo no san bɛbɔɔ ne wura no amanneɛ no, ɔde abufuw somaa no bio se, ‘Ka wo ho kɔ mmɔnten so ne mmantam na kɔfrɛfrɛ ahiafo, mmubuafo, anifuraefo ne mpakye se wɔmmra.’

22.verse: Ɔsomfo no kɔfrɛfrɛɛ nnipa no bae, nanso na afa da so wɔ hɔ ara.

23.verse: “Ɛno nti, owura no san somaa no se, ‘Kɔ akwan so ne mfikyiri na frɛ obiara a wubehu no no se, matow pon, enti wɔmmra.

24.verse: Na merema woate ase sɛ, nnipa a metoo nsa hyiaa wɔn no mu biara nni hɔ a m’aduan yi bi bɛka n’ano da biara da.’”

25.verse: Yesu akyidi - Da bi a na nkurɔfo akuwakuw bi di Yesu akyi no, ɔdan ne ho ka kyerɛɛ wɔn se,

26.verse: “Sɛ obi pɛ sɛ odi m’akyi a, ɛsɛ sɛ ɔdɔ me sen n’awofo, ne yere, ne mma, ne nuanom ne n’ankasa ho, anyɛ saa a, ɔrentumi nyɛ me suani.

27.verse: Obiara a odi m’akyi na ontumi nnyina amanehunu ano no, rentumi nyɛ me suani.

28.verse: “Mo mu hena na ɔpɛ sɛ osi aban a ɔrentena ase nsese nhwɛ sɛ ɔwɔ sika a ɔde bewie?

29.verse: Anyɛ saa na ɔhyɛ ɔdan no ase na wantumi anwie a, wɔn a wohu no nyinaa bɛserew no,

30.verse: aka se, ‘Onipa yi fitii ase sɛ ɔresi dan, nanso wantumi anwie’.

31.verse: Anaasɛ ɔhene bɛn na okita asraafo ɔpedu na ɔrekohyia ɔsahene foforo a okita asraafo ɔpeduonu a, ɔrenkari ne ho nhwɛ ansa na wakɔ akono?

32.verse: Na sɛ ɔhwɛ na ɔrentumi nso a, ansa koraa na ɔsahene foforo no bɛbɛn no no, otu abɔfo kohu no, srɛ no sɛ, ɔmma wonsiesie wɔn ntam na asomdwoe mmra.

33.verse: “Ɛno nti, obiara a wampa ne ho akyi no rentumi nyɛ me suani.

34.verse: “Nkyene yɛ dɛ. Na sɛ ɛyera ne dɛ a, ɔkwan bɛn so na wɔbɛfa ama ayɛ dɛ bio?

35.verse: Ɛho nni mfaso ma biribiara. Wɔbɛtow agu. Nea ɔwɔ aso a obetie no, ontie.’“

1.verse: Oguan a ɔyerae no - Da bi towgyefo ne nnebɔneyɛfo pii baa Yesu nkyɛn betiee no.

2.verse: Farisifo ne mmara no akyerɛkyerɛfo no huu eyi no, wonwiinwii kae se, “Saa ɔbarima yi gye nnebɔneyɛfo san ne wɔn to nsa didi.”

3.verse: Saa asɛm a wɔkae no ma obuu wɔn bɛ bi se,

4.verse: “Mo mu hena na sɛ ɔwɔ nguan ɔha na wɔn mu baako yera a, ɔrennyaw aduɔkron akron no hɔ nkokyinkyin sare so nhwehwɛ nea wayera no kosi sɛ obehu no?

5.verse: Na sɛ ohu no a, ɔde no abɔ ne kɔn ho, de anigye de no aba.

6.verse: Na sɛ odu fie a, wafrɛfrɛ ne nnamfo ne n’afipamfo nyinaa aka akyerɛ wɔn se, ‘Momma yennye yɛn ani, efisɛ, mahu me guan a ɔyerae no.

7.verse: “Saa ara nso na sɛ ɔdebɔneyɛfo baako sakra n’adwene a, ɔsorofo nyinaa ani gye sen sɛ atreneefo aduɔkron akron wɔ hɔ a adwensakra ho nhia wɔn no’.

8.verse: “Anaasɛ ɔbea bɛn na sɛ ne sika mpɔw du mu baako yera a, ɔrensɔ kanea, mprapra ne dan mu, nhwehwɛ kosi sɛ obehu?

9.verse: Na sɛ ohu a, ɔremfrɛfrɛ ne nnamfo ne n’afipamfo nyinaa nka nkyerɛ wɔn se, ‘Momma yɛn ani nnye, efisɛ, mahu me sika mpɔw a ɛyerae no?’

10.verse: Saa ara nso na sɛ ɔdebɔneyɛfo baako sakra n’adwene a, Onyankopɔn abɔfo ani gye ara ne no.”

11.verse: Ɔyera ba - Yesu san buu wɔn ɔyera ho bɛ bi se, “Ɔbarima bi wɔ hɔ a na ɔwɔ mmabarima baanu.

12.verse: Wɔn mu akumaa no ka kyerɛɛ n’agya se, ‘M’agya, fa me kyɛfa a mewɔ wɔ w’agyapade mu no ma me!’ Ɔbarima no kyɛɛ n’agyapade mu de ne ba no kyɛfa maa no.

13.verse: “Nna tiaa bi akyi no, ne ba kumaa yi boaboaa n’ahode nyinaa ano tuu kwan kɔɔ akyirikyiri asase bi so kɔbɔɔ ahohwi, hweree n’ahode nyinaa.

14.verse: Ɛno akyi no, ɔkɔm kɛse bi baa asase no so maa ne ho kyeree no.

15.verse: Ɛbaa saa no, ɔde ne ho kɔdan kuromani bi a, ɔma ɔkɔhwɛɛ ne mprako so.

16.verse: Ɔwɔ hɔ no, ɔkɔm dee no maa ne kɔn dɔe sɛ anka obenya aduan a mprako no di no bi mpo adi, nanso, wannya.

17.verse: “N’ani baa ne ho so no, ɔkae se, ‘Apaafo a wɔwɔ m’agya fi didi, mee ma ebi ka ma wɔtow gu. Adɛn na mete ha na ɔkɔm rekum me yi!

18.verse: Mɛsɔre makɔ m’agya nkyɛn na maka makyerɛ no se, ‘Agya, mayɛ ɔsoro ne wo bɔne,

19.verse: na memfata sɛ wɔfrɛ me wo ba bio; fa me yɛ w’apaafo no mu baako.’

20.verse: “Osiim sɛ ɔresan aba n’agya nkyɛn. Ɔnam kwan so akyirikyiri reba no, n’agya no huu no, enti ɔde ayamhyehye yɛɛ ntɛm kohyiaa no, bam no, yɛɛ no atuu.

21.verse: “Aberante yi ka kyerɛɛ n’agya no se, ‘Agya, mayɛ ɔsoro ne wo bɔne, na memfata sɛ wofrɛ me wo ba bio.’

22.verse: “N’ano ansi koraa na n’agya no frɛɛ n’asomfo ka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, ‘Monka mo ho nkɔfa ntama pa mmefura no na monhyɛ no pɛtea ne mpaboa a ɛyɛ fɛ.

23.verse: Afei munkokum nantwi ba a wadɔ srade no mfa nyɛ aduan, na yennidi, nnom, nnye yɛn ani,

24.verse: efisɛ, na misusuw sɛ meba yi awu, sɛ nso na ɔte ase; ɔyerae, nanso wasan aba.’ Wofitii ase gyee wɔn ani.

25.verse: “Ne ba panyin a na ofi afum reba no duu afikyiri no, ɔtee nnwonto ne ahurusidi wɔ fie hɔ.

26.verse: Ɛno nti ɔfrɛɛ asomfo no mu baako bisaa no nea ɛrekɔ so wɔ fie hɔ.

27.verse: Ɔsomfo no ka kyerɛɛ no se, ‘Wo nua no asan aba a biribiara anyɛ no enti, w’agya akum nantwi ba a wadɔ srade no ama no.’

28.verse: “Ɔtee saa asɛm yi no, ne bo fuwii enti ɔyɛɛ n’adwene sɛ ɔrenkɔ fie hɔ. N’agya tee saa asɛm yi no, ofii adi baa ne nkyɛn bɛkorɔkorɔɔ no.

29.verse: Ne ba no de awerɛhow buaa no se, ‘M’agya, masom wo mfe dodow yi nyinaa a nea wobɛka biara mitie, nanso wommaa me oguan ba mpo da sɛ minkum na me ne me nnamfonom mfa nnye yɛn ani.

30.verse: Nanso wo ba a ɔkɔbɔɔ ahwohwi no bae yi de, woakum nantwi ba a wadɔ srade no ama no.’

31.verse: “N’agya buaa no se, ‘Me ba, me ne wo na ɛte ha.Biribiara a mewɔ nso, yɛ wo dea.

32.verse: Ɛsɛ sɛ yegye yɛn ani, efisɛ, na misusuw sɛ wo nua yi awu, sɛ nso na ɔte ase; ɔyerae, nanso wasan aba.’“

1.verse: Ofisohwɛfo okontomponi no - Yesu ka kyerɛɛ n’asuafo no se, “Ɔdefo bi wɔ hɔ a na ɔwɔ ofisohwɛfo bi. Ɔdefo yi tetee sɛ ne fisohwɛfo no resɛe ne nneɛma.

2.verse: “Ɔtee saa asɛm yi no, ɔfrɛɛ ne fisohwɛfo no ka kyerɛɛ no se, ‘Ɛdɛn na mete fa wo ho yi? Bebu w’adwuma ho nkontaa kyerɛ me na merentumi ne wo nyɛ adwuma bio.

3.verse: “Ofi sohwɛfo no kae wɔ ne tirim se, ‘Menyɛ dɛn ni? Ɛnnɛ a wɔrepam me afi fie ha yi, ɛhe na mɛfa? Minni ahoɔden a mede bɛdɔw, ɛnna mefɛre nso sɛ mɛsrɛsrɛ ade.

4.verse: Minim nea mɛyɛ a ɛbɛma wɔn a wɔdede me wura aka no behu me mmɔbɔ.’

5.verse: “Enti ɔfrɛfrɛɛ wɔn a wɔdede ne wura aka no mmaako mmaako. Obisaa nea odi kan no se, ‘Ɛka ahe na wode me wura?’

6.verse: Obuae se, ‘Mede ngo nhina aduonu ka.’ Enti ɔka kyerɛɛ no se, ‘Yɛ ntɛm tena ase na twam na kyerɛw se, wode ngo nhina du ka.’

7.verse: “Ɛno akyi no ɔfrɛɛ ɔfoforo bi nso bisaa no se, ‘Na wo nso, ɛka ahe na wode me wura?’ Ɔno nso buae se, ‘Mede aburow nkotoku ɔha ka’. Enti ɔka kyerɛɛ no se, ‘Tena ase na twam na kyerɛw se, wode nkotoku aduonum ka!’

8.verse: “Ɔdefo no huu nea ofisohwɛfo no yɛɛ no akyi, nanso ɔnam fɛwdi so kamfoo no wɔ ne nnaadaa ne n’anifere no ho. Saa ara nso na wiase yi mma susuw sɛ wonim nyansa sen wɔn a wɔyɛ Onyankopɔn akyidifo no.

9.verse: Menka mfa nhyɛ mo nkuran sɛ momfa nsisi kwan so mfa nnamfo anaa? Mugye di sɛ eyi bɛma mo akɔ daa homebea hɔ anaa? Dabida.

10.verse: Nea odi nokware wɔ kakraa bi ho no bedi nokware wɔ pii ho; na nea onni nokware wɔ kakraa bi ho no, rentumi nni nokware wɔ pii ho.

11.verse: Sɛ moantumi anni nokware wɔ wiase nneɛma ho a, hena na ɔde ɔsoro nnepa bɛhyɛ mo nsa?

12.verse: Sɛ moanni nokware wɔ obi ade bi a wɔde ahyɛ mo nsa no ho a, ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na wɔde nea ɛsɛ sɛ ɛyɛ mo dea no bɛma mo?

13.verse: “Ɔsomfo biara rentumi nsom awuranom baanu, efisɛ, ɔyɛ saa a, ɔbɛdɔ ɔbaako na watan ɔbaako anaasɛ, ɔbɛsom ɔbaako yiye na wabu ɔbaako animtia. Morentumi nsom Onyankopɔn ne ahonyade.”

14.verse: Farisifo sikaniberefo no tee nea Yesu kae no, wodii ne ho fɛw.

15.verse: Yesu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Moyɛ nnipa a mubu mo ho atreneefo wɔ nnipa anim nanso Onyankopɔn nim mo koma mu. Na nea ɛsom bo wɔ nnipa ani so no yɛ akyide wɔ Onyankopɔn anim.

16.verse: Ansa na Yohane Osuboni bɛba no, na Mose mmara ne adiyifo no nsɛm no na mudi so. Na Yohane Osubɔni bae no, ɔbɛkaa Onyankopon Ahenni ho nsɛm kyerɛɛ mo, nti, nnipa da so pere sɛ wɔbɛkɔ saa Ahenni no mu.

17.verse: Ɛnyɛ den sɛ ɔsoro ne asase betwam sen sɛ mmara no mu nsensan ketewa baako mpo bɛyera.

18.verse: “Obiara a ogyaa ne yere aware na ɔware ɔfoforo no bɔ aguaman; na nea ɔware ɔbea biara a ne kunu agyaa no no nso, bɔ aguaman.”

19.verse: Ɔdefo bi ne Lasaro - Yesu toaa so kae se, “Ɔdefo bi tenaa ase a na daa ofura ntama pa na ogye n’ani yiye nso.

20.verse: Na ɔbarima hiani bi a akuru atutu no a wɔfrɛ no Lasaro no nso da n’aboboano.

21.verse: Ɔbarima yi kɔn dɔe sɛ anka obenya aduan a ɔdefo no adi ama aka no bi adi. Saa bere koro no ara mu na akraman ba baabi a na ohiani no da hɔ no bɛtaforotaforo n’akuru no mu.

22.verse: Ohiani no wui maa abɔfo bɛfaa no kɔtenaa Abraham nkyɛn. Ɔdefo no nso wui ma wosiee no.

23.verse: Ɔdefo no wɔ asaman a ne ho yeraw no no, ɔmaa n’ani so huu Lasaro sɛ ɔte Abraham nkyɛn.

24.verse: “Ɔdefo no teɛɛm se, ‘Agya Abraham, mesrɛ wo, hu me mmɔbɔ na soma Lasaro na ɔmfa ne nsateaa ano nkɔbɔ nsu mu mfa mmɛsɔ me tɛkrɛma so na me ho yeraw me.’

25.verse: “Abraham buaa no se, ‘Me ba, kae sɛ wote wiase no, wudii dɛ na Lasaro dii yaw; nanso afei na ɔredi dɛ ɛnna wo nso woredi yaw.

26.verse: Ɛnyɛ eyi nko, obon kɛse da yɛn ne mo ntam a ɛno nti, wɔn a wɔpɛ sɛ wofi ha ba mo nkyɛn hɔ ne wɔn a wɔpɛ sɛ wofi mo nkyɛn hɔ ba ha no nso rentumi mma.’

27.verse: “Ɔdefo no san ka kyerɛɛ Abraham se, ‘Agya, mesrɛ wo, soma Lasaro kɔ m’agya fi,

28.verse: efisɛ, mewɔ nnuammarimanom baanum. Ma ɔnkɔbɔ wɔn kɔkɔ sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wɔn mu biara remma saa ahoyeraw yi mu bi.’

29.verse: “Abraham buaa no se, ‘Wɔwɔ nsɛm a Onyankopɔn nam Mose ne adiyifo no so aka enti ma wontie na wonni so.’

30.verse: “Ɔdefo yi kaa bio se, ‘Agya Abraham, nea woreka yi wom de, nanso sɛ obi fi asaman ha kɔbɔ wɔn kɔkɔ de a, wɔbɛsakra wɔn adwene.’

31.verse: “Abraham buae se, ‘Sɛ wɔantie nea Onyankopɔn nam Mose ne adiyifo no so aka no a, saa ara nso na sɛ obi fi asaman ha kɔkasa kyerɛ wɔn a, wɔrentie no ara ne no.’”

1.verse: Bɔne, gyidi ne asɛde - Da bi Yesu ka kyerɛɛ n’asuafo no se, “Ɛyɛ dɛn ara a sɔhwɛ a ɛde onipa kɔ bɔne mu no bɛba, nanso onipa a ɛnam no so bɛba no, onnue.

2.verse: Eye ma saa onipa no sɛ wɔde ɔbo a emu yɛ duru bi bɛsɛn ne kɔn mu atow no akyene po mu sen sɛ ɔbɛto nkumaa yi mu baako hintidua ama wayɛ bɔne.

3.verse: Enti monhwɛ mo ho so yiye. Sɛ wo nua fom wo a, ka n’anim na sɛ onu ne ho a, fa ne bɔne kyɛ no.

4.verse: Sɛ nso ɔfom wo mpɛn ason da koro na mpɛn dodow a ɔfom wo no nyinaa, ɔde ahonu srɛ wo a, fa kyɛ no.”

5.verse: Da bi, asomafo no ka kyerɛɛ Yesu se, “Awurade, hyɛ yɛn gyidi mu den.”

6.verse: Yesu buaa wɔn se, “Sɛ mowɔ gyidi te sɛ onyaa aba a, anka mubetumi aka akyerɛ ankye yi se, ‘Tutu kogu po mu,’ na ɛbɛba mu saa.

7.verse: Mo mu hena na ɔwɔ ɔsomfo a ɔyɛ n’afum adwuma anaasɛ ɔhwɛ ne mmoa na ofi afum ba a, ɔbɛka akyerɛ no se, ‘W’aduan si hɔ na kodidi?’

8.verse: Na mmom ɔrenka nkyerɛ no se, ‘Noa aduan ma me na sɛ mididi wie a, wo nso woakodidi?’

9.verse: Sɛ ɔsomfo yi yɛ n’asɛde yi a, ne wura no bɛda no ase anaa?

10.verse: Saa ara nso na sɛ mo nso moyɛ mo asɛde a, ɛsɛ sɛ moka se, ‘Yɛyɛ asomfo a ayeyi mfata yɛn, yɛn asɛde a ɛsɛ sɛ yɛyɛ na yɛayɛ no.’ “

11.verse: Akwatafo du no ayaresa - Bere bi a Yesu rekɔ Yerusalem no, ɔfaa Samaria ne Galilea hye so.

12.verse: Ɔrebɛn akuraa bi ase no akwatafo du bi a na wogyinagyina kurotia no huu no

13.verse: teɛteɛɛm se, “Yesu, yɛn wura, hu yɛn mmɔbɔ.”

14.verse: Yesu huu wɔn no, ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Momfa mo ho nkɔkyerɛ ɔsɔfo!” Bere a akwatafo no rekɔ no, wɔn ho yɛɛ wɔn den.

15.verse: Wɔn mu baako hui sɛ ne ho ayɛ no den no, ɔsan n’akyi de ahurusi yii Onyankopɔn ayɛ se, “Anuonyam nka Onyankopɔn, wama me ho ayɛ me den!”

16.verse: Ɔbɛkotow Yesu anim daa no ase. Na saa ɔbarima yi yɛ Samaria ni.

17.verse: Yesu bisae se, “Ɛnyɛ nnipa du na wɔn ho yɛɛ wɔn den? Baakron a wɔaka no wɔ he?

18.verse: Adɛn nti na ɔmanfrani yi nko na wasan aba sɛ ɔrebeyi Onyankopɔn ayɛ?”

19.verse: Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no se, “Sɔre kɔ; wo gyidi ama wo ho ayɛ wo den.”

20.verse: Da bi Farisifo bi bisaa Yesu se, “Bere bɛn na Onyankopɔn Ahenni no bɛba?” Yesu buaa wɔn se, “Onyankopɔn Ahenni no nnam nsenkyerɛnne bi a mubehu so na ɛbɛba,

21.verse: na obi rentumi nkyerɛ mo se, ‘Ɛwɔ ha anaa ɛhɔ! Efisɛ, Onyankopɔn Ahenni no te mo mu.”

22.verse: Na ɔka kyerɛɛ n’asuafo no se, “Mmere bi bɛba a mo ani begyina sɛ mubehu me bere tiaa bi wɔ mo nkyɛn nanso morenhu me.

23.verse: Sɛ nnipa ka kyerɛ mo se mewɔ ha anaa baabi foforo a, munnni wɔn akyi.

24.verse: Sɛnea anyinam pa gya wɔ wim ma nnipa nyinaa hu no, saa ara nso na me ba a mɛsan aba no, bɛyɛ.

25.verse: Nanso ansa na eyinom nyinaa bɛba mu no, ɛsɛ sɛ mihu amane na me nkurɔfo nso po me.

26.verse: “Sɛnea Noa bere so nnipa yɛɛ asoɔden no, saa ara nso na sɛ meba a, ɛbɛyɛ ne no.

27.verse: Saa bere no, nnipa didii, nomee, warewaree kɔsii sɛ Noa kɔhyɛɛ hyɛn no mu na nsuyiri bɛfaa saa nnipa no nyinaa.

28.verse: “Saa ara nso na Lot bere so no, na ɛte. Nnipa didii, nomee, dii gua, yɛɛ mfuw, sisii adan,

29.verse: kosii sɛ Lot fii Sodom na ogya ne sɔfere fi soro bɛhyew saa nnipa no nyinaa.

30.verse: Saa ara nso na da a mɛsan aba no, ɛbɛyɛ.

31.verse: “Saa da no, ɛnsɛ sɛ obiara a ɔwɔ adwuma mu, afuw mu anaa gua so san n’akyi ba fie sɛ ɔrebɛsesaw n’ahode.

32.verse: Monkae asɛm a ɛtoo Lot yere.

33.verse: Obiara a ɔdɔ ne kra no, ebefi ne nsa. Na nea ɔbɛhwere ne kra no, benya.

34.verse: Da no, wɔbɛfa nnipa baanu a wɔda faako no mu baako agyaw ɔbaako.

35.verse: Saa ara nso na wɔbɛfa mmea baanu a wɔrenoa aduan no mu baako agyaw ɔbaako.

36.verse: Mmarima baanu a wɔreyɛ adwuma wɔ afum no nso, wɔbɛfa ɔbaako agyaw ɔbaako.”

37.verse: Asuafo no bisaa Yesu se, “Awurade, ɛhe na wɔde wɔn bɛkɔ?” Yesu buaa wɔn se, “Baabi a efunu wɔ no, apete mpa hɔ!”

1.verse: Mpaebɔ ho bɛ - Da bi Yesu nam abebu so kyerɛɛ n’asuafo no hia a ehia sɛ wɔbɔ mpae daa a wɔmpa abaw.

2.verse: Yesu kae se, “Ɔtemmufo bi tenaa kurow bi mu a na onsuro Onyankopɔn, mfɛre onipa biara.

3.verse: Na ɔbea kunafo bi te saa kurow yi mu a, ɔne obi wɔ asɛm. Daa na saa okunafo yi kɔ ɔtemmufo no nkyɛn kɔsrɛ no sɛ onni n’asɛm no mma no.

4.verse: Mfitiase no, ɔtemmufo no ammua no. Nanso akyiri yi ɔkae se, ‘Ɛwom sɛ minsuro Onyankopɔn, mfɛre onipa biara de,

5.verse: nanso esiane sɛ daa ɔbea yi haw me nti, mɛhwɛ adi asɛm no yiye ama no sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a ɔremmɛhaw me bio!’

6.verse: Awurade toaa so se, “Moate asɛm a ɔtemmufo yi a ɔnteɛ no kae.

7.verse: Munnnye nnni sɛ Onyankopɔn bedi ama ne mma a daa wosu frɛ no awia ne anadwo no no anaa ɔbɛtwentwɛn ne nan ase anaa?

8.verse: Merema moate ase sɛ, ɔbɛyɛ wɔn apɛde ama wɔn ntɛm. Sɛ Onipa Ba no san ba a, nnipa baahe na obehu wɔn sɛ wɔwɔ ne mu gyidi?”

9.verse: Farisini ne towgyeni - Yesu san buu bɛ bi faa nnipa a wobu wɔn ho sɛ atreneefo na ɛno nti wobu afoforo animtia no ho se,

10.verse: “Da bi nnipa baanu bi kɔɔ asɔredan mu kɔbɔɔ mpae. Na wɔn mu baako yɛ Farisini a obu ne ho, na ɔbaako no nso yɛ towgyeni.

11.verse: Farisini yi kogyinaa baabi a obiara behu no bɔɔ mpae se, ‘Onyankopɔn, meda wo ase sɛ mente sɛ nnipa a aka no te sɛ apoobɔfo, nkontompofo, aguamammɔfo ne saa towgyeni a ogyina hɔ yi.

12.verse: Nnawɔtwe biara mu, midi mmuada mprenu na nea minya biara nso, miyi mu nkyɛm du mu baako de ma.’

13.verse: ”Saa bere no na towgyeni no gyina akyiri baabi a ɔmpɛ sɛ ɔma n’ani so kyerɛ soro. Ɔde ne nsa guu ne bo bɔɔ mpae se, ‘Onyankopɔn, hu me ɔdebɔneyɛfo mmɔbɔ!’

14.verse: Mereka akyerɛ mo se, nea towgyeni no yɛe no sɔɔ Onyankopɔn ani sen nea Farisini no yɛe no. Obiara a ɔma ne ho so no, wɔbɛbrɛ no ase, na nea ɔbrɛ ne ho ase no, wɔbɛma no so.”

15.verse: Yesu hyira mmofra nketewa - Da bi, awofo bi de wɔn mma nketewa brɛɛ Yesu sɛ ɔmfa ne nsa nka wɔn, nhyira wɔn. Asuafo no huu awofo no no, wɔtramtram wɔn.

16.verse: Yesu frɛɛ mmofra no awofo no baa ne nkyɛn na ɔka kyerɛɛ n’asuafo no se, “Momma mmofra nketewa no mmra me nkyɛn na munnsiw wɔn kwan, na eyinom sɛɛ na Onyankopɔn Ahenni no yɛ wɔn dea.

17.verse: Merema moate ase sɛ, obiara a onnye Onyankopɔn Ahenni no nni sɛ abofra ketewa no, renkɔ mu.”

18.verse: Osikani bi - Da bi Yudani sikani bi bisaa Yesu se, “Kyerɛkyerɛfo pa, dɛn na menyɛ na manya nkwa a enni awiei?”

19.verse: Yesu buaa no se, “Adɛn nti na wofrɛ me onipa pa? Obiara nyɛ papa, gye Onyankopɔn.

20.verse: “Wunim Mose mmara no: mmɔ aguaman! Nni awu! Mmɔ korɔn! Nni adansekurum! Di w’agya ne wo na ni!”

21.verse: Osikani yi ka kyerɛɛ Yesu se, “Madi saa mmara yi nyinaa so fi me mmofraase.”

22.verse: Yesu tee nea osikani no kae no, ɔka kyerɛɛ no se, “Ade baako pɛ na aka wo a ɛsɛ sɛ woyɛ. Kɔ na kɔtɔn w’ahode nyinaa na kyɛ sika no ma ahiafo na wubenya agyapade wɔ Onyankopɔn Ahenni no mu, na afei, bra bedi m’akyi.”

23.verse: Osikani yi tee saa asɛm yi no, anyɛ no dɛ koraa efisɛ, na ɔwɔ ahode pii.

24.verse: Yesu hui sɛ ne werɛ ahow no ɔkae se, “Ɛyɛ den ma ahonyafo sɛ wɔbɛkɔ Onyankopɔn Ahenni no mu!

25.verse: Mereka akyerɛ mo se, ɛyɛ mmerɛw sɛ nantwi bewura paane aniwa mu sen sɛ ɔhonyafo bɛkɔ Onyankopɔn Ahenni no mu.”

26.verse: Na wɔn a wɔtee nea Yesu kae no bisae se, “Ɛnne na hena na wobegye no nkwa?”

27.verse: Yesu buae se, “Biribiara nni hɔ a Onyankopɔn ntumi nyɛ.”

28.verse: Petro ka kyerɛɛ Yesu se, “Yɛagyaw nea yɛwɔ nyinaa hɔ abedi w’akyi.”

29.verse: Yesu buaa Petro se, “Merema mo ate ase sɛ, obiara nni hɔ a, esiane Onyankopɔn Ahenni no nti, wagyaw ne fi anaa ne nuanom anaa n’awofo anaa ne mma

30.verse: na ɔrennya mma ɛmmoro nea wahwere no so saa bere yi mu, na daakye nso, ɔrennya nkwa a enni awiei.”

31.verse: Yesu san hyɛ ne wu ho nkɔm - Yesu frɛɛ asuafo dumien no gyinaa nkyɛn baabi ka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Yɛrekɔ Yerusalem, na biribiara a nkɔmhyɛfo no aka afa Onipa Ba no ho no bɛba mu.

32.verse: Wobeyi no ama Amanamanmufo ama wɔadi ne ho fɛw, ayeyaw no, atew ntasu agu no so,

33.verse: aka no mpire, akum no na ne nnansa so no, wasɔre.”

34.verse: Asuafo no ante nea Yesu kae no biara ase, efisɛ, na asɛm no boro wɔn adwene so.

35.verse: Onifuraefo bi ayaresa - Yesu ne n’asuafo no rebɛn Yeriko no, wohuu onifuraefo bi a ɔte kwankyɛn resrɛsrɛ ade.

36.verse: Onifuraefo no tee sɛ nkurɔfokuw bi retwam no, obisaa asɛm a asi.

37.verse: Wɔka kyerɛɛ no se, “Yesu Nasaretni no na ɔretwam!”

38.verse: Ɔtee saa no, ɔteɛteɛɛm se, “Yesu, Dawid Ba, hu me mmɔbɔ!”

39.verse: Wɔn a wodi anim no tramtram no se ommua n’ano nanso wantie, na ɔkɔɔ so teɛteɛɛm denneenen se, “Yesu Dawid Ba, hu me mmɔbɔ!”

40.verse: Yesu duu baabi a onifuraefo no te no, ɔma wɔde no brɛɛ no. Wɔde no duu Yesu nkyɛn no, obisaa no se,

41.verse: “Dɛn na wopɛ sɛ meyɛ ma wo?” Onifuraefo no buae se, “Awurade, ma minhu ade.”

42.verse: Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no se, “Hu ade, wo gyidi ama wo ho ayɛ wo den.”

43.verse: Amonom hɔ ara, onifuraefo yi huu ade, na odii Yesu akyi, yii Onyankopɔn ayɛ. Na wɔn a wohuu ayaresa no nyinaa nso yii Onyankopɔn ayɛ.

1.verse: Sakeo - Da bi a na Yesu retwam wɔ Yeriko no,

2.verse: ohuu ɔbarima bi wɔ hɔ a wɔfrɛ no Sakeo. Na Sakeo yɛ ɔtowgyeni panyin san yɛ osikani nso.

3.verse: Bere a Yesu retwam no, Sakeo pɛe sɛ anka ohu no nanso esiane sɛ na ɔyɛ onipa tiaa na wɔn a wodi Yesu akyi no dɔɔso nti, wanhu no.

4.verse: Esiane sɛ na Sakeo nim sɛ Yesu bɛfa nnyedua bi a na esi hɔ no ase nti, ɔkaa ne ho kɔforoo saa nnyedua no.

5.verse: Bere a Yesu duu nnyedua no ase no, ɔmaa n’ani so huu no ka kyerɛɛ no se, “Sakeo, yɛ ntɛm na si fam na wo fi na ɛnnɛ mɛtena.”

6.verse: Sakeo yɛɛ ntɛm sii fam de anigye gyee no fɛw so.

7.verse: Nnipa a wodi Yesu akyi no huu eyi no, wonwiinwii kae se, “Ɔdebɔneyɛfo yi na wakɔ akɔsoɛ no.”

8.verse: Bere a nnipa no renwiinwii no, Sakeo begyinaa Yesu nkyɛn kae se, “Awurade, ɛnnɛ, mede m’ahode mu fa kyɛ ahiafo, na sɛ masisi obi wɔ biribi mu a, metua mmɔho anan ama no.”

9.verse: Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no se, “Ɛnnɛ na nkwagye aba ofi yi mu, efisɛ, oyi nso yɛ Abraham ba.

10.verse: Na mebae sɛ merebɛhwehwɛ wɔn a wɔayera na magye wɔn nkwa.”

11.verse: Adwumayɛ ho akontaabu - Bere a Yesu ne nnipa no rebɛn Yerusalem no, ɔsan buu wɔn bɛ foforo de kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, Onyankopɔn Ahenni no abɛn.

12.verse: Ɔkae se, “Ɔdehye bi a watu kwan akɔ akyirikyiri asase bi so san kɔɔ ne kurom kohuu n’abusua mu mpanyimfo sɛ wonsi no hene.

13.verse: Ansa na ɔrebefi n’akwantu no ase no, ɔfrɛɛ n’adwumayɛfo mu du maa wɔn mu biara sidi ɔpedu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, ‘Momfa sika yi nyɛ adwuma kosi sɛ mɛba.’

14.verse: Kurom hɔfo no tee n’ahenni no ho asɛm no, wotuu nnipa kohuu mpanyimfo no se wɔmpɛ no.

15.verse: “Nanso wosii no hene ma ɔsan kɔɔ baabi a na ɔyɛ adwuma no. Odui no, ɔfrɛɛ n’adwumayɛfo du no se, wommebu sika a ɔde maa wɔn no ho nkontaa nkyerɛ no.

16.verse: “Odwumayɛfo a odii kan bae no bɛka kyerɛɛ no se, ‘Me wura, wo sika sidi ɔpedu no, mede ayɛ adwuma anya ho mmɔho du.’

17.verse: “Owura no ka kyerɛɛ no se, ‘Mo, akoa pa, esiane sɛ woadi kakraa a mede hyɛɛ wo nsa no ho nokware nti, mede nkurow du bɛhyɛ w’ase na woadi so.’

18.verse: Odwumayɛfo a ɔto so abien no bae bɛka kyerɛɛ no se, ‘Me wura, wo sika sidi ɔpedu no, mede ayɛ adwuma anya ho mmɔho anum.’

19.verse: “Owura no ka kyerɛɛ no se, ‘Mede nkurow anum bɛhyɛ wase na woadi so.’

20.verse: “Ɔfoforo nso bɛkae se, ‘Me wura, wo sika sidi ɔpedu a wode maa me no, mede siei, eni.

21.verse: Na misuro sɛ mfaso a menya no, wubesisi me agye, efisɛ, wo tirim yɛ den. Nea ɛnyɛ wo de, wugye; nea wunnuae nso, wutwa.’

22.verse: Ne wura no buaa no se, Akoa bɔne, wo anom asɛm so na megyina abu wo atɛn. Wunim sɛ me tirim yɛ den. Nea ɛnyɛ me de no migye; nea minnuae no, mitwa.

23.verse: Adɛn nti na woamfa me sika no ankɔto sikakorabea? Anka mebae yi menya ho nsiho.’

24.verse: “Ɔka kyerɛɛ n’asomfo a na wogyina hɔ no se ‘Munnye sika no mfi ne nsam mfa mma nea ɔde ne de yɛɛ adwuma nyaa mmɔho du no.’

25.verse: “Asomfo no kae se, ‘Yɛn wura, sɛ oyi de ɔwɔ sika pii!’

26.verse: “Owura no kae se, ‘Nea moreka no yɛ nokware. Nanso merema moate ase sɛ, nea ɔwɔ pii no, wɔbɛma no bi aka ho, na nea ɔwɔ kakraa bi no, nea ɔwɔ mpo no, wobegye afi ne nsam.

27.verse: Na afei momfa m’atamfo a anka wɔmpɛ sɛ midi ade no mmra m’anim ha na munkum wɔn!”

28.verse: Yesu kɔ Yerusalem - Yesu kaa nsɛm yi wiei no, odii n’asuafo no kan kɔɔ Yerusalem.

29.verse: Ɔrebɛn Belfage ne Betania a ɛbɛn Ngo Bepɔw no no, ɔsomaa n’asuafo no mu baanu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn se,

30.verse: “Monkɔ akuraa a ɛbɛn ha no ase na mudu hɔ a, mubehu afurum ba bi a obiara ntenaa ne so da sɛ wɔasa no. Monsan no mfa no mmrɛ me.

31.verse: Na sɛ obi bisa mo se, ‘Adɛn nti na moresan no’ a, monka se, ‘Aboa no ho hia Awurade!’ “

32.verse: Asuafo baanu a wɔkɔe no kohuu aboa no sɛ ɔsa hɔ sɛnea Yesu kae no.

33.verse: Bere a wɔresan afurum ba no no, ne wuranom bisaa wɔn se, “Adɛn nti na moresan aboa no?”

34.verse: Wobuaa wɔn se, “Ne ho hia Awurade.”

35.verse: Asuafo no de afurum ba no brɛɛ Yesu de wɔn ntama sesɛw ne so ma ɔtenaa ne so.

36.verse: Yesu te afurum ba no so rekɔ no, nnipa de wɔn ntama sesɛw ɔkwan no so ma ɔfaa so.

37.verse: Oduu Ngo Bepɔw no so baabi a wɔrebesian akɔ Yerusalem no, n’akyidifo no nyinaa de osebɔ kamfoo Onyankopɔn yii no ayɛ wɔ Yesu anwonwade ahorow a wayɛ no ho se,

38.verse: “Nhyira ne ɔhene a ɔreba Awurade din mu no! Asomdwoe ne anuonyam nka Onyankopɔn wɔ sorosoro nohɔ!”

39.verse: Farisifo no bi a na wɔfra nnipakuw no mu no ka kyerɛɛ Yesu se, “Kyerɛkyerɛfo, kasa kyerɛ w’akyidifo no na wommua wɔn ano!”

40.verse: Yesu buaa wɔn se, “Sɛ womua wɔn ano koraa a, abo mpo bɛkamfo me ayi me ayɛ.”

41.verse: Yesu su ma Yerusalem - Yesu rebɛn Yerusalem a ohuu kurow no no, osu maa emu nnipa no se,

42.verse: “Mo a anka asomdwoe yɛ mo de nanso moampɛ no, mobɛhwehwɛ asomdwoe akyi kwan, nanso, mo nsa renka da!

43.verse: Nna bi bɛba a mo atamfo bɛba abɛtoa mo, aka mo ahyɛ,

44.verse: atɔre mo ne mo mma ase asɛe mo kurow yi pasaa, efisɛ, moapo adom a Onyankopɔn de adom mo no.”

45.verse: Yesu pam aguadifo fi asɔredan mu - Yesu duu Yerusalem no, ɔkɔɔ asɔredan mu kɔpamoo nnipa a na wɔredi gua wɔ hɔ no kae se,

46.verse: “Wɔakyerɛw se, ‘M’asɔredan yɛ mpaebɔbea; nanso mode ayɛ akorɔmfo ahyiae!”

47.verse: Saa bere no nyinaa na asɔfo mpanyimfo, mmara no akyerɛkyerɛfo ne ɔman no mu mpanyimfo rehwehwɛ ɔkwan a wɔbɛfa so anya no, akyere no, akum no.

48.verse: Nanso na wonhu ɔkwan biara a wɔbɛfa so akyere no, efisɛ, bere nyinaa na nnipa akyere ne so retie no.

1.verse: Yesu tumi ho nsɛmmisa - Da bi a Yesu rekyerɛkyerɛ wɔ asɔredan mu no, asɔfo mpanyin, mmara no akyerɛkyerɛfo ne ɔman no mu mpanyin kobisaa no se,

2.verse: ”Tumi bɛn na wowɔ a wode yɛ saa nneɛma yi; na hena nso na ɔmaa wo saa tumi no?”

3.verse: Yesu buaa wɔn se, “Me nso mewɔ asɛm bi bisa mo. Monka nkyerɛ me.

4.verse: Tumi bɛn na Yohane de bɔɔ asu; efi Onyankopɔn anaa efi nnipa?”

5.verse: Wɔfaa ho adwene kae se, sɛ yɛka se, efi Onyankopɔn a, obebisa yɛn se, ‘ɛnne, adɛn nti na moannye no anni?’

6.verse: “Sɛ nso yɛka se, efi onipa a, ɔman mu no nyinaa besiw yɛn abo, efisɛ, wonim sɛ Yohane yɛ odiyifo.”

7.verse: Ewiee ase no, wobuae se, “Yennim.”

8.verse: Yesu nso ka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Ɛnne me nso meremma mo mo asɛmmisa no ho mmuae.”

9.verse: Apaafo bi - Yesu buu wɔn bɛ bi se, “Ɔbarima bi yɛɛ bobefuw de hyɛɛ apaafo bi nsa sɛ wɔnhwɛ so mma no. Eyi akyi otuu kwan kɔɔ akyirikyiri baabi kɔtenaa hɔ kyɛe.

10.verse: Bobetew bere dui no, ɔbarima yi somaa ne somfo sɛ onkogye aduaba no bi mmrɛ no. Nanso apaafo no boroo no ma ɔsan kɔɔ nsapan.

11.verse: Ɔsomaa ɔsomfo foforo maa ɔno nso wɔboroo no, bɔɔ no adapaa, ma ɔkɔɔ nsapan.

12.verse: Ɔsan somaa ɔsomfo foforo na ɔno mpo de, wopirapiraa no pamoo no.

13.verse: “Eyi maa bobefuw wura no kae se, ‘Dɛn na menyɛ bio? Mɛsoma me ba a medɔ no no akɔ wɔn nkyɛn na ɔno de ebia wɔbɛfɛre no.’

14.verse: “Nanso bere a apaafo no huu no no, wɔkae se, ‘Odiadefo no ni, momma yenkum no na yɛmfa n’agyapade no.’

15.verse: Wɔtwee no fii afuw no mu kokum no. Mugye di sɛ dɛn na afuw wura no bɛyɛ saa apaafo yi?

16.verse: Ɔbɛba abekum saa apaafo yi na ɔde afuw no ama afoforo.” Nnipa a wɔretie Yesu no kae se, “Ɛmpare yɛn!”

17.verse: Yesu hwɛɛ wɔn dinn bisaa wɔn se, “Ɛnne na nea wɔakyerɛw se, ‘Ɔbo a adansifo apo no, ɛno ara na abɛyɛ tweatibo’ no ase ne dɛn?

18.verse: Obiara a ɔbɛhwe ɔbo no so no, obebubu na nea ɔbo no bɛhwe ne so no, ɛbɛpɛtɛw no.”

19.verse: Esiane sɛ mmara no akyerɛkyerɛfo ne asɔfo mpanyin no hui sɛ Yesu buu bɛ no tiaa wɔn nti, wɔhwehwɛɛ ɔkwan a wɔbɛfa so akyere no saa bere no ara mu nanso esiane nnipa a na wɔwɔ hɔ no nti, na wosuro.

20.verse: Towgye ho asɛmmisa - Esiane sɛ ɔpɛ ara na na nnipa no pɛ sɛ wɔkyere Yesu nti, wɔtetɛw no maa nnipa bi kɔɔ ne nkyɛn sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wobenya n’anom asɛm bi agyina so akyere no na wɔde no akɔ aban mu.

21.verse: Saa nnipa yi bisaa Yesu se, “Kyerɛkyerɛfo, yenim sɛ woyɛ ɔnokwafo, wonyɛ nyiyimu na wokyerɛ nokware kwan a wɔnam so kɔ Onyankopɔn nkyɛn.

22.verse: Enti eye sɛ yetua tow ma Kaesare aban anaasɛ enye?”

23.verse: Yesu huu wɔn adwemmɔne no, ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn se,

24.verse: “Momma me sika. Hena mfonini ne din na ɛwɔ so yi?” Wobuaa no se, “Ɛyɛ Kaesare de.”

25.verse: Yesu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Ɛnne momfa Kaesare de mma Kaesare na momfa Onyankopɔn de mma Onyankopɔn.”

26.verse: Yesu mmuae a ɔmaa wɔn no yɛɛ wɔn nwonwa na wɔn adwemmɔne no nso kaa wɔn tirim.

27.verse: Owusɔre ho asɛmmisa - Sadukifo bi a wonnye owusɔre nni baa Yesu nkyɛn bebisaa no se,

28.verse: “Kyerɛkyerɛfo, Mose mmara no kyerɛ yɛn sɛ, sɛ ɔbarima bi wɔ yere na ɔne no anwo na owu a, ne nua tumi ware no ne no wo mma ma owufo no.

29.verse: Anuanom baason bi tenaa ase. Ɔpanyin a ɔwɔ mu no waree ɔbea a ɔne no anwo na owui.

30.verse: Ne nua a odi n’akyi no waree no nanso ɔne no anwo na owui.

31.verse: Anuanom a wɔaka no nyinaa nso waree no a obiara ne no anwo na wowuwui.

32.verse: Akyiri yi ɔbea no nso wui.

33.verse: Yɛn asɛmmisa ne sɛ, esiane sɛ ɔbea yi waree anuanom yi nyinaa nti, owusɔre da no, wɔn mu hena na ɔbea yi bɛyɛ ne yere?”

34.verse: Yesu buae se, “Asase yi so na nnipa dwen aware ho.

35.verse: Na wɔn a owusɔre da no wobenya kwan akɔ Onyankopɔn Ahenni no mu de, aware ho renhia wɔn.

36.verse: Na owu nso nni hɔ mma wɔn bio, efisɛ, wɔbɛyɛ sɛ ɔsoro abɔfo. Esiane sɛ wɔasɔre afi awufo mu no nti, wɔyɛ Onyankopɔn mma.

37.verse: “Afei mo asɛmmisa a ɛfa owusɔre ho no nso, Mose ma yehuu no pefee sɛ, owusɔre wɔ hɔ. Efisɛ, n’asɛm a ɔkyerɛw faa wura a na ɛredɛw no ho no ɔbɔ Abrahan Nyankopɔn, Isak Nyankopɔn ne Yakob Nyankopɔn din.

38.verse: Eyi kyerɛ sɛ, Onyankopɔn yɛ ateasefo Nyankopɔn na ɔnyɛ awufo Nyankopɔn, efisɛ, obiara a ɔde ne ho to Onyankopɔn so no, sɛ owu mpo a, obenya nkwa a enni awiei.”

39.verse: Mmara no akyerɛkyerɛfo no mu bi kae se, “Kyerɛkyerɛfo, woabua no yiye.”

40.verse: Na obiara antumi ammisa no asɛm biara bio.

41.verse: Hena ba ne Kristo no? - Yesu bisaa wɔn se, “Adɛn nti na wɔka se Kristo no yɛ Dawid ba?

42.verse: Efisɛ Dawid ka wɔ ne Nnwom no mu se, ‘Awurade ka kyerɛɛ me wura se, “Tena me nifa so

43.verse: kosi sɛ mɛma woadi w’atamfo so nkonim.” ‘

44.verse: Sɛ Dawid frɛ Kristo no ‘Me wura’ a, ɛyɛ dɛn na Kristo no ayɛ ne ba ne ne Nyankopɔn?”

45.verse: Mmara no akyerɛkyerɛfo no suban - Bere a nnipa no retie no no, Yesu danee n’ani ka kyerɛɛ n’asuafo no se,

46.verse: “Monhwɛ mo ho so yiye wɔ mmara no akyerɛkyerɛfo no ho. Bere biara wɔpɛ sɛ wɔhyɛ ntade pa, hwehwɛ sɛ nnipa hu wɔn bagua mu a, wɔde obu kyia wɔn, na sɛ wɔkɔ asɔredan mu nso a, wɔtena mpanyin tenabea. Saa ara nso na sɛ wɔkɔ apontow ase a, wɔtena mpanyin tenabea.

47.verse: Wɔbɔ mpae atenten ma nnipa hu sɛ wɔresom Onyankopɔn nanso wosisi akunafo. Eyi nti wobenya asotwe a emu yɛ duru.”

1.verse: Okunafo bi afɔrebɔ - Yesu te asɔredan mu hɔ no, ohuu asikafo bi a wɔde wɔn afɔrebɔde akɛseakɛse regu afɔre adaka no mu.

2.verse: Ohuu okunafo hiani bi nso sɛ ɔde sika kakraa bi too afɔre adaka no mu.

3.verse: Yesu ka kyerɛɛ nnipa a na wɔwɔ asɔredan mu hɔ no se, “Nokware mu, afɔre a okunafo hiani yi bɛbɔe no som bo sen afɔre akɛseakɛse a asikafo no bɛbɔe no nyihaa.

4.verse: Wɔn nyinaa de nea wɔanya ama aboro so no bi na ɛbɛbɔɔ afɔre, na oyi de, ofi ne hia mu de ne sika a ɔwɔ nyinaa na abegu mu yi.”

5.verse: Asɔredansɛe ho nkɔmhyɛ - Yesu akyidifo no bi kamfoo abo fɛfɛ a wɔde sii asɔredan no ne adwinni ahorow a wɔayɛ agu ɔdan no ho no. Nanso Yesu kae se,

6.verse: “Bere bi bɛba a, wobedwiriw nneɛma a morekamfo yi nyinaa agu a hwee renka.”

7.verse: Nsɛm a ebesisi ansa na awiei no aba - Wobisaa no se, “Kyerɛkyerɛfo, bere bɛn na asɛm a woreka yi besi, na ɛho nsɛnkyerɛnne bɛyɛ dɛn?”

8.verse: Yesu buae se, “Monhwɛ mo ho so yiye na obi annaadaa mo, efisɛ, nnipa pii bɛsɔre aka se, ‘Mene Kristo no’ na bere no abɛn nanso munnnye wɔn nnni!

9.verse: Sɛ mote akokoakoko ne sɛ wɔsɔre tia aman a, munnsuro efisɛ, ɛsɛ sɛ saa nneɛma yi di kan ba nanso na ɛnkyerɛ sɛ awiei no abɛn.”

10.verse: Ɔkae bio se, “Aman bɛsɔre aman so na ahenni asɔre ahenni so.

11.verse: Asasewosow a ɛyɛ hu bɛba, ɔkɔm besi, ɔyaredɔm bɛba na nneɛma a ɛyɛ hu befi wim asisi.

12.verse: “Nanso ansa na eyinom nyinaa besisi no, me din nti, wɔbɛtaa mo akyekyere mo de mo akɔ hyiadan mu ne afiase ne ahemfo ne atumfo anim.

13.verse: Eyi bɛma moanya kwan adi me ho adanse.

14.verse: Nanso munnnwen nsɛm a mobɛka de ayi mo ho ano no ho;

15.verse: efisɛ, mɛma mo nsɛm ne nyansa a mode beyi mo ho ano a mo atamfo rentumi nnyina mo anim.

16.verse: ”Mo awofo, mo nuanom, mo abusuafo ne mo nnamfonom beyi mo ama na wobekum mo mu bi.

17.verse: Na me nti, nnipa bɛtan mo.

18.verse: Nanso mo tinhwi baako pɛ po renyera.

19.verse: Na sɛ mutumi gyina pintinn a, mubenya nkwa a enni awiei.

20.verse: Yerusalem sɛe - “Sɛ muhu sɛ asraafo atwa Yerusalem ho ahyia a, na ɛkyerɛ sɛ ne sɛe abɛn.

21.verse: Saa bere no wɔn a wɔte Yudea nguan nkɔ mmepɔw no so; wɔn a wɔwɔ kurow no mu no nguan mfi mu, na wɔn nso a wɔwɔ nkuraase ne mfum no ntena hɔ ara.

22.verse: Saa bere yi mu na Onyankopɔn asotwe a adiyifo no hyɛɛ ho nkɔm wɔ Kyerɛwsɛm no mu no bɛba mu.

23.verse: Wɔn a wɔafa afuru ne wɔn a wɔma mma nufu no nnue! Amanehunu a enni kabea bɛba ɔman no so na Onyankopɔn abufuwhyew nso aba nnipa no so.

24.verse: Ebinom bɛtotɔ wɔ sekan ano na wɔafa ebinom nso nnomum de wɔn akɔ amanaman so na amanaman bɛsɛe Yerusalem, adi so akosi bere a Onyankopɔn ahyehyɛ sɛ amanaman nni wɔn so no betwam.

25.verse: Onipa Ba no ba a ɔbɛsan aba - “Nsɛnkyerɛnne bɛba owia, ɔsram ne nsoromma mu na ɛpo asorɔkye bɛbobom, aworo so ama ne nnyigyei dennen no de ahoyeraw aba aman nyinaa so.

26.verse: Esiane nneɛma a ɛyɛ hu a ɛbɛba asase so no nti, nnipa pii bɛtotɔ berɛw na abɔde a ɛwɔ wim nso awosow ahoɔden so.

27.verse: Saa bere no na wobehu Onipa Ba no sɛ ɔde tumi ne anuonyam a ɛso nam omununkum mu reba.

28.verse: Sɛ saa asɛm yi fi ase sisi a, momfa gyidi nnyina pintinn efisɛ, na mo nkwagyebere abɛn.”

29.verse: Akutu dua bi ho bɛ - Yesu buu wɔn bɛ bi se, “Monhwɛ nnuaba ne nnua afoforo bi,

30.verse: sɛ eyiyi nhaban foforo a, na ɛkyerɛ sɛ osutɔbere adu.

31.verse: Saa ara nso na sɛ muhu nsɛnkyerɛnne a moka ho asɛm yi a, munhu sɛ Onyankopɔn Ahenni no abɛn.

32.verse: “Merema moate ase sɛ, saa nsɛm yi nyinaa bɛba mu ansa na saa bere yi sofo awuwu.

33.verse: Ɔsoro ne asase betwam nanso me nsɛm de, ɛrentwam da.

34.verse: Kɔkɔbɔ - ”Monhwɛ mo ho so yiye! Mommma adiditraso ne asabow ne asetena mu dadwene nnni mo so, anyɛ saa a, me ba a mɛba bio no befi mo aworaw.

35.verse: Efisɛ, me ba a mɛba no befi nnipa a wɔte asase so nyinaa aworaw.

36.verse: Monwɛn. Bere biara mommɔ mpae na moanya ahoɔden de agyina saa nneɛma yi nyinaa ano na mesan ba bio a, moatumi agyina m’anim.”

37.verse: Da biara na Yesu kɔ asɔredan mu hɔ kɔkyerɛkyerɛ ma nnipa pii sɔre anɔpahema kotie no.

38.verse: Na sɛ edu anwummere biara a, Yesu kɔ Ngo Bepɔw no so kɔhome.

1.verse: Yesu ho pɔwbɔ - Afei na Yudafo afahyɛ a wodi abodoo a mmɔkaw mfra mu a wɔfrɛ no Twam Afahyɛ no, abɛn.

2.verse: Saa bere no na asɔfo mpanyin ne mmara no akyerɛkyerɛfo no hwehwɛ ɔkwan a wɔbɛfa so akyere Yesu, akum no, nanso esiane nnipa a na wɔwɔ hɔ no nti, na wosuro.

3.verse: Satan kɔhyɛnee Yuda a wɔfrɛ no Iskariot a ɔyɛ asuafo dumien no mu baako no mu.

4.verse: Yuda kɔɔ asɔfo mpanyin ne Asɔredan no mu awɛmfo mpanyin nkyɛn ne wɔn kosusuw ɔkwan ko a ɔbɛfa so ayi Yesu ama wɔn no ho.

5.verse: Wɔn ani gyei, penee so sɛ wɔbɛma no sika.

6.verse: Efi saa bere no, Yuda hwehwɛɛ ɔkwan a ɔbɛfa so ama wɔakyere Yesu bere a, nnipa dodow biara nni ne ho.

7.verse: Twam Afahyɛ ho ahosiesie - Afei da a wokum twam guan de di abodoo a mmɔkaw nni mu no dui no,

8.verse: Yesu somaa Petro ne Yohane se, “Monkɔyɛ Twam Afahyɛ aduan a yebedi no.”

9.verse: Wobisaa no se, “Ɛhe na wopɛ sɛ yɛkɔyɛ aduan no?”

10.verse: Obuaa wɔn se, “Sɛ mudu kurow no mu a, mubehu obi a wakɔ asu reba. Munni n’akyi nkɔ ofi a ɔbɛkɔ mu no mu

11.verse: na mummisa ofiwura no se, ‘Yɛn kyerɛkyerɛfo se ɛhe na woasiesie ama ɔne n’asuafo no sɛ wommedi Twam Afahyɛ aduan no?’

12.verse: Ɔde mo bɛkɔ abansoro asa kɛse bi a wɔasiesie mu fɛfɛɛfɛ so. Ɛhɔ na monkɔtow pon no.”

13.verse: Wɔkɔɔ kurow no mu no, wohui sɛnea Yesu kae no pɛpɛɛpɛ ma wɔyɛɛ twam aduan no wɔ hɔ.

14.verse: Adidi a etwa to - Bere no dui no, Yesu ne n’asuafo no kɔtenatenaa adidipon no ho.

15.verse: Wɔtete hɔ no, Yesu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Mepɛe sɛ me ne mo bɛtena ase, ato nsa adi saa Twam aduan yi, ansa na mahu amane no, akyɛ.

16.verse: Mereka akyerɛ mo se, saa adidi yi akyi no, merenni Twam aduan yi bio kosi sɛ Onyankopɔn Ahenni no bɛba.”

17.verse: Afei Yesu faa kuruwa, daa Onyankopɔn ase na ɔde maa n’asuafo no kae se, “Munnye na obiara nnom bi.

18.verse: Mereka akyerɛ mo se, merennom bobesa yi bi bio kosi sɛ Onyankopɔn Ahenni no bɛba.”

19.verse: Afei ɔfaa abodoo daa Onyankopɔn ase, bubuu mu de maa n’asuafo no kae se, “Eyi ne me nipadua a mede rema mo. Munnye nni. Da biara a mubedi saa abodoo yi bi no, momfa nkae me.”

20.verse: Saa ara nso na adidi no akyi no, ɔfaa kuruwa kae se, “Kuruwa yi ne me mogya a merehwie agu ama mo sɛ apam foforo a wɔnam so begye mo nkwa.

21.verse: Nanso mo a mo ne me te adidii ha yi mu baako na obeyi me ama.

22.verse: Etwa sɛ miwu sɛnea Onyankopɔn ahyehyɛ no, nanso nea obeyi me ama no de, onnue.”

23.verse: Asuafo no bisabisaa wɔn ho wɔn ho, pɛe sɛ wohu wɔn mu nea obeyi no ama no.

24.verse: Yesu kasa tia ahomaso - Asuafo no gyee wɔn ho akyinnye pɛe sɛ wohu wɔn mu nea ɔbɛyɛ kɛse wɔ Onyankopɔn Ahenni a ɛbɛba no mu.

25.verse: Yesu tee no, ɔkae se, “Wiase de, atumfo hyɛ wɔn a wodi wɔn so no so ma wɔn nso a wɔhyɛ wɔn so no nso bu wɔn sɛ wɔn adɛɛfo.

26.verse: Nanso mo de, nea ɔpɛ sɛ ɔyɛ mo so panyin no nyɛ sɛ mo mu akumaa, na nea odi mo so no nso nyɛ mo mu somfo.

27.verse: Merebisa mo se, nnipa baanu yi mu hena na odi ne yɔnko so, nea ɔte adidipon ho anaa nea ɔsom nea ɔte adidipon no ho no? Nanso me de, mewɔ mo mu sɛ mo somfo.

28.verse: Me ne mo na afa ɔhaw ne amane mu a, moda so ne me nam.

29.verse: M’agya de ahenni no ama me. Saa ara nso na mede rema mo.

30.verse: Na mo ne me ato nsa adidi, na moatumi abu Israel mmusuakuw dumien no atɛn.

31.verse: Yesupa ho nkɔmkyɛ - Afei Awurae kae se, “Simon, Simon! Monhwɛ yiye na ɔbonsam pɛ sɛ ɔsɔ mo hwɛ.

32.verse: Nanso wo Simon de, masrɛ ama wo sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wobɛkɔ so agye me adi. Sɛ wunu wo ho san ba me nkyɛn a, hyɛ wo nuanom no gyidi mu den.”

33.verse: Petro buaa no se, “Awurade, ɛyɛ me pɛ sɛ me ne wo bɛda afiase na sɛ ɛyɛ owu mpo nso a, me ne wo bewu.”

34.verse: Yesu nso buaa no se, “Petro, mereka akyerɛ wo se, ɛnnɛ akokɔ remmɔn na woapa me mprɛnsa.”

35.verse: Afei Yesu bisaa n’asuafo no se, “Bere a mesomaa mo a na munkita sikabɔtɔ anaa akwantubɔtɔ na monhyɛ mpaboa no, biribi ho hiaa mo anaa?” Asuafo no buaa no se, “Dabi, biribiara ho anhia yɛn.”

36.verse: Yesu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Afei de, nea ɔwɔ sika no, ɔmfa; nea ɔwɔ akwantubɔtɔ no nso, ɔmfa. Nea onni nkrante no ntɔn ne ntama mfa nkɔtɔ bi.

37.verse: Na bere adu sɛ, nkɔm a wɔhyɛ faa me ho se, ‘Wɔbɛkan no afra nnebɔneyɛfo mu’ no bɛba mu. Ɛsɛ sɛ nkɔm biara a wɔahyɛ afa me ho no ba mu.”

38.verse: Asuafo no ka kyerɛɛ Yesu se, “Awurade, yɛwɔ nkrante abien wɔ ha.” Yesu buae se, “Eye, ɛno ara dɔɔso.”

39.verse: Ngo Bepɔw so mpaebɔ - Yesu ne n’asuafo no fii kurow no mu kɔɔ Ngo Bepɔw no so sɛnea ɔtaa yɛ no, na n’asuafo no ka ne ho.

40.verse: Woduu hɔ no, ɔka kyerɛɛ n’asuafo no se, “Mommɔ mpae na moankɔ sɔhwɛ mu.”

41.verse: Afei ɔtwee ne ho fii asuafo no ho kɔɔ nkyɛn baabi kɔkotowee, bɔɔ mpae se,

42.verse: “Agya, sɛ ɛyɛ wo pɛ a, ma saa amanehunu a ɛreba me so yi ntwa me ho nkɔ, nanso ɛnyɛ nea mepɛ, na nea wopɛ na ɛnyɛ.”

43.verse: Ogu so rebɔ mpae no, ɔbɔfo fi soro bɛhyɛɛ no den.

44.verse: Esiane sɛ na Yesu ho yeraw no wɔ Honhom mu no nti, ɔmaa ne mpaebɔ mu yɛɛ den maa ne ho fifiri yɛɛ sɛ mogya atɔwatɔw sosɔw guu fam.

45.verse: Mpaebɔ no akyi no, ɔkɔɔ asuafo no nkyɛn kɔtoo wɔn sɛ awerɛhow ne ɔbrɛ nti, wɔadeda.

46.verse: Ɔkɔtoo wɔn sɛ wɔadeda no, ɔkae se, “Hwɛ! Moadeda? Monsɔre na mommɔ mpae na moankɔ sɔhwɛ mu.”

47.verse: Wɔkyere Yesu - Yesu gu so rekasa no, nnipadɔm bi a Yuda Iskariot a ɔyɛ asuafo dumien no mu baako di wɔn anim, baa no so. Yuda Iskariot twiw bɛn Yesu yɛɛ no atuu.

48.verse: Yesu bisaa no se, “Yuda, ɔdɔ nsɛnkyerɛnne yi so na wonam reyi me ama?”

49.verse: Bere a asuafo a wɔwɔ ne ho no huu nea ɛreba no, wobisaa no se, “Awurade, yentwitwa wɔn nkrante anaa?”

50.verse: Asuafo no mu baako twaa ɔsɔfo panyin no somfo no aso nifa.

51.verse: Yesu ampɛ nea osuani no yɛe no nti, ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Munnyae nea mopɛ sɛ moyɛ no.” Ɔfaa ɔsomfo no aso no de taree hɔ bio.

52.verse: Yesu bisaa asɔfo mpanyin ne asɔredan sohwɛfo mpanyin ne Yudafo mpanyimfo no asomfo a wɔbaa ne so no se, “Meyɛ odwotwafo na mode nkrante ne nkontimmaa aba me so?

53.verse: Bere a na me ne mo wɔ asɔredan mu no, moankyere me; afei na mo bere aso a ɔbonsam nam ne tumi so reyɛ adwuma ampa.”

54.verse: Petro pa Yesu - Afei wɔkyeree Yesu de no kɔɔ ɔsɔfo panyin fi. Bere a wɔde no rekɔ no, Petro gyee ne ho kaa akyiri.

55.verse: Petro duu ɔsɔfo panyin no fi hɔ no, na asraafo no asɔ ogya wɔ adiwo hɔ a wɔreto; ɔno nso kɔtoo bi.

56.verse: Abeawa bi huu Petro sɛ ɔreto ogya no bi no, ɔhwɛɛ no dinn kae se, “Saa ɔbarima yi yɛ Yesu akyidifo no mu baako.”

57.verse: Petro sanee se, “Awuraa, minnim saa ɔbarima yi baabiara.”

58.verse: Ankyɛ koraa na obi foforo nso huu no kae se, “Woyɛ n’akyidifo no mu baako.” Petro bua see no se, “Dabi, menka wɔn ho.”

59.verse: Ɛbɛyɛ dɔnhwerew akyi no, obi foforo nso san huu no ka sii so dua se, “Akyinnye biara nni ho sɛ saa damfo yi ka Yesu asuafo no ho, efisɛ, ɔno nso yɛ Galileani na ne kasa koraa da no adi.”

60.verse: Petro sanee ne mprɛnsa so se, “Owura, asɛm a woreka yi nyɛ nokware.” N’ano ansi koraa na akokɔ bɔnee.

61.verse: Saa bere no ara mu na Yesu twaa n’ani hwɛɛ Petro anim. Ɛhɔ ara na Petro kaee asɛm a Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no se, “Ɛnnɛ, akokɔ remmɔn na woapa me mprɛnsa” no.

62.verse: Petro de awerɛhow fii adi kosui.

63.verse: Yesu ho fɛwdi - Mmarima a na wɔrewɛn Yesu no dii ne ho fɛw, kyekyeree n’ani, bobɔɔ no,

64.verse: san bisaa no se, “Odiyifo, hena na ɔbɔɔ wo? Kyerɛ yɛn.”

65.verse: Wɔkɔɔ so yeyaw no kaa abususɛm ahorow guu ne so.

66.verse: Yesu gyina baguafo anim - Ade kyee no, Yudafo mpanyin ne mmara no akyerɛkyerɛfo no hyiae ma wɔde Yesu baa wɔn anim

67.verse: bisaa no se, “Sɛ wone Kristo no a, ka kyerɛ yɛn.” Yesu buaa wɔn se, “Sɛ meka se mene Kristo no a, morennye nni,

68.verse: na sɛ mibisa mo nso a, moremmua me.

69.verse: Na efi saa bere yi mubehu Onipa Ba no sɛ ɔte Onyame Tumfo no nifa so.”

70.verse: Ɔkaa saa no, wɔn nyinaa bisaa no bio se, “Ɛnne na wone Onyankopɔn Ba no anaa?” Obuaa wɔn se, “Nea moreka no yɛ nokware.”

71.verse: Eyi ma wɔkae se, “Adanse bɛn na ehia yɛn bio? Yɛate afi ɔno ankasa anom.”

1.verse: Wɔde Yesu kɔ Pilato anim - Afei baguafo no sɔre de Yesu kɔɔ Pilato anim.

2.verse: Wofii ase totoo n’ano se, “Saa onipa yi tu nkurɔfo aso. Ɔmpene so sɛ ɔmanfo tua tow ma Kaesare aban, na ɔfrɛ ne ho sɛ ɔhene Kristo no.”

3.verse: Eyi maa Pilato bisaa no se, “Wone Yudafo hene no anaa?” Yesu buaa no se, “Ɛno ara na woaka no.”

4.verse: Pilato ka kyerɛɛ asɔfo mpanyin ne nnipadɔm no se, “Minhu asɛm biara a megyina so abu onipa yi fɔ.”

5.verse: Nanso wɔn bo antɔ wɔn yam kɔɔ so kae se, “Ɔyɛ ɔmammɔfo. Baabiara a ɔkɔ no, ɔnam ne nkyerɛkyerɛ so de hwanyan nnipa no tia aban. Ɔde ne nkyerɛkyerɛ yi fi Galilea bɛfaa Yudeaman mu nyinaa abedu Yerusalem ha.”

6.verse: Pilato tee asɛm yi no, obisae se, “Onipa yi yɛ Galileani anaa?”

7.verse: Wɔde Yesu kɔ Herode anim - Bere a wɔka kyerɛɛ Pilato se Yesu yɛ Galileani no, ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, sɛ ɛte saa de a, wɔmfa no nkɔ ɔhene Herode anim, efisɛ, Galilea hyɛ n’ase. Saa bere no ara nso na ɔhene Herode wɔ Yerusalem.

8.verse: Esiane sɛ wate Yesu ho asɛm na osusuw nso sɛ, sɛ ɔba n’anim a, ɔbɛyɛ anwonwade akyerɛ no no nti, bere a ohuu no no, n’ani gyei yiye, efisɛ, na ɔpɛe sɛ obehu no no, akyɛ.

9.verse: Wobisabisaa Yesu nsɛm bebree nanso emu biara nni hɔ a oyii ano.

10.verse: Asɔfo mpanyin no ne mmara no akyerɛkyerɛfo no kɔɔ so ara kaa nsɛm a ennim guu no so.

11.verse: Herode ne n’asomfo no bɔɔ Yesu adapaa, dii ne ho fɛw. Afei Herode hyehyɛɛ no sɛ ɔhene san de no kɔmaa Pilato.

12.verse: Da no ara, Herode ne Pilato a anka wɔyɛ aka no, bɔɔ mu.

13.verse: Pilato di ma Yesu - Wɔde Yesu kɔmaa Pilato no, ɔfrɛɛ asɔfo mpanyin ne Yudafo mpanyin ne nnipadɔm no,

14.verse: ka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Mode onipa yi brɛɛ me se, ɔyɛ obi a ɔnam ne nkyerɛkyerɛ so hwanyan nnipa, tia aban. Mahwehwɛ nsɛm a moka guu ne so mu wɔ mo anim nanso, minhu afobusɛm biara a megyina so mabu no fɔ.

15.verse: Saa ara nso na Herode annya asɛm bi annyina so ammu no fɔ a ɛno nti, wasan de no abrɛ yɛn yi. Ɔnyɛɛ bɔne biara a ɛsɛ sɛ migyina so bu no kumfɔ.

16.verse: Mɛbɔ no mmaa na magyaa no.”

17.verse: Twam Afahyɛ biara, Pilato gyaa odeduani baako ma wɔn.

18.verse: Pilato kasa no akyi no, nnipadɔm no nyinaa bɔ gyee so se, “Kum no, na gyaa Baraba ma yɛn.”

19.verse: Baraba yi yɛ obi a ɔhwanyan ɔman na ɔsan dii awu nti, wɔde no too afiase.

20.verse: Pilato kɔɔ so di maa Yesu pɛe sɛ ogyaa no.

21.verse: Nanso wɔsan bɔ gyee so bio se, ‘Bɔ no asɛnnua mu! Bɔ no asɛnnua mu!”

22.verse: Obisaa wɔn ne mprɛnsa so se, “Adɛn? Dɛn bɔne na wayɛ? Minhu afobusɛm biara a megyina so abu no kumfɔ. Mɛbɔ no mmaa na magyaa no.”

23.verse: Nanso wɔbɔ gyee so ara maa wɔn nne bu faa Pilato de no so se, ɔmmɔ no asɛnnua mu.

24.verse: Enti Pilato penee wɔn abisade no so maa wɔn.

25.verse: Wogyaee Baraba a esiane sɛ ɔhwanyanee ɔman san dii awu no nti, wɔde no too afiase no maa wɔn. Na ɔde Yesu maa wɔn sɛnea wɔpɛ no.

26.verse: Yesu asɛnnuambɔ - Afei wɔde Yesu rekɔ akɔbɔ no asɛnnua mu no, wohyiaa Kireneni bi a wɔfrɛ no Simon sɛ ofi afum reba Yerusalem. Wɔkyeree no, hyɛɛ no ma ɔsoaa Yesu asɛnnua no wɔ ne kɔn ho, dii n’akyi.

27.verse: Nnipadɔm a, mmea a wɔresu retwa agyaadwo fra wɔn mu no, tu dii n’akyi.

28.verse: Yesu danee ne ho ka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Yerusalem mmea, munnsu me na munsu mo ho ne mo mma.

29.verse: Na wɔka se, ‘Bere bi bɛba a, ɛbɛyɛ bere pa ama abonini.’

30.verse: Saa bere no na wɔbɛka akyerɛ mmepɔw se, ‘Dwiriw gu yɛn so,’ ne nkoko nso se, ‘Kata yɛn so!’

31.verse: Na sɛ wɔde eyi yɛ me a meyɛ dumono no a, dɛn na wɔde bɛyɛ mo a moyɛ duwui?”

32.verse: Bere a wɔde Yesu rekɔ no, wɔde nnebɔneyɛfo baanu bi kaa ne ho sɛ wonkokum wɔn.

33.verse: Woduu faako a wɔfrɛ hɔ Golgota no, wɔbɔɔ ɔne nnebɔneyɛfo baanu no asɛnnua mu a ɔbaako wɔ ne nifa na ɔbaako nso wɔ ne benkum.

34.verse: Yesu kae se, “Agya, fa kyɛ wɔn, efisɛ, wonnim nea wɔreyɛ.” Afei asraafo no kyekyɛɛ ne ntade mu bɔɔ so ntonto fae.

35.verse: Saa bere no na nnipadɔm no gyinagyina hɔ rehwɛ no. Yudafo mpanyimfo no dii ne ho fɛw se, “Ogyee ebinom nkwa; sɛ ose ɔno ne Kristo, Onyankopɔn Ba no a, onnye ne ho nkwa na yɛnhwɛ.”

36.verse: Asraafo no nso dii ne ho fɛw de nsa a ɛkeka bi brɛɛ no,

37.verse: kae se, “Sɛ wone Yudafo hene no a, gye wo ho nkwa.”

38.verse: Wɔkyerɛw saa asɛm yi “YUDAFO HENE NO NI!” bɔɔ n’atifi wɔ asɛnnua no so.

39.verse: Nnebɔneyɛfo baanu a na wɔn nso wɔabɔ wɔn asɛnnua mu no mu baako dii Yesu ho fɛw se, “Ɛnyɛ wo ne Kristo no? Gye wo ho na gye yɛn nso.”

40.verse: Nanso ɔdebɔneyɛfo a ɔka ho no, kaa n’anim se, “Wunsuro Onyankopɔn? Hu sɛ yɛn nyinaa wɔ afobu koro no ara mu.

41.verse: Yɛn de, saa asotwe yi fata yɛn; yɛn bɔne so akatua na yɛanya yi, na oyi de, ɔnyɛɛ bɔne biara.”

42.verse: Ɔsan kae se, “Yesu, sɛ wudu w’ahenni mu a, kae me.”

43.verse: Yesu buaa no se, “Merehyɛ wo bɔ sɛ, ɛnnɛ, wobɛka me ho wɔ Paradise.”

44.verse: Yesu wu - Eduu owigyinae no, asase no so nyinaa duruu sum kabii kosii nnɔn abiɛsa.

45.verse: Owia duruu sum na ntama a etwa asɔredan no mu nso mu tew abien.

46.verse: Yesu teɛɛm dennen se, “Agya, wo nsam na mede me honhom mehyɛ!” Ɔkaa eyi no, ogyaa mu.

47.verse: Asraafo panyin a na ogyina hɔ no huu nea asi no, oyii Onyankopɔn ayɛ se, “Ampa ara, saa onipa yi yɛ ɔtreneeni.”

48.verse: Nnipa a wɔbaa hɔ bɛhwɛɛ Yesu asɛnnuambɔ no hui sɛ wawu no, wɔde awerɛhow fii hɔ kɔe.

49.verse: Saa bere no na Yesu nnamfo ne mmea bi a wodii n’akyi fi Galilea bae no gyinagyina akyirikyiri baabi rehwɛ nea ɛrekɔ so no nyinaa.

50.verse: Wosie Yesu - Na ɔbarima bi wɔ hɔ a wɔfrɛ no Yosef a ofi Arimatea a ɛwɔ Yudaman mu. Saa ɔbarima yi, na ɔyɛ onipa pa a ɔteɛ wɔ Onyankopɔn anim a na ɔretwɛn Onyankopɔn Ahenni a ɛbɛba no.

51.verse: Ɛwom sɛ na ɔyɛ Yudafo baguafo no mu baako de, nanso wampene gyinae a wosisii ne nea wɔyɛe no so.

52.verse: Ɔkɔɔ Pilato nkyɛn kɔsrɛɛ Yesu amu no.

53.verse: Ɔma woyii Yesu amu no maa no, na ɔde nwera kyekyeree no de no kɔtoo ɔboda bi a obiara nnaa mu da no mu.

54.verse: Wosiee Yesu Fida a na Yudafo resiesie wɔn ho atwɛn Homeda no.

55.verse: Wosiee amu no wiei no, mmea a wodi Yesu akyi fi Galilea no ne Yosef kɔhwɛɛ faako a wɔde no toe ne sɛnea wosiee no fae.

56.verse: Saa mmea yi san wɔn akyi kɔɔ fie kɔhwehwɛɛ nnuhuam ne ngo a wɔde besiesie Yesu amu no nanso esiane sɛ na Homeda no adu nti, wɔtenaa ase komm sɛnea Yudafo mmara kyerɛ no.

1.verse: Owusɔre - Kwasida anɔpahema, mmea no de nnuhuam ne ngo no kɔɔ ɔboda no so.

2.verse: Woduu hɔ no, wohui sɛ wɔapirew ɔbo a wɔde hinii ɔboda no ano no afi hɔ.

3.verse: Na wɔkɔɔ ɔboda no mu no, na Yesu amu no nna hɔ.

4.verse: Wɔde ahodwiriw gyina hɔ no, amonom hɔ ara, mmarima baanu bi a wɔhyehyɛ ntade fitafitaa a ani hyerɛn begyinagyinaa wɔn nkyɛn.

5.verse: Mmea yi koma tui na wɔkotokotow wɔn na mmarima no bisaa wɔn se, “Adɛn nti na morehwehwɛ ɔteasefo wɔ awufo mu?

7.verse: Onni ha. Wasɔre! Monnkae asɛm a ɔka kyerɛɛ mo bere a na ɔwɔ Galilea no se, ‘Etwa sɛ wɔde Kristo no hyɛ nnebɔneyɛfo nsa na wɔbɔ no asɛnnua mu na ne nnansa so wasɔre bio no?‘“

8.verse: Mmea no kaee asɛm no no,

9.verse: wɔde ahoɔhare fii ɔboda no so bɛkaa nea wohui no nyinaa kyerɛɛ asuafo dubaako no ne wɔn a wɔwɔ hɔ no nyinaa.

10.verse: Mmea a wɔkɔɔ ɔboda no so a wɔbɛkaa saa asɛm yi no ne Maria Magdalene ne Yohana ne Yakobo ne na Maria ne afoforo bi.

11.verse: Wɔn nsɛm a wɔbɛkae no yɛɛ wɔn sɛ anansesɛm bi enti wɔannye anni.

12.verse: Ɛwom sɛ nnipa no annye asɛm no anni de, nanso Petro de, otuu mmirika kɔɔ ɔboda no so, kotow hwɛɛ mu, hui sɛ nwera a wɔde kyekyeree Yesu ho no gu hɔ. Ɔsan baa fie a na ɔnte nea ohui no ase.

13.verse: Emaus kwan so - Da no ara asuafo no mu baanu siim sɛ wɔrekɔ akuraa bi a wɔfrɛ no Emaus a efi Yerusalem rekɔ hɔ no bɛyɛ sɛ akwansin ason.

14.verse: Wɔrekɔ no nyinaa na asɛm a asi no ho nkɔmmɔ ara na wɔredi.

15.verse: Wogu so redi nkɔmmɔ na wɔregye wɔn ho akyinnye no, Yesu bɛkaa wɔn ho ne wɔn bɔɔ anan kɔe.

16.verse: Wohui sɛ obi ka wɔn ho de, nanso wɔantumi anhu sɛ ɛyɛ Yesu.

17.verse: Obisaa wɔn se, “Nkɔmmɔ bɛn na moredi a mo werɛ ahow mo ho yi?”

18.verse: Na wɔn mu baako a wɔfrɛ no Kleopa bisaa no se, “Wo nko ara ne ɔhɔho a wowɔ Yerusalem a wontee nsɛm a asisi hɔ nnansa yi no?”

19.verse: Obisaa wɔn se, “Nsɛm bɛn?” Wobuaa no se, “Nsɛm a ɛfa Nasaretni Yesu a ɔyɛ odiyifo a ɔwɔ tumi wɔ nneyɛe ne ɔkasa mu wɔ Onyankopɔn ne nnipa nyinaa anim no ho,

20.verse: ne sɛnea asɔfo mpanyin ne yɛn mpanyimfo kyeree no de no kɔɔ aban mu sɛ wommu no kumfɔ a wɔbɔɔ no asɛnnua mu no ho.

21.verse: Yɛn de, na yɛn ani da so sɛ ɔno na ɔrebegye Israel, na bio nnansa ni a saa asɛm yi sii.

22.verse: Na mmea bi nso a wɔyɛ Yesu akyidifo sɛ yɛn ara ama yɛn ho adwiriw yɛn. Wotuaa nhema kɔɔ ɔboda no so,

23.verse: nanso wɔanhu n’amu no. Wɔsan bɛka kyerɛɛ yɛn se, wɔahu ɔsoro abɔfo ma wɔaka akyerɛ wɔn se, Yesu te ase.

24.verse: Yɛn mu binom tuu mmirika kɔhwɛe na ampa ara, na Yesu amu no nni hɔ sɛnea mmea no kae no ara pɛ.”

25.verse: Yesu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Adwenemuharefo a munni gyidi; ɛyɛ mo den sɛ mubegye nea adiyifo no aka no nyinaa adi.

26.verse: Wɔanhyɛ ho nkɔm sɛ, ɛsɛ sɛ Kristo no behu amane ansa na wakɔ n’anuonyam mu anaa?”

27.verse: Na ofii Mose ne adiyifo no so kyerɛkyerɛɛ wɔn nsɛm a ɛfa ne ho wɔ Kyerɛwsɛm no mu no nyinaa ase.

28.verse: Woduu Emaus kurotia no, Yesu pɛe sɛ anka ɔtoa n’akwantu no so.

29.verse: Nanso wɔsrɛɛ no, san no sɛ ɔnna wɔn nkyɛn, efisɛ, na ade reyɛ asa nti, ɔsanee ne wɔn kɔɔ fie.

30.verse: Bere a wɔte adidii no, Yesu bɔɔ mpae, daa Onyankopɔn ase, faa abodoo bubuu mu de maa wɔn.

31.verse: Amonom, wɔn ani so tetew wɔn maa afei wohui sɛ ɛyɛ Yesu. Ɛhɔ ara, otu yerae.

32.verse: Na afei wosisesisee wɔn ho wɔn ho sɛnea Kyerɛwsɛm no mu nsɛm a ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn bere a na wɔnam kwan so no si fa kaa wɔn koma no.

33.verse: Ntɛm ara, wɔsan wɔn akyi baa Yerusalem bɛtoo asuafo dubaako no ne wɔn a na wɔka wɔn ho no sɛ wɔahyia.

34.verse: Woduu hɔ no, wɔbɔɔ wɔn amanneɛ se, “Ampa ara, Awurade asɔre afi awufo mu. Wayi ne ho adi akyerɛ Simon.”

35.verse: Baanu a wofi Emaus bae no nso bɔɔ wɔn amanneɛ sɛnea Yesu bɛtoo wɔn Emaus kwan so na wɔantumi anhu sɛ ɛyɛ ɔno kosii bere a obubuu abodoo mu de maa wɔn no ansa.

36.verse: Yesu yi ne ho adi bio - Wogu so rebɔ amanneɛ no, prɛko pɛ, Yesu bepuee hɔ, kyiaa wɔn se, “Asomdwoe nka mo!”

37.verse: Wɔn nyinaa bobɔɔ birim, suroe efisɛ, na wosusuw sɛ wɔahu ɔsaman.

38.verse: Obisaa wɔn se, “Adɛn na mo koma atutu na munnye nni nso sɛ ɛyɛ me?

39.verse: Monhwɛ me nsam ne me nan. Ɛyɛ me! Momfa mo nsa nka me nhwɛ; efisɛ, ɔsaman nni honam ne nnompe sɛnea muhu sɛ mewɔ bi yi.”

40.verse: Ɔkasa wiei no, ɔde ne nsa ne ne nan kyerɛɛ wɔn.

41.verse: Anigyetraso ne ahodwiriw nti, amma wɔannye anni sɛ ɛyɛ ɔno. Obisaa wɔn se, “Mowɔ biribi wɔ ha a mubedi anaa?”

42.verse: Wɔmaa no apataa sin bi a wɔatoto

43.verse: ma ogye wee wɔ wɔn anim hɔ ara.

44.verse: Na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Eyi ne me nsɛm a meka kyerɛɛ mo bere a na me ne mo wɔ hɔ no se, ɛsɛ sɛ biribiara a wɔakyerɛw afa me ho wɔ Mose Mmara ne Adiyifo nhoma ne Nnwom mu no ba mu.”

45.verse: Afei obuee wɔn adwene mu ma wɔtee Kyerɛwsɛm a ɛfa ne ho no ase.

46.verse: Ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Wɔakyerɛw se, ɛsɛ sɛ Kristo no hu amane na owu na ne nnansa so, wasɔre afi awufo mu.

47.verse: Na wobefi ase wɔ Yerusalem de ne din akɔka adwensakra ne bɔnefafiri ho nsɛm akyerɛ amansan.

49.verse: “Mɛsoma Honhom Kronkron no na waba mo so sɛnea m’agya hyɛɛ ho bɔ no. Na monnkɔ baabiara; montena ha nkosi sɛ Honhom Kronkron no de tumi a efi soro no bɛba abɛhyɛ mo ma.”

50.verse: Yesu sorokɔ - Yesu ne asuafo no bɔɔ anan koduu Betania kurotia na ɔmaa ne nsa so hyiraa wɔn.

51.verse: Ogu so rehyira wɔn no wɔmaa no so kɔɔ soro.

52.verse: Na wɔsɔree no de anigye san kɔɔ Yerusalem.

53.verse: Na daa wɔwɔ asɔredan no mu hɔ yi Onyankopɔn ayɛ.
